GSP33bbdip13u:2: [BBsBh_1,3.1.1] tatra cānyatra ca prasiddhānāṃ śabdānāṃ viṣṇau samanvayaṃ prāyeṇāsmin pāde darśayati / viṣṇoḥ paravidyāviṣayatvamuktam /
GSP33bbdip13u:3_2: prācuryeṇeti / tathā ca prāyeṇāsmin tṛtīye pāde 'tatra'; harau tasmāt 'anyatra';
GSP33bbdip13u:3_3: rudraprakṛtyādau ca śrutiliṅgādibhiḥ prasiddhānāṃ nāmaliṅgātmakaśabdānāṃ viṣṇau 'samanvayaṃ';
GSP33bbdip13u:4: [BBsBh_1,3.1.2] tatra 'yasmin dyauḥ pṛthivī cāntarikṣamotaṃ manaḥ saha prāṇaiśca sarvaiḥ tamevaikaṃ jānatha ātmānam'; (muṃ. 2-2-5.) ityatra /
GSP33bbdip13u:10_1: ādiśabda ubhayānvayī / rudrasyeti śeṣe ṣaṣṭī / tayorityetat pradhānavāyvorapyupalakṣakam /
GSP33bbdip13u:10_2: tathā ca adṛśyatvādiguṇakākṣarasya viṣṇoḥ paravidyāviṣayatvaṃ yatroktaṃ tatraivātharvaṇe
GSP33bbdip13u:11: yasmin dyauḥ pṛthivī cāntarikṣamotaṃ manaḥ saha prāṇaiśca sarvaiḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:13_0: 'amṛtasyaiṣa setuḥ'; ityatra iti vākye tatra dyubhvādyāśraye uktamityekā yojanā /
GSP33bbdip13u:13_1: tatra dyubhvādyāyatanatve 'tayoḥ'; rudrajīvayoḥ prāptiḥ / kutaḥ? atravākye dyubhvādyāyatane
GSP33bbdip13u:13_2: prāṇādhāratvapratīteḥ śravaṇāt / tathā sa eṣa iti jīvaliṅgaśravaṇācca / na ca prāṇādhāratvaśravaṇe
GSP33bbdip13u:13_3: 'pi kuto 'tra rudrasya prāptiriti vācyam / 'prāṇānāṃ granthirasi rudromāviśāntakastenānnenāpyāyasva';
GSP33bbdip13u:14: yo brahmā brahmaṇa ujjabhāra prāṇeśvaraḥ kṛttivāsāḥ pinākīr /
GSP33bbdip13u:16_0: ityādikhilasaṃhitāvākyena ca rudrasya prāṇādhāratvapratīteḥ ityaparā yojanā / yadvā
GSP33bbdip13u:16_2: vyākhyeyam / tathātve ādiśabdo 'rudro vāva lokādhāraḥ'; iti vākyagrāhī / evaṃ tatra
GSP33bbdip13u:16_3: tayoḥ prāptiriti dūrānvayena 'tatra'; paravidyāviṣayatve tayo rudrajīvayoḥ prāptirityanyā
GSP33bbdip13u:16_8: tathā dyubhvādyāyatanatvarūpo viṣayaḥ darśitaḥ / dvividhadvitīyayojanāyāṃ sayuktikapūrvapakṣo
GSP33bbdip13u:16_9: darśitaḥ / tṛtīyāyāṃ tu pūrvapakṣaphalaṃ darśitamiti draṣṭavyam / 'yasmin'; paramātmani
GSP33bbdip13u:16_11: 'taṃ'; praviṣṭaṃ paramātmānam 'ekaṃ'; pradhānaṃ 'jānatha'; jānīdhvam iti śrutyarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:17_0: rudra u mā āviśa iti padacchedaḥ / u ityavyayaṃ sambuddhidyotako nipātaḥ / mā ityavyayaṃ,
GSP33bbdip13u:17_1: nāsmadādeśaḥ māśabdaḥ / yadvā metyanenāsmadādeśo māśabdaścetyubhau tantreṇopāttau /
GSP33bbdip13u:17_2: sa ca niṣedhārthaḥ / tathā ca - he rudra tvaṃ 'prāṇānām'; indriyāṇāṃ grathyate 'sminniti
GSP33bbdip13u:17_3: 'granthiḥ'; āśrayaḥ 'antakaḥ'; saṃhartā cāsi / sa tvaṃ 'mā'; mām 'āviśa'; praviśa
GSP33bbdip13u:17_4: mayi sannidhiṃ kurvityarthaḥ / yadvā - he rudra antakastvaṃ māṃ mā praviśetyarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:18_1: indriyeśaḥ 'kṛttivāsāḥ'; kṛttiścarma vasanaṃ yasyāsau, 'pinākīr'; iśāno na āyuḥ 'dadhātu';
GSP33bbdip13u:18_2: puṣṇātviti śrutyantarārthaḥ / siddhānte tu rudrādiśabdāḥ viṣṇuparāḥ / ya eṣa jīvo
GSP33bbdip13u:28_1: svaśabdaparyāyātmaśabdāditi viṣṇutattvanirṇayokteḥ, svetiśabdaḥ svaśabda iti vyutpattyā
GSP33bbdip13u:28_3: iti tattvapradīpokteḥ, svasya viṣṇoreva vācakaḥ śabdaḥ svaśabda iti vigrahāśrayeṇa
GSP33bbdip13u:29_0: ātmāśabdādapi kuto 'yaṃ viṣṇurityata āha - ātmeti // yasmāt 'taiḥ'; viṣṇoritaraiścaturmukhādijīvaiḥ
GSP33bbdip13u:29_1: guṇapūrṇatā 'naivāptā'; na sarvathā prāptā / tasmādātmabrahmādayaḥ śabdāḥ 'avyayaṃ';
GSP33bbdip13u:29_3: na mukhyato vācakatvena prāpnuvantītyarthaḥ / anenātmaśabdasyāpi guṇapūrtirartha
GSP33bbdip13u:29_4: ityuktaṃ bhavati / brahmavaivarta ityanantaramanyatra niravakāśatayoktāditi śeṣaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:34_1: kiṃ na syāt / tathā ca na tato viṣṇordyubhvādyāyatanatvanirṇaya ityāśaṅkāṃ pariharatsūtramupanyasya
GSP33bbdip13u:34_3: sūtre dyubhvādyāyatanasyeti vipariṇāmena anuvartanīyam / muktopasṛpyeti bhāvanirdeśaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:34_4: upasṛpyatvaṃ ceha śrautasetuśabdabalātprāpyāntararahitatve sati prāpyatvaṃ vivakṣitam /
GSP33bbdip13u:34_6: viṣṇoranyat dyubhvādyāyatanaṃ kalpyamiti / 'muktānām'; iti smaraṇādamṛtasyeti jātāvekavacanam /
GSP33bbdip13u:34_7: tathā ca 'amṛtasya'; muktajātasya 'eṣaḥ'; paramātmā 'setuḥ'; seturiva seturmukhyāśraya
GSP33bbdip13u:42_1: sūtraṃ vyācaṣṭe - brahmaviditi // 'ityādinā'; vākyena 'tasya'; viṣṇoḥ evetyanena
GSP33bbdip13u:42_2: prāpyatvaṃ prāpyāntararahitatve sati prāptatvam / anena dyubhvādyāyatanasya muktopasṛpyatvavyapadeśāttasya
GSP33bbdip13u:42_4: 'nuvṛttaṃ tattvityetadiha vipariṇāmena anuvartanīyamiti sūcitam / upasṛpyapadaṃ bhāvapradhānaṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:42_7: mahopaniṣadi ca śrutam / atra 'tadviśvamupajīvati'; ityanuvartate / tathā ca 'tadviśvaṃ';
GSP33bbdip13u:42_8: jagat mahanīyaṃ jñeyaṃ, pūjyajñeyaṃ vā / viśvasvāminaṃ 'parāyaṇaṃ'; muktānāmāśrayamupajīvatīti
GSP33bbdip13u:42_9: śrutyarthaḥ / 'muktānāṃ paramā gatiḥ'; iti sahasranāmagatamekaṃ nāma / paramā mukhyā
GSP33bbdip13u:42_10: gamyata iti gatirāśrayaḥ / 'etam'; iti taittirīyavākyamānandamayanaye vyākṛtam /
GSP33bbdip13u:43_1: muktaprāpyatvaṃ kiṃ na syāditi liṅgasya sāvakāśatvamāśaṅkya anyatra prāpyatvamātrasambhave
GSP33bbdip13u:43_4: idamidaṃ ceti pratyekaṃ bahunā vacanena 'kiṃ prayojanaṃ'; na kimapi, pratyutoktigauravameveti
GSP33bbdip13u:43_5: bhāvaḥ / tarhi kathaṃ nirṇaya ityata āha - yāvacchvetamiti / 'śvetaṃ'; śvetadvīpākhyaṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:43_6: viṣṇusthānaṃ 'yāvanna gacchati'; na prāpnoti, tatratyaṃ viṣṇuṃ ca na paśyati 'tāvadyogī';
GSP33bbdip13u:43_7: aparokṣajñānākhyopāyavān mukto na syāt / bhagavadicchārūpāvaraṇānmuktaḥ samyagāvirbhūtajñānānandādimān
GSP33bbdip13u:43_9: eṣor'thaḥ 'śāstravinirṇayaḥ'; tajjanyanirṇayaviṣaya iti vā / bhāvabodhe tu - sūtre
GSP33bbdip13u:43_10: purāṇe ca muktapadena liṅgabhaṅgavān vivakṣita ityuktam / atra śvetadvīpāganturamuktatvoktyā
GSP33bbdip13u:43_11: śvetadvīpaṃ prāptasyaiva muktatvaṃ jñāyate / tathā ca tatsthitasya viṣṇorevetaravyavacchedena
GSP33bbdip13u:43_12: muktaprāpyatvaṃ siddhamiti bhāvaḥ / ityādityapurāṇe ityasya tasyaiva muktaprāpyatvavyapadeśādityanenānvayaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:43_13: anena tasyaivetyevakārasyopayogo jñāpito bhavati / asya hetorna liṅgasya sāvakāśatvaṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:49_0: [BBsBhDīp_1,3.1.6] nanu prāguktarītyā rudraprakṛtyordyubhvāyatanatvaṃ kiṃ na syādityatastatsādhakābhāvānna
GSP33bbdip13u:49_1: tayostadityāha sūtrakṛt - nānumānamiti // atra nānumānamiti sādhyāṃśaṃ vyācaṣṭe -
GSP33bbdip13u:49_3: anumānātmake anumānasiddhaprāmāṇyake pāśupatādyāgame sarvāśrayatvena kalpito bodhita
GSP33bbdip13u:49_4: ityarthaḥ / kecittu - pramāṇatvena anumīyata ityanumānamiti vyācikhyuḥ / etatpakṣe
GSP33bbdip13u:51_0: [BBsBhDīp_1,3.1.7] evaṃ sūtre pratijñāṃśaṃ vyākhyāya hetvaṃśaṃ vyācaṣṭe - bhasmadhareti //
GSP33bbdip13u:51_1: tasya rudrasya śabdastacchabdaḥ / tacchrutiliṅgātmakaḥ / tathā ca bhasmadharogratvādidharmaviśiṣṭadharmibodhakabhasmadharogrādiśabdābhāvādityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:51_3: svārthe tvapratyayaḥ / tatprayogastu liṅgātmakaśabdasyāpi saṅgrahāya / bhāvabodhe
GSP33bbdip13u:51_4: tu - bhasmadharetyanena rudravācakanāmātmakaśabdo gṛhyate / ugratvapadena ugratvarūpaliṅgātmakaśabdo
GSP33bbdip13u:51_8: vacanaṃ 'rudro bhasmadharo nagnaḥ'; iti vacanādviśeṣanāmābhiprāyeṇa / ata evaitadvacanoktāḥ
GSP33bbdip13u:51_10: vyākhyeyam / yadyapi atacchabdādityasya tacchabdābhāvāditi vyākhyāne nañaḥ kriyāsāpekṣatvenāsamarthatvātsamāsānupapattiḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:51_12: pañcamītvāt nātrām bhavati / anena sūtre jagatkartṛtvenānumīyate ityanumānaśabdena
GSP33bbdip13u:51_15: - pramāṇatvenānumīyata ityanumānaṃ pāśupatādyāgamaḥ / tato matvarthe arśa ādibhyo
GSP33bbdip13u:51_17: tatra prathamāṇantarapadenāgama ucyate / dvitīyena pratipādyatvam / tathā ca anumānātmakapāśupatādyāgamapratipādyaṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:51_18: rudrādikaṃ na dyubhvādyāyatanaṃ na 'yasmin'; ityādiprakaraṇe sarvāśrayatvena pratipādyaṃ,
GSP33bbdip13u:52: [BBsBh_1,3.1.8] 'so 'ntakaḥ sa rudraḥ sa prāṇabhṛtsa prāṇanāyakaḥ sar iśo yo hariryo 'nanto yo viṣṇuryaḥ parovarīyān'; ityādinā prāṇagranthirudratvāderviṣṇorevoktatvāt /
GSP33bbdip13u:53_2: antakatvādiliṅgānāṃ coktatvāttadbalāttatroktaṃ dyubhvādyātanatvaṃ rudrādeḥ kiṃ na
GSP33bbdip13u:53_3: syādityata āha - sa iti // yo 'ntakassaṃhartā sa eva tacchabdavācyaḥ śrutaḥ sa viṣṇureva /
GSP33bbdip13u:53_4: yo rudraḥ śrutaḥ so 'pi viṣṇureva / yaḥ 'prāṇabhṛt'; prāṇādhāratvabodhakaprāṇagranthiśabdavācyaḥ,
GSP33bbdip13u:53_5: so 'pi viṣṇureva / yaḥ 'prāṇanāyakaḥ'; tatsvāmī tata eva prāṇeśa śabditaḥ so 'pi
GSP33bbdip13u:53_6: viṣṇureva / yar iśaḥ śrutaḥ so 'pi viṣṇureva / yo 'nantastacchabdavācyaḥ so 'pi trividhaparicchedaśūnyatvādviṣṇureva,
GSP33bbdip13u:53_7: na śeṣaḥ / yaḥ parovarīyān so 'pi rudrādeḥ parato vāṇyādeḥ parādviriñcāt parataḥ
GSP33bbdip13u:54_1: paraparataravaravaratamānāṃ caturṇāṃ pratyāyanāya vṛttivākye subādeśasya sorutvotvaguṇasamānaśabdalopā
GSP33bbdip13u:54_2: jñātavyāḥ / pratyuddeśyaṃ vidheyānvayajñāpanāya bahūnāṃ yattadāṃ prayogaḥ / 'ityādinā';
GSP33bbdip13u:59: tadādhāro yato viṣṇuḥ pinākīti tataḥ smṛtaḥ //
GSP33bbdip13u:64_1: viṣṇoḥ pratipādyatvaniścayaḥ / tatratyānāṃ rudrādiśabdānāṃ paśupatyādāveva rūḍhatvena
GSP33bbdip13u:64_2: viṣṇau tadabhāvāt, bhāve vā punaraniścayāt / viṣṇau yogavṛttisambhave 'pi tasyā rūḍhito
GSP33bbdip13u:64_3: durbalatvenāniścāyakatvāt / na hi śrutyantare viṣṇuliṅgādyastītyata āha - brahmāṇḍe
GSP33bbdip13u:64_4: ceti / co 'pyarthaḥ samuccaye / uktatvādityanuvartate / tenāsyānvayaḥ / kimuktamityato
GSP33bbdip13u:64_6: rogam utpattyādikaṃ 'drāvayate'; nirvāpayati nivartayati yasmāttasmādrudra ityucyate /
GSP33bbdip13u:64_7: ka ityata stadrūpaviśeṣamāha - janārdana iti / jananamardayatīti vyutpattirḥ / 'iśanārt
GSP33bbdip13u:64_8: iśānāṃ'; brahmādīnāṃ ceṣṭakatvādīśāno 'pi sa evetyarthaḥ / mahattvata ityupalakṣaṇam /
GSP33bbdip13u:64_9: dyotanādeścetyapi draṣṭavyam / ye 'narāḥ'; janāḥ saṃsārasāgarānmuktāḥ santo 'nākaṃ';
GSP33bbdip13u:64_10: paramasukhaṃ 'pibanti'; bhuñjate te pinākāḥ / viṣṇuryataḥ 'tadādhāraḥ'; teṣāmādhārastataḥ
GSP33bbdip13u:64_11: pinākīti 'smṛtaḥ'; abhihitaḥ śrutāviti śeṣaḥ / śruta iti pāṭhaḥ svarasaḥ / 'śaṃrodhanāt';
GSP33bbdip13u:64_12: muktiparyantaṃ svarūpabhūtamapi sukhaṃ rudhvā vartanāt āsurasakhaṃ nirudhya vartanādvā
GSP33bbdip13u:64_13: śarva ityarthaḥ / yataḥ 'kṛtyātmakaṃ'; carmamayamimaṃ dehaṃ 'pravartayan'; sṛjan
GSP33bbdip13u:64_14: niyamayan vā tena svātmānaṃ jīvaṃ vā 'vaste'; ācchādayati tadantarvartate / yadvā
GSP33bbdip13u:64_15: - dehaṃ vaste adhivasatītyataḥ kṛttivāsā ityucyata ityarthaḥ / 'virecanāt'; jagatsarjanādasau
GSP33bbdip13u:64_16: viṣṇuḥ bṛṃhaṇādvardhanādvā brahmanāmā / asau paramaiśvaryādindra ityucyate /
GSP33bbdip13u:67: [BBsBhDīp_1,3.1.10] evaṃ viṣṇau rudrādiśabdānāṃ mahāyogamuktvā vidvadrūḍhiṃ cāha - evamiti //
GSP33bbdip13u:68_0: nimittairityadhyāhāryam / tathā ca 'evam'; uktarītyā nānāvidhairnimitaiḥ sapurāṇeṣu
GSP33bbdip13u:68_1: vedeṣu gataiḥ etairnānāvidhaiḥ śabdairviṣṇureka eva 'gīyate'; mukhyato 'bhidhīyata
GSP33bbdip13u:68_3: ityābhyāṃ tatropapādakamuktam / tribhuvanārthaśabdavyāpī hi trivikramaḥ / sarvapuruṣaśabdanimittakasvāmī
GSP33bbdip13u:68_4: hi puruṣottamaḥ / tathā cānena viṣṇau rudrādiśabdānāṃ mahāyogavidvadrūḍhikathanāt
GSP33bbdip13u:68_6: iti bhāvaḥ / 'puruṣottama iti'; ityantasya 'brahmāṇḍe'; iti pūrveṇānvayaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:71: anyanāmnāṃ gatirviṣṇuḥ eka eva prakīrtitaḥ // iti /
GSP33bbdip13u:72_2: mahājñeyam'; (mahānā-11.) ityādiśrutīnāmanirṇāyakatvaṃ ca syādityata āha - vāmane
GSP33bbdip13u:72_4: paṭhati - na tviti / turavadhāraṇe / 'nārāyaṇādīnāṃ'; nārāyaṇa ityādīnamanyatra rudrādau
GSP33bbdip13u:72_5: sambhavo mukhyavṛttiḥ astīti śeṣaḥ / 'anyanāmnāṃ'; rudrādiśabdānāṃ 'viṣṇureka eva
GSP33bbdip13u:72_6: gatiḥ'; mukhyavācyaḥ prakīrtita ityarthaḥ / itiśabdasya vāmana ityanenānvayaḥ / tasya
GSP33bbdip13u:72_7: nārāyaṇādināmnāṃ anyatra niravakāśatvokteḥ na tacchrutīnāmanirṇāyakatvamiti vivakṣitasādhyenānvayaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:75: prādādanyatra bhagavān rājevarte svakaṃ puram // iti /
GSP33bbdip13u:76_1: vṛttiḥ kiṃ na syādityata āha - skānde ceti // co 'pyarthaḥ samuccaye / asyāpyuktatvāditi
GSP33bbdip13u:77_0: vinetyarthaḥ / 'anyatra'; anyebhyo rudrādibhyaḥ anyāni rudrādināmānītiśeṣaḥ / ādiśabdena
GSP33bbdip13u:77_1: viṣṇurityādikaṃ gṛhyate / atra dṛṣṭāntamāha - rājeti // yathā rājā svakaṃ puramṛte
GSP33bbdip13u:77_2: 'nyadamātyādibhyo dadāti tadvadityarthaḥ / itītyantasya skānde ityanenānvayaḥ / tasya
GSP33bbdip13u:79: ugro bhasmadharo nagnaḥ kapālīti śivasya ca /
GSP33bbdip13u:82_0: [BBsBhDīp_1,3.1.13] yadyevaṃ rudrādiśabdāḥ viṣṇvaikaparāḥ tarhi kimucyate bhasmadharogratvādīnāṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:82_1: tacchabdatvam / viṣṇudattatvābhiprāyeṇa cet - tarhi rudrādiśabdā api tādṛśā iti kathaṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:82_2: tairnirṇayābhāva ityata āha - caturmukha iti // yadyapi svakīyāni, tathāpi 'keśavaḥ';
GSP33bbdip13u:82_3: brahmarudrapravartako viṣṇuḥ 'svakīyāni'; mukhyataḥ svavācakānyeva caturmukhaḥ śatānandaḥ
GSP33bbdip13u:87_2: 'vāyunā vai gautama sūtreṇāyaṃ lokaḥ paraśca lokaḥ sarvāṇi bhūtāni saṃdṛbdhāni bhavanti';
GSP33bbdip13u:87_3: (bṛ. 5-7-2.) iti śrutyantare vāyuniṣṭhatvena prasiddhatvādvāyorvātra prakaraṇe dyubhvādyāśrayatvena
GSP33bbdip13u:87_4: pratipādyatā kiṃ na syādityāśaṅkāṃ pariharatsūtraṃ paṭhitvā vyācaṣṭe - prāṇabhṛcceti //
GSP33bbdip13u:87_6: pūrvoktahetubhirityarthaḥ / nātra hetvantaraṃ vācyamityevaśabdārthaḥ / jīvo vāyurityanena
GSP33bbdip13u:87_7: prāṇabhṛcchabdo vyākhyātaḥ / atra vācya ityanuṣajyate / caḥ samuccaye / anena sūtre
GSP33bbdip13u:87_8: caśabdaḥ prāguktahetūnāṃ nānumānamityato nañaśca samākarṣakaḥ / na kevalaṃ rudro
GSP33bbdip13u:87_9: 'tra na vācyaḥ, kintu jīvo vāyuśceti samuccayārthaścetyuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP33bbdip13u:90_1: 'pi bahudhā janmākhyaliṅgena jīvo 'tra vācyaḥ kiṃ na syādityata āha - ajāyamāna iti //

GSP33bbdip13u:174_0: [BBsBhDīp_1,3.3.6] viṣṇuvadanyasyāpi sarvādhāratvaṃ kiṃ na syādityata āha - pṛthivyādīti //
GSP33bbdip13u:174_2: 'bhavat'; vartamānaṃ 'yat'; idaṃ viśvaṃ tadviṣṇuḥ 'eka eva'; asahāyo bibharti / tasya
GSP33bbdip13u:174_3: dhṛtau tasmādviṣṇoranyaḥ 'kṣamaḥ'; samartho netyarthaḥ / iti skānda ityasya 'uktatvāt';
GSP33bbdip13u:178: sā ca dhṛtiḥ prasāsanāducyate / 'etasya vā akṣarasya praśāsane
GSP33bbdip13u:180_1: - sā ceti // 'sā ca'; sarvadhṛtirapi ityādinā praśāsanāducyate yato 'to 'pi brahmākṣaramityanvayaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:180_3: sarvadhṛtireva akṣarasya viṣṇutvasādhikā, tadā sutarāṃ, yā tu 'etasya'; iti śrutivākye
GSP33bbdip13u:182_1: ityatastasya viṣṇukartṛkatvādityāha - tacceti / sarvadhṛtikāraṇaṃ praśāsanaṃ tvityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:182_2: na kevalaṃ sarvadhṛtiḥ, kintu taddhetupraśāsanaṃ ceti samuccaye vā caśabdaḥ / 'viṣṇoreva';
GSP33bbdip13u:183: [BBsBh_1,3.3.9] saptārdhagarbhā bhuvanasya reto viṣṇostiṣṭhanti pradiśā vidharmaṇi / (ṛ. 1-164-36.)
GSP33bbdip13u:184_0: [BBsBhDīp_1,3.3.9] kuta etajjñāyata ityatastaccetyanena pratijñātārthe śrutiṃ pramāṇayati
GSP33bbdip13u:184_1: - sapteti // ā ṛddhagarbhāḥ ārdhagarbhāḥ / brahmāṇḍākhyātisamṛddhagarbhāḥ / nigaraṇena
GSP33bbdip13u:184_2: bhriyanta iti garbhāstadāvaraṇabhūtā iti yāvat / reta iti liṅgavyatyayenaikavacanaṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:184_3: prathamābahuvacanārthe / tathā ca - 'bhuvanasya'; lokasya 'retaso'; ratipradāḥ sārabhūtā
GSP33bbdip13u:184_7: tiṣṭhantīti ṛṅmantrārthaḥ / viśveśvaratīrthīye tu 'ardhasya'; viṣṇoḥ 'garbhāḥ'; sapta
GSP33bbdip13u:184_8: devāḥ bhuvanasya 'retaḥ'; kāraṇam / ete ca viṣṇoḥ pradiśā vidharmaṇi tiṣṭhantītyartha
GSP33bbdip13u:185: [BBsBh_1,3.3.10] caturbhissākaṃ navatiṃ ca nāmabhiścakraṃ na vṛttaṃ vyatīravīvipat / (ṛ. 1-155-6.) ityādiśruteḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:186: [BBsBhDīp_1,3.3.10] 'caturbhiḥ'; iti vākyaṃ tu janmanaye vyākhyātam / evaṃjātīyakaśrutirādiśabdārthaḥ / śruterityasya jñāyata ityadhyāhāreṇa tacceti pūrvavākyenānvayaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:189_1: āha - eka iti // idaṃ ca bhāratavākyaṃ sabhāparvagam / 'śāstā'; sarvadhṛtihetvājñākartā /
GSP33bbdip13u:189_2: 'ekaḥ'; na tu dvitīyo 'sti, sa ca viṣṇurevetyarthaḥ / 'garbhe śayānaṃ puruṣaṃ ko
GSP33bbdip13u:193_0: [BBsBhDīp_1,3.3.12] 'na kevalam'; ityādi hiraṇyakaśipuṃ prati prahlādavākyam / he
GSP33bbdip13u:193_1: rājan na kevalaṃ me bhavataśca 'saḥ'; bhagavān 'balaṃ'; balaprado dhṛtihetuḥ, kintvanyeṣāṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:193_2: balināṃ ca balamityarthaḥ / ityādeścetyasya 'tacca praśāsanaṃ viṣṇoreveti jñāyate';
GSP33bbdip13u:198_1: - anyeti // ādiśabdena 'etadvai tadakṣaraṃ gārgi brāhmaṇā abhivadanti asthūlamanaṇvahrasvamadīrghamalohitamasnehamacchāyamatamo
GSP33bbdip13u:198_3: na tadaśnāti kiñcana na tadaśnāti kaścana'; (bṛ. 5-8-8.) iti samagravākyaṃ gṛhyate /
GSP33bbdip13u:198_5: iti śeṣaḥ / co hetusamuccaye / asyāpi brahmaivākṣaramiti pūrveṇānvayaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:199_0: anena - na kevalaṃ pūrvoktahetubhyāṃ, kintvanyeṣāṃ sakalavastūnāṃ bhāvānāṃ svarūpāṇāṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:200_1: brahma etallakṣaṇakaṃ 'brāhmaṇāḥ'; jñānino 'bhivadanti vai prasiddham / tatkiṃ lakṣaṇamityata
GSP33bbdip13u:200_2: āha - asthūlamiti / sthūlaṃ mahat / svaprabuddhārthāntaraṃ tu - 'etat'; akṣaraṃ brāhmaṇāḥ
GSP33bbdip13u:200_10: ata eva 'acchāyamatamo 'vāyvanākāśam'; ityatra sarvātmanā niṣedha ityuktaṃ sudhāṭīkayoḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:200_15: 'amātraṃ'; parimitiśūnyam / mīyante ebhiriti mātrā indriyāṇīti ṭīkokteḥ amātraṃ cakṣurādīndriyarahitamiti
GSP33bbdip13u:200_16: vyāsatīrthīyoktiḥ / sarvātmanā śarīrārambhakapañcamātraśūnyaṃ vā / na vidyate 'ntaraṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:200_17: bāhyaṃ ca yasmāttadanantaramabāhyam, idameva sarvasmādantaraṃ bāhyaṃ cetyarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:200_18: 'tat'; brahma 'kiṃ ca na'; annādikaṃ śubhamaśubhaṃ vā sāśanānaśanatvena naradevau
GSP33bbdip13u:202: iti smṛterupajīvanārthaṃ 'nāśnāti'; nātti / 'kaścana'; ko 'pi samarthaḥ 'tat'; brahma 'nāśnāti'; na saṃharatīti /
GSP33bbdip13u:203: [BBsBh_1,3.3.14] 'asthūlo 'naṇuramadhyamo madhyamo 'vyāpako vyāpako yo 'sau harirādiranādiraviśvo viśvaḥ saguṇo nirguṇaḥ'; ityāderviṣṇoreva
GSP33bbdip13u:205_4: ityādinā // na cānena sthūlatvāderanukternacoktaparihāra iti vācyam / 'madhyamo vyāpakaḥ';
GSP33bbdip13u:205_8: iti vyākhyātam / asmin pakṣe niyatamadhyamaparimāṇa- śūnyatvānnānityatvamiti parihāro
GSP33bbdip13u:205_9: 'bhipretaḥ / na vidyate 'nyo vyāpako yasyāsāvavyāpakaḥ / lokavilakṣaṇavyāpaka iti
GSP33bbdip13u:205_10: vā / 'vyāpakaḥ'; sarvadeśakālavyāpī / ādiḥ kāraṇamanādistacchūnya utpattiśūnya iti
GSP33bbdip13u:205_11: vā / na vidyate viśvaḥ pūrṇo yasmādaviśvaḥ / pūrṇatvādviśvaḥ / yadvā - 'aviśvo';
GSP33bbdip13u:205_14: (kaṭha. 2-20.) iti kaṭhaśrutirgṛhyate / 'te'; asthūlatvādayaḥ / yata iti niścitā
GSP33bbdip13u:205_15: iti śeṣaḥ / asya ataste akṣarasya viṣṇutvaniścāyakā bhavantītyupaskṛtavākyenānvayaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:205_16: nanu tathāpi te viṣṇoreveti kathaṃ, yasmātte 'prākṛtavigrahe madhyamākṣare 'pi santi /
GSP33bbdip13u:205_17: naiṣa doṣaḥ - yataste yatra bhagavadapekṣayaiva santi / anyānapekṣā eva dharmāhyatra
GSP33bbdip13u:210_0: [BBsBhDīp_1,3.3.15] nanu laukikaparimāṇādirāhityaṃ kathaṃ viṣṇoryuktaṃ, loke sarvapadārthānāṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:210_1: prākṛtaparimāṇasyaiva darśanādityata āha - asthūleti // 'asau puruṣottamaḥ'; bhagavān
GSP33bbdip13u:210_3: evaṃ 'aviśvo viśvaśca'; lokabahirbhūto lokāntargataśca bhavati / tathā viruddhadharmarūpaśca
GSP33bbdip13u:210_4: bhavati / loke parasparaṃ viruddhāḥ sthūlatvāṇutvādayo dharmāḥ svarūpabhūtā yasya
GSP33bbdip13u:210_5: saḥ tathoktaḥ / kathamityato ghaṭakamāha - aiśvaryāditi // acintyaiśvaryasāmarthyādityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:210_7: ityasya uktatvāt yuktā ityadhyāhāreṇa te dharmāḥ viṣṇoryuktā eveti pūrvavākyenānvayaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:214_1: śrutyādisaṅgatiṃ viṣayavākyamudāhṛsya viṣayādikaṃ ca sūcayati - saditi // 'ityādinā';
GSP33bbdip13u:214_3: 6-2-3.) sanmūlāḥ somyemāḥ, (chāṃ. 6-8-6.) satā somya tadā sampanno bhavati'; (chāṃ.
GSP33bbdip13u:214_4: 6-8-1) ityādikaṃ gṛhyate / taccetyataḥ tadityākṛṣyate / tathā ca ityādinā sataḥ 'tat';
GSP33bbdip13u:214_6: ca 'ucyate'; pratipādyate iti yojanā / anena janmādhikaraṇoktakāraṇatvasya viṣṇvanyasmin
GSP33bbdip13u:214_7: pradhāne ākṣepāttenāsya ākṣepikī saṅgatiruktā bhavati / tathā viṣayavākyam, sadākhyo
GSP33bbdip13u:214_9: śvetaketho 'idam'; asya jagataḥ 'agre'; tatsṛṣṭeḥ pūrvaṃ pralaye sacchabdoktaṃ brahmaivāsīt
GSP33bbdip13u:214_11: sarvottamam / prajāḥ 'sanmūlāḥ'; sadbrahmaiva mūlaṃ yāsāṃ tāstathoktāḥ / 'tadā';
GSP33bbdip13u:214_12: suptau satā sampanno bhavati supta iti siddhānte śrutyarthaḥ / brahmalakṣaṇābhidhāyakānekavākyasaṅgrahakādiśabdaprayogena
GSP33bbdip13u:214_14: śaṅkā nirastā bhavati / atra prakaraṇe śrutānāṃ brahmalakṣaṇānāṃ pradhāne 'sambhavena
GSP33bbdip13u:215: [BBsBh_1,3.4.2] tacca sat 'bahu syāṃ prajāyeya'; (chāṃ. 6-2-3.) iti pariṇāmapratīterna viṣṇuḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:216_0: [BBsBhDīp_1,3.4.2] sayuktikaṃ pūrvapakṣayati - tacceti // ca śabdaḥ pradhānamiti
GSP33bbdip13u:216_1: padākarṣako 'vadhāraṇe ca / tadityāvṛttaṃ vipariṇamyate / tathā ca 'tat'; chāndogye
GSP33bbdip13u:216_2: śrutaṃ satpradhānameva bhavet, na tu viṣṇuḥ / kutaḥ ? 'tasya'; sato 'bahu syām';
GSP33bbdip13u:216_4: prajanayeyaṃ jagatsṛjāni / tadarthaṃ 'bahu syām'; niyāmakabahurūpī bhaveyamiti /
GSP33bbdip13u:217: [BBsBh_1,3.4.3] sa hi 'avikārassadā śuddho nitya ātmā sadā hariḥ';
GSP33bbdip13u:219_0: [BBsBhDīp_1,3.4.3] vikāritvapratītāvapi kuto 'yaṃ na viṣṇurityata āha - sa hīti //
GSP33bbdip13u:219_2: tattvena niścitastasmāt tadasambhavāt pradhāne ca tatsambhavāt atra ca vikārapratīteḥ
GSP33bbdip13u:219_3: tatsat na viṣṇuḥ, kintu pradhānameveti yojanā / śrutau dvitīyasya sadāśabdasya sadāvikāra
GSP33bbdip13u:219_4: ityanvayaḥ / ādyasya tu sadā 'śuddho'; nirmala iti /
GSP33bbdip13u:225_0: [BBsBhDīp_1,3.4.4] siddhāntayatsūtramavatārya vyācaṣṭe - ata iti // sūtroktaṃ vyapadeśaṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:225_1: darśayati - taditir / ikṣatīti dhātunirdeśena tadarthekṣaṇakriyā lakṣyater / ikṣatikarmeti
GSP33bbdip13u:225_2: sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ tatkartṛtvaparam / tathā ca 'tadaikṣata'; iti śrutāvīkṣaṇākhyavyāpāre
GSP33bbdip13u:225_3: kartṛtvokterityarthaḥ / yadvā karmaśabdena sṛṣṭyādikriyocyate / tathātve vaiyadhikaraṇyarm /
GSP33bbdip13u:225_5: 'pi 'eko nārāyaṇa āsītsamunirbhūtvā'; () ityādisamākhyāmapi pramāṇīkartuṃ sa ityuktam /
GSP33bbdip13u:225_6: tadanūdya viṣṇuriti vyākhyātam / viṣṇurevetyanvayaḥ / eveti tu śabdārthaḥ / anena
GSP33bbdip13u:225_8: - atreti / 'sadeva'; ityādisthāna ityarthaḥ / sacchabdeneti pradhānamiti sādhyavākyārthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:225_9: anena atra sadevetyādisthāne sacchabdenocyamānaḥ sa viṣṇureva, na pradhānam / kutarḥ
GSP33bbdip13u:225_11: śravaṇājjaḍaprakṛtau ca tadasambhavāditi sūtrārtha ukto bhavati / sūtre sacchabdeneti
GSP33bbdip13u:225_12: śeṣaṃ vinā sa ityasyāvṛttiḥ, tatraikasya pratīkagrahaṇārthatvamiti pakṣer ikṣatikarmavyapadeśāt
GSP33bbdip13u:228_1: iha hetutvenābhimataṃ mukhyekṣaṇaṃ na sambhavati, kimu jaḍasyetyāśayena tatra pramāṇamāha
GSP33bbdip13u:228_2: - neti // 'ato'; brahmaṇaḥ sakāśāt 'anyaḥ'; svātantryeṇa draṣṭā draṣṭṛ ca nāstīti
GSP33bbdip13u:228_4: 'tasya'; viṣṇoreva / hi śabdaḥ prasiddhau / svātantryeṇekṣaṇakartṛtvalakṣaṇaṃ liṅgaṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:228_5: uktamiti śeṣaḥ / asya tasmānna liṅgasya anyagāmitvaṃ mantavyamityupaskṛtavākyenānvayaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:231_1: vyākhyeyaḥ / 'sattvātsañjāyate jñānam'; iti smaraṇāt jñānopādānatayā siddhe pradhāne
GSP33bbdip13u:231_2: tatkartṛtvāsambhavena tatra tasyāmukhyatvādityata āha - bahutvaṃ ceti // castvarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:231_4: tathā ca bahutvasya sāvakāśatvāt na tadbalenar ikṣatergauṇatvaṃ kalpanīyamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:231_5: yadvā - 'bahutvaṃ'; 'bahu syām'; iti bahubhāvavacanaṃ ca 'uktaṃ'; vyākhyātam / tathā
GSP33bbdip13u:231_6: ca ityevamādipramāṇavākyena 'bahu syām'; iti bahubhāvavacanam 'avikāreṇa'; vikāraṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:231_7: vinaiva niyāmakasvarūpabahutvenaiva mukhyapratipādyenaiva yuktamityuktam iti yojanā /
GSP33bbdip13u:231_9: ityuktaṃ bhavati / na caivaṃ niyāmakasvarūpabahubhāvasaṅkalpānantaraṃ niyamyasṛṣṭirayukteti
GSP33bbdip13u:235: brahmapure daharaṃ puṇḍarīkaṃ veśma daharo 'sminnantara ākāśaḥ ..... kiṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:237: 'ubhe asmin dyāvāpṛthivī antareva samāhite ubhāvagniśca vāyuśca
GSP33bbdip13u:240_1: vā sāmānyato hṛtpadmasthatvaliṅgasya brahmaṇi samanvayaḥ kriyate / śrutyādisaṅgatiṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:240_2: viṣayavākyamudāhṛtya viṣayādikaṃ ca sūcayan sayuktikaṃ pūrvapakṣayati - candreti //
GSP33bbdip13u:240_3: 'etasya vā akṣarasya'; (bṛ. 5-8-9.) ityādineti vartate / ādipadena dyāvāpṛthivyādikaṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:240_4: gṛhyate / tataḥ kimityata āha - tacceti // tadityāvartate / caḥ samuccaye 'vadhāraṇe
GSP33bbdip13u:240_5: ca / tathā ca 'tatra'; chandogaśrutau yadakṣaranayodāhṛtavākyoktaṃ candrādityādhāratvaṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:240_6: tadeva tathā tatsamānādhikaraṇaṃ hṛtpadmasthatvaṃ ca ākāśasya 'atha'; ityādinā vākyena
GSP33bbdip13u:241_2: yadvā - atra bhāṣye 'pi candrādityapade rudrabrahmapare / ata eva tattvapradīpe akṣaranaye
GSP33bbdip13u:241_3: 'ahaṃ somam'; (ṛ. 10-125-2.) iti vacane somaśabdo rudraparatayā vyākṛtaḥ / tathā
GSP33bbdip13u:241_4: ca na ko 'pi virodhaḥ / anenākṣaranayoktacandrādityādyādhāratvasya sākṣāt hṛtpadmasthākāśaniṣṭhatākṣepāttena
GSP33bbdip13u:241_6: sākṣādvyavadhānena vā sāmānyato hṛtpadmasthatvarūpo viṣayaśca darśitaḥ / na caivaṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:241_7: 'candrāditya'; iti bhāṣyeṇa sa candrādityādyādhāraḥ kiṃ daharākāśaḥ syāt? āhosvittatsthaḥ
GSP33bbdip13u:241_8: kaścit? iti tattvapradīpena ca virodha iti vācyam / tayorakṣarādhikaraṇākṣepeṇa atra
GSP33bbdip13u:241_10: ityanena prasiddhabhūtākāśasyaiva sarvādhāratayā sākṣāt hṛtpadmasthatvamiti pūrvaḥ
GSP33bbdip13u:241_11: pakṣaḥ pradarśitaḥ / tathā praśnaprativacanapūrvakaṃ sākṣādākāśasyaivātra sarvādhāratayā
GSP33bbdip13u:241_12: hṛtpadmasthatvakathanāditi pūrvapakṣayuktiśca pradarśitā bhavati / atra yadyapi 'atha
GSP33bbdip13u:241_13: yadidamasmin brahmapure daharaṃ puṇḍarīkaṃ veśma daharo 'sminnantarākāśaḥ tasmin
GSP33bbdip13u:241_14: yadantastadanveṣṭavyaṃ tadvāva vijijñāsitavyamiti / taṃ cadbrūyuḥ...... kiṃ tadatra
GSP33bbdip13u:241_15: vidyate yadanveṣṭavyaṃ yadvā va vijijñāsitavyamiti / sa brūyādyāvānvāyamākāśastāvāneṣo
GSP33bbdip13u:241_16: 'ntarhṛdaya ākāśaḥ / ubhe asmin dyāvāpṛthivī antareva samāhite / ubhāvagniśca vāyuśca
GSP33bbdip13u:241_20: nivāsasthānamiti brahmaiva pūrṇatvātpuramiti ca dvedhā vyākhyeyam / 'antarhṛdaye';
GSP33bbdip13u:241_21: iti saptamyantam / 'ākāśaḥ'; iti prathamāntam / tathā ca etasmin brahmapure śarīre
GSP33bbdip13u:241_23: abjaṃ 'veśma'; tasya sadmarūpamasti asmin 'antardaharaḥ'; alpo bhūtākāśo 'sti / kiṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:241_25: nanu na ghaṭādivadanveṣaṇaṃ yuktam, apratyakṣatvādityatastadeva vivṛṇoti - tadvāveti //
GSP33bbdip13u:241_26: vāvetyavadhāraṇe / tathā ca tadeva 'vijijñāsitavyaṃ'; vicāritavyam / iti guruṇokte
GSP33bbdip13u:241_27: 'taṃ'; guruṃ prati 'cet'; yadi śiṣyāḥ 'brūyuḥ'; pṛccheyuḥ / kimiti? 'atra'; bhūtākāśe
GSP33bbdip13u:241_29: ceti / na ca brahmapure brahmaṇo veśmetyuktyaivākāśasya brahmatvaniścayātpraśnāyoga
GSP33bbdip13u:242_0: kimiti? hṛdo 'ntaḥ antarhṛt tasminnayate 'stīti vyutpattyā 'antarhṛdaye'; tacchabdabodhye
GSP33bbdip13u:242_2: nanvaṇau tasmin kathaṃ dyāvāpṛthivyādyavasthitirityatastasya vyāptatvamāha - yāvāniti //
GSP33bbdip13u:242_3: 'ayaṃ'; bahiḥsthitaḥ 'ākāśaḥ'; tadākhyo bhagavān guṇataḥ parimāṇataśca yāvān eṣa
GSP33bbdip13u:242_4: āntaro 'pi tāvāneva / tathā cāṇāvapi rūper iśaśaktyā mahattvasyāpi sattvādvyāptasya
GSP33bbdip13u:243_0: anyaparityāgenāsyaiva jijñāsyatve ko heturityato 'sya sarvādhāratvākhyaṃ mahimānamāha
GSP33bbdip13u:243_1: - ubha ityādinā // asminnantare ye ubhe muktāmukte dyāvāpṛthivyau devyau 'samāhite';
GSP33bbdip13u:243_2: samavasthite / evamubhayavidhau agniśca vāyuścetyetau devau samāśritau / tathā ubhau
GSP33bbdip13u:243_3: muktāmuktau sūryācandramasau vidyut nakṣatrāṇi ca samāśritānīti chāndogyabhāṣyarītyā
GSP33bbdip13u:243_4: śrutyarthaḥ / nyāyavivaraṇe tadvivaraṇarūpaṭīkāyāṃ - 'tasmin yadantaḥ'; ityatra hṛtpadmasthākāśagataṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:243_5: brahmānveṣṭavyamityuktam / na ca padmasthasya brahmatvāsiddhiḥ / śarīrapuṇḍarīkayorbrahma
GSP33bbdip13u:243_6: prati puratvaveśmatvoktyaiva anveṣṭavyasya brahmatvasiddheḥ / tathā ca padme brahmāstītyukte
GSP33bbdip13u:243_7: 'pi tadbrahma kiṃ prakāramiti bhāvena punaḥ 'kiṃ tadatra vidyate'; iti pṛṣṭe tatprakārajñāpanāya
GSP33bbdip13u:243_8: 'yāvān'; ityādyāha guruḥ / anena ca yadbrahmānveṣṭavyatayoktaṃ tadbrahmāntarhṛdaye
GSP33bbdip13u:243_9: yāvāneṣa prasiddhākāśastāvān sarvo 'pyākāśo vartate / tasmiṃścākāśe pṛthivyādikaṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:243_11: ukto bhavatīti prakārāntareṇa vyākhyātam / pūrvapakṣī tu - 'hṛdaya ākāśe'; iti padaṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:243_12: saptamyantaṃ kṛtvā daharākāśastho vyāptākāśo 'nveṣṭavya iti vā ākāśaḥ iti prathamāntaṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:243_13: kṛtvā prāguktadaharabhūtākāśamanūdya yāvānityanena bāhyākāśatulyatayā taṃ viśiṣya
GSP33bbdip13u:244: [BBsBh_1,3.5.2] sa cākāśo na viṣṇuḥ / 'tasyānte suṣiraṃ sūkṣmaṃ tasmin
GSP33bbdip13u:246_1: 'ākāśastalliṅgāt'; iti nyāyena viṣṇutvena viṣṇoreva hṛtpadmasthvaṃ sidhyatītyata
GSP33bbdip13u:246_2: āha - sa ceti // castvarthaḥ, pratijñāsamuccaye vā / tathā ca yassarvādāratayā hṛtpadmasthatvena
GSP33bbdip13u:246_3: ca śrutyuktaḥ 'sa cākāśo na viṣṇuḥ'; bhūtameva na tu viṣṇurityarthaḥ / kuto vā na
GSP33bbdip13u:246_4: viṣṇurityata āha - tasyānta iti / sa cetyanuṣaktaścaśabdo 'tra buddhyā viviktasuṣirapadenānvīyate
GSP33bbdip13u:246_5: 'vadhāraṇe ca ayam / śrutisamānoktyupalakṣakaṃ caitat / tathā ca 'tasyānte'; iti
GSP33bbdip13u:246_8: hṛdayaṃ cāpyadhomukham'; iti pūrvavākye prakṛtasya hṛtpadmakośasya 'ante'; antare
GSP33bbdip13u:246_9: tanmadhye sūkṣmaṃ 'suṣiraṃ'; chidramasti, tasmin 'sarvaṃ'; jagatpratiṣṭhitamiti taittirīyaśrutyarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:252: sa vijijñāsitavyaḥ'; (chāṃ 8-7-3.) ityādibhya uttarebhyo guṇebhyo dahare viṣṇureva /
GSP33bbdip13u:253_2: iti śeṣaḥ / ityādyuttaravākyebhya iti paryavasitārthaḥ / yadvā 'guṇebhyo'; guṇavacanebhya
GSP33bbdip13u:253_4: 'pipāsaḥ satyakāmaḥ satyasaṅkalpaḥ so 'nveṣṭavyaḥ sa vijijñāsitavyaḥ'; ityādikaṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:253_6: bhavati / 'dahare'; hṛtpadmagatālpākāśe ityanena sūtre 'dahare'; iti saptapyantaṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:253_7: padaṃ, na paramata iva prathamāntamityuktaṃ bhavati / sthito 'nveṣṭavyatayokta iti
GSP33bbdip13u:253_9: anena - 'yaḥ'; iti daharavākyāduttaravākye śrutebhyo guṇebhyo 'dahare'; vijijñāsyatayoktaḥ
GSP33bbdip13u:253_10: 'tattu'; viṣṇureva na bhūtākāśādiriti sūtrārtha ukto bhavati / yo hṛtpadmākāśagataḥ
GSP33bbdip13u:253_11: paramātmā 'na vadhenāsya hanyate'; (chāṃ. 8-1-5.) iti prāk śarīrasya nāśenāvadhyatvenoktaḥ
GSP33bbdip13u:253_12: saḥ 'apahatapāpmā'; nityameva svato 'pahatapāpmā pāpātyantābhāvavāniti yāvat / ata
GSP33bbdip13u:253_13: eva na tatkāryaṃ jarādikamasyetyucyate - vijara ityādinā / 'avijighatsaḥ'; bubhukṣārahitaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:253_15: pramāṇabādhitatvāt / kintu tatpīḍābhāvaḥ / atra hetuḥ - satyakāma iti / tasya yadiṣṭaṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:253_16: tatsvataḥ eva bhavediti satyakāmaḥ / tatrāpi hetuḥ - 'satyasaṅkalpaḥ'; apratihatasaṅkalpa
GSP33bbdip13u:253_17: iti / ya evaṃ bhūtaḥ so 'nveṣṭavya iti śrutyarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:255: 'sa eṣa sarvebhyaḥ pāpmabhya uditaḥ'; (chāṃ. 1-6-7.) ityādinā viṣṇoreva hi te guṇāḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:256_1: āha - ya iti // bṛhadāraṇyakaśrutiriyam / 'aśanāyā'; aśanecchā / 'pipāsā'; pānecchā /
GSP33bbdip13u:256_2: te 'atyeti'; atikramya vartate / yaśca 'śokaṃ'; duḥkhaṃ 'mohaṃ'; mūrchāṃ 'jarāṃ';
GSP33bbdip13u:256_3: maraṇaṃ cāpyetītyarthaḥ / atratyasya yacchabdasya 'tamātmānaṃ viditvā'; iti tacchrutisthatacchabdenānvayaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:256_4: 'sa eṣaḥ'; iti chandogaśrutiḥ / 'sa eṣaḥ'; paramātmā 'pāpmabhyaḥ'; pāpebhyaḥ 'uditaḥ';
GSP33bbdip13u:256_5: nityaṃ svata evodgataḥ pāparahita ityarthaḥ / 'ityādinā'; vākyena ādiśabdena satyakāmatvādiguṇāntarabodhakavākyāni
GSP33bbdip13u:256_6: gṛhyante / hi śabdo yata ityarthe / te apahatapāpmatvādirūpottaravākyoktāḥ siddhā
GSP33bbdip13u:256_7: iti śeṣaḥ / tasmānna teṣāṃ viṣṇuliṅgatvaniścayaḥ iti vākyaśeṣeṇāsyānvayaḥ / anyatra
GSP33bbdip13u:256_8: pāpādyabhāvasya kathañcidyoge 'pi sarvathā satyakāmatvādikaṃ na yujyata iti jñāpanāyādiśabdabahuvacanayoḥ
GSP33bbdip13u:259_0: [BBsBhDīp_1,3.5.5] tathāpi naite guṇā viṣṇoreva, ramādiṣvapi sambhavādityata āha
GSP33bbdip13u:259_1: - nityeti // 'svataḥ'; anyānapekṣayā nityaṃ tīrṇā aśanāyādayo yena sa harireka eva,
GSP33bbdip13u:259_3: 'tatprasādāt'; tasya hareranugrahādeva 'taranti'; atiyanti, na svata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:259_4: hi śabdaḥ prasiddhau / 'pādme'; uktamiti śeṣaḥ / ato nirapekṣaguṇānāmanyatrābhāvāt
GSP33bbdip13u:261_1: kathañcitsattvādanyagataistaiḥ kathaṃ viṣṇutvaniścaya ityata āha - sāpekṣeti // 'sāpekṣam';
GSP33bbdip13u:261_2: anyādhīnaṃ 'nirapekṣam'; anyānadhīnaṃ tayormadhye ityarthaḥ / co 'vadhāraṇe, nirapekṣameveti
GSP33bbdip13u:261_4: liṅgatveneti śeṣaḥ / tathā ca vivakṣitaliṅgasyānyatrābhāvāttena viṣṇutvaniścayo bhavatyeveti
GSP33bbdip13u:264_1: sākṣādvābhimānidvārā vā yathākathañcidvṛttāvapi na kathañcidanyatra satyakāmatvādyastīti
GSP33bbdip13u:264_2: yuktastena viṣṇutvaniścaya ityāha - satyakāma iti // 'avyayam'; akṣīṇakāmamamoghakāmaṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:264_3: satyakāmaṃ viṣṇum 'ṛte'; vinā 'paro 'nyaḥ'; viṣṇoranyaḥ satyakāmaḥ satyasaṅkalpaśca
GSP33bbdip13u:264_4: nāsti / viṣṇau tadbhāvasya tadanyasmin tadabhāvasya ca pratipādanāya vakroktiḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:264_7: svataḥ parādhīnaṃ ceti yathā dvividhaṃ, na tathā satyakāmatvaṃ kiṃ tvekavidhaṃ, tacca
GSP33bbdip13u:264_8: mukhyaṃ viṣṇāveva, anyatra tu pāribhāṣikamiti bhāvaḥ / 'skānde'; uktamiti śeṣaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:264_9: ataḥ satyakāmatvādivivakṣayā viṣṇoreva hi te guṇā ityuktaṃ yuktamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:266: gatiśabdābhyāṃ tathā hi dṛṣṭaṃ liṅgaṃ ca | BBs_1,3.15 |
GSP33bbdip13u:270_1: śrutyudāharaṇapūrvakaṃ vyācaṣṭe - gatīti // 'imāḥ'; suptāḥ prajāḥ 'aharahaḥ'; pratidinametaṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:270_3: taddvārā tatratyaṃ brahma sākṣāllokapadoktaṃ brahmākhyamāśrayaṃ vā 'na vindanti';
GSP33bbdip13u:270_4: na vijānanti, sa eṣa ātmā hṛdīti śrutyarathaḥ / itīti / iti chandogavākye 'suptasya';
GSP33bbdip13u:270_5: cetanasya 'tadgatiḥ'; aharaho hṛdgataṃ brahmalokaṃ prati gatiḥ prāptiḥ 'ucyate';
GSP33bbdip13u:270_6: vyapadiśyata ityarthaḥ / 'brahmaśabdaḥ'; ityatrāpi taditi padaṃ buddhyā vivicya vipariṇāmena
GSP33bbdip13u:270_7: sambadhyate / tathā ca tasmin prāpyamāṇe hṛdgate brahmaloke 'brahmaśabdaḥ'; 'ucyate';
GSP33bbdip13u:270_8: śrūyate ityarthaḥ / ucyate ca ityapi sambandhaḥ / caḥ samuccaye / yata iti śeṣaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:273_2: saṅgato bhavatītyarthaḥ / uddālakavākyametat / śruteriti pañcamī / 'taṃ'; viṣṇum /
GSP33bbdip13u:273_3: hi śabdaḥ prasiddhau / 'gacchati'; prāpnoti / iti jñāyate iti śeṣaḥ / tathā ca suptaprāpyatvasya
GSP33bbdip13u:273_4: viṣṇuliṅgatvena śrutiprasiddhatvāt tena viṣṇutvaniścayo bhavatīti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:274: [BBsBh_1,3.5.10] 'araśca ha vai ṇyaścārṇavau brahmaloke'; (chāṃ 8-5-3.) iti liṅgaṃ ca tathā dṛṣṭam /
GSP33bbdip13u:275_0: [BBsBhDīp_1,3.5.10] 'liṅgaṃ ca tathā hi dṛṣṭam'; iti sūtraśeṣaṃ hetvantaraparatayā
GSP33bbdip13u:275_1: vyācaṣṭe - araśceti // ca śabdo hetusamuccaye / yathā suptagamyatvam 'aharahaḥ';
GSP33bbdip13u:275_3: liṅgamapi 'araśca'; iti śrutau hṛtpadmasthe dṛṣṭaṃ śrutamiti / upamāyāṃ tathāśabdaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:275_4: anenāsiddhiḥ parihṛtā / na ca gatiśabdayorivāsya sannidhau hṛtpadmasthasyānukterasiddhyanivṛttiriti
GSP33bbdip13u:275_5: vācyam / hṛtpadmasthasya brahmaṇa āvāsatvena nimittena tallokabhūte hṛtpadme 'etaṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:275_8: yata iti śeṣaḥ / asyāto 'pi dahare viṣṇureveti pratijñāvākyenānvayaḥ / śrutau havā
GSP33bbdip13u:275_9: iti nipātau prasiddhidyotakau / samudrayoranyonyasamuccaye ca śabdau / tathā ca brahmaṇo
GSP33bbdip13u:275_10: viṣṇorloke śvetadvīpe araṇyākhyārṇavau sudhāsamudrau arṇavopame sudhāsarasī vā sta
GSP33bbdip13u:276: [BBsBh_1,3.5.11] araśca vaiṇyaśca sudhāsamudrau tatraiva sarvābhimatapradau dvau /
GSP33bbdip13u:278_2: sautrahiśabdābhipretāṃ smṛtiṃ darśayati - araśceti // vaiśabdaḥ prasiddhau / caśabdau
GSP33bbdip13u:278_4: sarveṣṭakarau sta ityarthaḥ / evakāro 'nyatra sattvavyāvartakaḥ / tenāraṇyāśrayalokavattvaliṅgasya
GSP33bbdip13u:278_5: viṣṇutvenāvyabhicāraḥ siddhyati / ata eva bhāṣye tasyaivetyevakāraḥ / 'ityādinā';
GSP33bbdip13u:278_8: tasmādetalliṅgabalāt viṣṇutvaniśrayo yukta iti vākyaśeṣaḥ / yadvā - brahmalokamiti
GSP33bbdip13u:278_9: hṛtpadmasya viṣṇulokatvokteḥ tadantargato viṣṇurityuktaṃ, brahmalokapadaṃ kuto viṣṇulokavācītyata
GSP33bbdip13u:278_10: āha - araśceti / brahmalokapadasya viṣṇuloke 'araśca'; iti vākye prayogādatra hṛtpadme
GSP33bbdip13u:278_11: prayuktam 'etaṃ brahmalokam'; iti padamapi viṣṇulokaparameva / na ca 'araśca'; iti
GSP33bbdip13u:278_12: śrutāvapi brahmalokapadaṃ kuto viṣṇulokaparamiti vācyam / yatastatrāraṇyāśrayatvaliṅgaṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:278_13: śrutamityarthaḥ / athāpyaraṇyāśrayatvasya bhagavallokaliṅgatvaṃ kuta ityata āha -
GSP33bbdip13u:278_14: araśceti // asmin pakṣe sautraṃ liṅgapadaṃ hṛtpadmasthasya brahmatvarūpapradānasādhye
GSP33bbdip13u:278_17: liṅgaṃ ceti pṛthaguktiryuktā / anena - na kevalamuttarebhyo guṇebhyaḥ, kintu gatiśabdābhyāṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:278_18: ca 'aharahaḥ'; iti vākye hṛtpadmasthaniṣṭhatayā śrutābhyāṃ suptaprāpyabrahmaśabdābhyāṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:278_19: ca dahare viṣṇureveti jñāyate / na kevalametābhyāmeva, kintu yataḥ 'araśca'; iti
GSP33bbdip13u:278_21: liṅgaṃ hṛtpadmasthe viṣṇuloke prayuktabrahmalokapadasya hṛtpadme prayogāt 'dṛṣṭaṃ';
GSP33bbdip13u:278_22: śrutamato 'pi dahare viṣṇureva / yadvā - kuto 'tra prayuktasya brahmalokapadasya
GSP33bbdip13u:278_23: viṣṇulokaparatvam? 'araśca'; iti vākye viṣṇuloke brahmalokapadaprayogāt / atrāpi
GSP33bbdip13u:278_24: 'etaṃ brahmalokam'; iti tasyaiva prayogāt / na ca tatrāpi viṣṇulokaparatvaṃ kutaḥ?
GSP33bbdip13u:278_25: yato 'raṇyāśrayatvaṃ liṅgaṃ 'dṛṣṭaṃ'; śrutamata iti sūtrārtha ukto bhavati /
GSP33bbdip13u:283_1: vyācaṣṭe - dhṛteriti // 'iti dhṛteḥ'; ityasya 'asminnasya'; iti padānuvartanenetyasminvākye
GSP33bbdip13u:283_3: pratijñāvākyenānvayaḥ / śrutau vidhṛtiḥ seturityanvayaḥ / tatra vidhṛtirityetatsetutve
GSP33bbdip13u:283_4: hetuḥ / tathā ca ya ātmā hṛtpadmasthatvenoktaḥ sa eṣa 'eṣāṃ'; bhūrādilokānām 'asambhedāya';
GSP33bbdip13u:283_6: dhāraṇapoṣaṇasamartho 'ta eva seturiva 'setuḥ'; āśraya ityarthaḥ / dhārakatvaṃ ca
GSP33bbdip13u:283_8: ityukteḥ mukhyārtha eva vā setuśabdaḥ / yadyapi 'sa seturvidhṛtiḥ'; iti chandogaśrutipāṭhaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:285_1: dhṛteścetyaṃśaṃ vyākhyāyedānīṃ samagraṃ sūtraṃ samānoktirūpasamākhyāparatayā vyācaṣṭe
GSP33bbdip13u:285_2: - eṣa iti // dhṛteritipadamatrānuṣajyate / asmin pakṣe sautracaśbada upalabdheścetyanveti /
GSP33bbdip13u:285_3: tathā ca na kevalaṃ dhṛterliṅgāt, kintu 'dhṛteḥ'; dhṛtiyuktāyāstadbodhikāyā upalabdheḥ
GSP33bbdip13u:285_4: vāsaneyake 'ya eṣo 'ntarhṛdaya ākāśastasmin śete sarvasya vaśī'; (bṛ. 6-4-21.) ityādyuktvā
GSP33bbdip13u:285_5: āmnātāyāḥ 'eṣa sarveśvara eṣa bhūtādhipatireṣa bhūtapāla eṣa seturvidharaṇa eṣāṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:285_6: lokānāmasambhedāya'; ityukteḥ samānokteśca dahare viṣṇureveti yojanā / samākhyāyāḥ
GSP33bbdip13u:285_7: kuto viṣṇuparatvamityata āha - eṣa iti / ityādīti luptatṛtīyāvibhaktiko nirdeśaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:285_8: ādiśabdena 'eṣa sarvasya vaśī eṣa sarvasyādhipatireṣa sarveśvaraḥ'; (bṛ. 6-4-21.)
GSP33bbdip13u:285_9: iti pūrvavākyam 'eṣa seturvidharaṇa eṣāṃ lokānāmasambhedāya'; ityuttaravākyaṃ ca
GSP33bbdip13u:285_10: gṛhyate / ata eva madhyasthavākyagrahaṇaṃ kṛtam / asya mahimna iti vyadhikaraṇaṣaṣṭhyau /
GSP33bbdip13u:285_13: vastuni 'upalabdheḥ'; uktatvāditi yojanā / ya eṣa sarvasyādhipatiḥ, yaścaiṣa sarveśvaro,
GSP33bbdip13u:285_15: bhūta eva pālako, yaśca 'eṣāṃ'; bhūrādilokānām 'asambhedāya'; amelanāya eṣāṃ 'vidharaṇaḥ';
GSP33bbdip13u:285_16: vidhāraṇasamarthaḥ, na kevalaṃ sāmarthyamātraṃ, kintu ya eṣāṃ lokānāṃ 'setuḥ'; āśrayaśca,
GSP33bbdip13u:285_17: tametaṃ bhagavantaṃ brāhmaṇā vividiṣantīti śrutyarthaḥ / anena - na kevalaṃ pūrvoktahetubhyaḥ,
GSP33bbdip13u:285_18: kintu vidhṛteścāsmin prakaraṇe 'sa seturvidhṛtiḥ'; iti sarvādhāratvaliṅgaśravaṇādapi
GSP33bbdip13u:285_19: daharapadmastho viṣṇureva / na cāsya hṛtpadmasthatvaṃ kuta iti vācyam / 'asya'; hṛtpadmasthasya
GSP33bbdip13u:285_21: (chāṃ.8-4-1.) ityanena 'upalabdheḥ'; uktatvāt / na kevalaṃ dhṛterliṅgāt, kintu dhṛterdhṛtiyuktāyā
GSP33bbdip13u:285_22: upalabdherukteḥ / 'ya eṣo 'ntarhṛdaya ākāśastasmin śete .... eṣa seturvidharaṇaḥ';
GSP33bbdip13u:285_23: iti vājasaneyasamākhyāyāśca dahare viṣṇureva / samākhyāyā api kuto viṣṇuviṣayatvam?
GSP33bbdip13u:285_25: ukto bhavati / yadyapi 'asya mahimnaḥ'; ityādyaṃśo bhāṣye dhṛteścetyasya liṅgaparatayā
GSP33bbdip13u:285_26: yojanāyāṃ nānvitaḥ / tathāpi ṭīkāyāṃ 'sarve pāpmāno 'taḥ'; iti tallakṣaṇokteścetyuktatvāt
GSP33bbdip13u:288_2: - etasminniti // 'etasya vā akṣarasya praśāsane'; iti pratīkagrahaṇena 'etasya vā
GSP33bbdip13u:288_3: akṣarasya praśāsane gārgi sūryācandramasau vidhṛtau tiṣṭhataḥ, etasya vā akṣarasya
GSP33bbdip13u:288_4: praśāsane gārgi dyāvāpṛthivyau'; ityādibahuvākyāni sūcayati / imānyakṣaranaye vyākṛtāni /
GSP33bbdip13u:289: [BBsBh_1,3.5.15] 'sa hi sarvādhipatiḥ sa hi sarvapālaḥ sar iśaḥ sa
GSP33bbdip13u:291_1: ityata āha - sa hīti // 'sa hi'; ityārabhya 'sa viṣṇuḥ'; ityantamekaṃ vākyaṃ śrutyantaragatam /
GSP33bbdip13u:291_2: 'saḥ'; prakṛtaḥ / 'hiḥ'; prasiddhau / 'patiṃ viśvasya'; iti nārāyaṇānuvākasthaṃ vākyam /
GSP33bbdip13u:291_4: ityādīti / evamādiśrutivākyebhya ityarthaḥ / ādiśabdenaitajjātīyaṃ gṛhyate / tṛtīyārthe
GSP33bbdip13u:291_5: pañcamī / 'tasya'; viṣṇoḥ 'hiḥ'; prasiddhau hetau vā / 'eṣa sarveśvaraḥ'; (bṛ.6-4-22.)
GSP33bbdip13u:294_0: [BBsBhDīp_1,3.5.16] nanu sarveśvaratvādikaṃ viṣṇuvadanyasyāpi kiṃ na syādityata āha
GSP33bbdip13u:294_1: - sarveśa iti // atra sarvajagacchabdau cetanācetanaprapañcaparau / yadvā - jagataḥ
GSP33bbdip13u:294_2: patiriti pratiyogitvenaivoktasyānuvādaḥ / athavā - 'patiḥ'; pālakaḥ / tathā ca sarveśvaraḥ
GSP33bbdip13u:294_3: sarvapālakaśca viṣṇureka eva nānyo 'stītyarthaḥ / iti skānda ityasya evakāroktapadādhyāhāreṇa
GSP33bbdip13u:294_4: tasyahyeṣa mahimeti pūrveṇānvayaḥ / tasmānnaitalliṅgānāmanyatra sāvakāśatvaṃ śaṅkyamiti
GSP33bbdip13u:298: 'tatrāpi daharaṃ gaganaṃ viśokastasmin yadantastadupāsitavyam'; (mahānā. 10-7.) iti prasiddheśca //
GSP33bbdip13u:299_1: sādhayatsūtraṃ paṭhitvā vyācaṣṭe - prasiddheśceti // itītyanantaraṃ śrutāviti śeṣaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:299_3: - sūtre 'syāsminnitipadadvayaṃ pūrvasūtrādanuvartanīyam / tathā ca na kevalaṃ vājasaneyasamākhyānāt,
GSP33bbdip13u:299_5: tatsamākhyānādapi daharapadmastho viṣṇureveti sūtrārtha ukto bhavati / 'divye brahmapure
GSP33bbdip13u:299_9: draṣṭavyam / śrutau 'daharaṃ vipāpmaṃ paraveśmabhūtaṃ yatpuṇḍarīkaṃ puramadhyasaṃstham';
GSP33bbdip13u:299_10: (mahānā. 10-7.) iti vākye yat 'daharam'; alpaṃ parasya brahmaṇaḥ sadmabhūtam, ata
GSP33bbdip13u:299_11: eva vigatapāpaṃ dehākhyabrahmapuramadhye saṃsthaṃ hṛdayakamalaṃ prakṛtaṃ tattatreti
GSP33bbdip13u:299_12: parāmṛśyate / tathā ca 'tatrāpi'; puṇḍarīke 'pi yat 'daharam'; alpaṃ gaganamasti
GSP33bbdip13u:299_13: tasmin 'antaḥ'; antare 'viśoko'; viśokaṃ viśokapadopalakṣitaṃ jarādiśūnyaṃ yadbrahma
GSP33bbdip13u:299_14: tadupāsitavyamityarthaḥ / viśokaḥ iti liṅgavyatyayaḥ chāndasaḥ / tattvapradīpe tu
GSP33bbdip13u:301_3: 'pi suṣiraśrutivirodhaḥ / tatra sākṣātsuṣirasya sarvādhāratvokterityata āha - tadantasstheti //
GSP33bbdip13u:301_7: yathā mandirasthamañjūṣāntargatamapi vastu mandirasthamiti saṅgīyate, evamihāpīti
GSP33bbdip13u:301_8: bhāvaḥ / tadantassthatveti pāṭhe paramātmanaḥ suṣirāntassthatvamapekṣya śruteḥ pravṛttatvādityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:307_1: tāvadvyācaṣṭe - itareti // 'niṣpadyate'; ityanantaramityuktasyeti śeṣaḥ / asya ca
GSP33bbdip13u:307_3: siddhāntyabhimatabrahmapratiyogijīvaparam / ata eva śrutāveṣa iti jīvaparāmarśaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:309_1: vyācaṣṭe - neti // hṛtpadmastho na jīva ityarthaḥ / kuto netyatastatrānuvṛttavākyena
GSP33bbdip13u:309_4: muktabhāvamādāya jīve sambhavāt asiddhivārāṇāya - svata iti // svātantryeṇetyarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:309_8: yāvat / dahare sa jīva eva, na viṣṇuriti cet - na hṛtpadmastho jīvaḥ / kutaḥ? asminprakaraṇe
GSP33bbdip13u:309_9: 'syāpahatapāpmatvāderupalabdheḥ śravaṇāt / asya cāsmin jīve svato 'sambhavāditi sūtrārtha
GSP33bbdip13u:315_3: sambhavāditi śeṣaḥ / 'asya'; satyakāmatvasya 'asmin'; jīve pratītestata eva viśokatvādeḥ
GSP33bbdip13u:315_4: 'upalabdheḥ'; siddheruktaguṇānāṃ sambhavāditi tadarthaḥ / jīva ityanena pūrvasūtrātsa
GSP33bbdip13u:315_5: ityasyānuvṛttiḥ sūcitā / neśvarā iti evaśabdārthaḥ / hṛtpadmastha iti vartate /
GSP33bbdip13u:316: [BBsBh_1,3.5.22] na, tatra hi parameśvaraprasādādāvirbhūtasvarūpo mukta ucyate /
GSP33bbdip13u:317_1: jīvasya satyakāmatvādiguṇān sambhāvya hṛtpadmasthatvaṃ vācyamityarthaḥ / kuto netyato
GSP33bbdip13u:317_3: 'sa tatra'; ityuttaravākya ityarthaḥ / tatra 'āvirbhūtasvarūpaḥ'; ucyate iti sambandhaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:317_4: āvirbhūtasvarūpaḥ ityasya vyākhyānaṃ mukta iti / hiśabdo yata ityarthe / uttaravacanādityatrāpi
GSP33bbdip13u:317_6: atra muktasyokteḥ hṛtpadmasya ca dehāntaravṛttitayā muktatvāyogāt nāyaṃ jīva iti
GSP33bbdip13u:317_7: bhāvaḥ / nanvasya muktaviṣayatve 'pi muktasyāpi jīvatve nāstyeva jīve 'pahatapāpmatvādisambhavaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:317_8: na ca tasya hṛtpadmasthatvāyogaḥ, yato jīvo bhāvibhāvenāpahatapāpmatvādiguṇaḥ idānīṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:317_9: hṛtpadmagatatayocyata ityata āha - parameśvaraprasādāditi / evetyanuvartate / anena
GSP33bbdip13u:317_10: tu śabdo vyākhyātaḥ / parameśvaraprasādādityanena uttarādityetaduttamādityapi vyākhyātam /
GSP33bbdip13u:317_11: atra mukta iti na sautrapadavyākhyānamātram / kintūddeśyasamarpakaṃ ca / anena āvṛttistuśabdasya
GSP33bbdip13u:317_12: yathāśrutānvayaśca sūcitaḥ / tathā ca yo 'tra mukta ucyate sa tu parameśvaraprasādādeva
GSP33bbdip13u:317_13: 'āvirbhūtasvarūpaḥ'; āvirbhūto vyaktaḥ svarūpaḥ apahatapāpmatvādiḥ svadharmo yasya
GSP33bbdip13u:317_14: sa tathoktaḥ / ato na svato 'pahatapāpmatvādiguṇakaḥ, ato na daharasthaḥ jīva iti
GSP33bbdip13u:318: [BBsBh_1,3.5.23] yatprasādātsa mukto bhavati sa bhagavān pūrvoktaḥ// 19 //
GSP33bbdip13u:319_2: parameśvarādhīnatvam / atastatsvata evetyata āha - yaditi // asya yacchabdasya dvitīyatacchabdenānvayaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:319_3: prasādo nāma icchāviśeṣaḥ / 'saḥ'; jīvaḥ / punaḥ sa ityuktyā sūtre 'nuvṛttasya sa
GSP33bbdip13u:319_4: ityasyāvṛttiḥ sūcitā / pūrvokta ityanena sūtre uttaratretyasya pratiyogitayā pūrvatretyupaskāryamityuktaṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:319_5: bhavati / tatheti śeṣaḥ / tathā ca 'yatprasādāt'; yasyānugrahāt 'saḥ'; jīvo 'muktaḥ';
GSP33bbdip13u:319_7: iti pūrvavākye 'tathā'; guṇapradātṛtayā ukta iti yojanā / anyathā lyabantapadaṃ vyarthaṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:319_8: syāditi bhāvaḥ / ukta ityanantaraṃ yata iti śeṣaḥ / asyātonātra muktaguṇaprāpteḥ
GSP33bbdip13u:319_11: yaditi / yojanā tu - yatprasādātsa jīvo jaḍadehānmukto bhavati, mukto bhūtvā ca sopahatapāpmatvādiguṇo
GSP33bbdip13u:319_13: tathāpahatapāpmatvādinokto na jīvaḥ / dātṛpratigṛhītrormadhye dātureva mukhyatvānmukhyāmukhyayośca
GSP33bbdip13u:320_3: pratīteḥ, tata evāsya viśokatvādeḥ siddheśca / ata evāsyoktaguṇāsambhavābhāvātsa
GSP33bbdip13u:320_4: hṛtpadmastho jīva eva neśvara iti cet - na, yatastatra 'svena'; ityuttaravākyabalādāvirbhūtasvarūpo
GSP33bbdip13u:320_5: mukta ucyate / sa ca dehānantargatatayā na hṛtpadmastho bhavatīti bhāvaḥ / na ca
GSP33bbdip13u:320_7: punastasya prāptiriti vācyam / yato 'tra vākye yo mukta ucyate sa uttarāduttamātparameśvaraprasādādevāvirbhūtasvarūpo
GSP33bbdip13u:320_8: na svataḥ / na cātra muktasya tadguṇatvamevocyate, na parameśvarādhīnatvaṃ tadguṇajātasyeti
GSP33bbdip13u:320_9: vācyam / yataḥ pūrvatra 'paraṃ jyotiḥ'; iti pūrvavākye yatprasādātsa mukto bhavati
GSP33bbdip13u:320_10: sa paramātmā tathā guṇapradātṛtayocyate / na ca yathākathaṃ cit jīvasyāpahatapāpmatvādiguṇakatvātpunastatprāptiriti
GSP33bbdip13u:320_12: abhivyaktāpahatapāpmatvādiguṇakaḥ sa tu bhagavāneva pūrvatra 'eṣa ātmāpahatapāpmā';
GSP33bbdip13u:320_13: (chāṃ. 8-1-5.) iti pūrvavākye ukto, na muktajīva iti sūtrārtha ukto bhavati / śrutyarthastu
GSP33bbdip13u:320_16: 'abhiniṣpadyate'; abhivyajyate 'sa uttamaḥ puruṣaḥ'; paraṃ jyotirakhyaḥ / muktasya
GSP33bbdip13u:320_18: muktisthāne paramātmānugraheṇaiva 'jakṣan'; svāpekṣitaṃ bhakṣayan hasanvā jñātibhissaha
GSP33bbdip13u:320_19: muktaiḥ ajñātibhiḥ pūrvakalpamuktaiḥ 'krīḍan'; strībhiḥ 'ramamāṇaḥ'; ratiṃ prāpnuvan
GSP33bbdip13u:324: yaṃ prāpya svena rūpeṇa jīvo 'bhiniṣpadyate sa eṣa ātmeti
GSP33bbdip13u:326_0: [BBsBhDīp_1,3.5.24] nanu 'eṣaḥ'; iti jīvaṃ parāmṛśya 'ātmā'; iti tasya hṛtpadmasthātmatvābhidhānādamukhyāpahatapāpmatvādiguṇo
GSP33bbdip13u:326_1: 'pi jīvaḥ etacchabdaparāmarśabalena hṛtpadmasthātmā kiṃ na syādityāśaṅkāṃ pariharatsūtramupanyasya
GSP33bbdip13u:326_3: lābhānnetyuktasādhye hetutayā sūtraṃ vyācaṣṭe - anyeti // śrutau 'paraṃjyotiḥ'; iti
GSP33bbdip13u:326_4: napuṃsakapadanirdiṣṭasya yamiti pulliṅgena nirdeśo liṅgasyāvivakṣitatvādvā viśeṣyaśabdavivakṣayā
GSP33bbdip13u:326_5: vā yuktaḥ / anena śrutau paraṃjyotiriti ekaṃ padam / yadvakṣyati 'paraṃjyotiḥśabdena
GSP33bbdip13u:326_6: paramātmaivocyate'; iti, tacca 'paraṃjyotiḥ paraṃbrahma'; iti paurāṇikarūḍhyā viṣṇuvācītyuktaṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:326_7: bhavati / jyotiḥ prakāśarūpaṃ paraṃ brahmeti bhinne pade ityapi kecit / asmin pakṣe
GSP33bbdip13u:326_8: uktabhāṣyavirodhaḥ / kiṃ ca yaṃ 'paraṃjyotirākhyaṃ bhagavantam'; iti yacchabdavyākhyānaparaṭīkāvirodhaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:326_11: paramātmaivārtho 'bhidheyo yasya sa tathoktaḥ / 'parāmarśaḥ'; etacchabdaḥ / yadvā
GSP33bbdip13u:326_12: - paramātmana evātmatvavidhānamarthaḥ prayojanaṃ yasya sa, tathoktaḥ / tathātve 'parāmarśaḥ';
GSP33bbdip13u:326_13: etacchabdena parigrahaṇamityarthaḥ / sūtrabhāṣyayoścaśabdastu na kevalaṃ jīvapakṣe
GSP33bbdip13u:326_15: samuccayārthastuśabdārtho vā / candrikāyāṃ tu - na kevalaṃ parāmarśasyar iśvarapakṣe
GSP33bbdip13u:326_17: eva ityavadhāraṇārthatayā vyākhyātaḥ / anena - 'itaraparāmarśāt'; itaraṃ jīvaṃ 'eṣaḥ';
GSP33bbdip13u:326_18: iti parāmṛśya tasya hṛtpadmasthatvavidhānātsa hṛtpadmastha ātmā jīva eva neśvara
GSP33bbdip13u:326_19: iti cet - na, kutaḥ? yataḥ 'eṣaḥ'; iti parāmarśaḥ 'anyārthaḥ'; jīvānyeśvarārtha eva,
GSP33bbdip13u:326_20: na jīvārthaḥ, ataḥ / athavā - na kevalamasambhavāt, kintu yataḥ parāmarśo 'nyārtho
GSP33bbdip13u:326_21: 'pi / yadvā - asambhavānna hṛtpadmastho jīvaḥ, kintvīśvara eva / na caivaṃ parāmarśāyogaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:326_22: yataḥ 'parāmarśaḥ'; etacchabdastu anyārtha iti tredhāsūtrārtha ukto bhavati / 'yaṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:326_23: prāpya'; yatsamīpaṃ prāpyeti / anena jīvaḥ paraṃ jyotirākhyaṃ paramātmānamupasampadyāparokṣato
GSP33bbdip13u:326_24: jñātvā atha samīpaṃ prāpyavidyāvidhūnanenānandādinā svena rūpeṇābhiniṣpadyate āvirbhūtasvaguṇo
GSP33bbdip13u:326_25: bhavatīti yāvat / yaṃ prāpya svarūpeṇābhiniṣpadyate jīvaḥ, sa eṣa ātmā ya ātmeti
GSP33bbdip13u:326_26: prāguktaḥ paramātmeti hovāca brahmādīn prati rameti siddhānte śrutyarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:331_2: iti vākyaṃ gṛhyate / alpapadaṃ cālpasthānasthitiparam / śruterityanantaramasambhavādityanuvartate /
GSP33bbdip13u:331_3: asminniti cāsti / tathā ca 'daharaḥ'; iti vākye 'asmin'; daharagate vastunyalpasthānasthitirūpaliṅgaśrutestasyāścāsminparamātmani
GSP33bbdip13u:331_4: 'asambhavāt'; anupapatterityanvayaḥ / asmāddhetorna dahare viṣṇuḥ, kintu sa jīva
GSP33bbdip13u:333_1: neti // nālpasthānasthitiśravaṇaṃ viṣṇāvanupapannamityarthaḥ / kuto netyataḥ pravṛttaṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:333_2: taduktamityaṃśaṃ yata ityadhyāhārābhiprāyeṇa hetutayā vyākhyāti - nicāyyatvāditi /
GSP33bbdip13u:333_3: atrāpīti śeṣaḥ / tathā ca 'nicāyyatvāt'; ityatra sarvagatasyāpi viṣṇorvyomavadalpasthānasthiteruktatvādityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:336_1: tu aṃśo 'pi pūrṇa iti kathaṃ tasyāṃśato 'lpaukastvamityataḥ sūtraśeṣaṃ prakarāntareṇa
GSP33bbdip13u:336_2: vyācaṣṭe - eṣa ma iti // ca śabdo yuktisamuccaye / sūtrakṛcchrutyuktisamuccaye vā /
GSP33bbdip13u:336_3: 'guṇāḥ śrutāḥ'; iti śrutisamuccaye vā / 'yasmin'; iti smṛtisamuccaye vā / anena 'alpaśruteḥ';
GSP33bbdip13u:336_4: 'daharaḥ'; iti vākye sarvagate vastunyalpasthānasthitiśravaṇāt, tasyāśca viṣṇāvasambhavādanupapatterna
GSP33bbdip13u:336_5: dahare viṣṇuḥ, kintu sa jīva eveti cet - na, yataḥ 'taduktaṃ'; tatra nicāyyatvāditi
GSP33bbdip13u:336_7: yuktamityuktam / na cāṃśatopi sarvagatatayā tatra tadanupapattiḥ / yatastasyāṃ 'eṣa
GSP33bbdip13u:336_8: ma ātmā'; (chāṃ. 3-14-3.) iti chandogaśrutau tena sarvajyāyastvena vṛddhatamatvena
GSP33bbdip13u:336_9: vyāptatvenaiva prakāreṇa tasya viṣṇostaddhṛdayasthatvamuktaṃ smṛtyuktaṃ cāta iti
GSP33bbdip13u:336_10: sūtrārtha ukto bhavati / na ca śrutismṛtyuktamapi kathametadaṅgīkārārhaṃ, yuktivirodhāditi
GSP33bbdip13u:336_12: ityādivacanācca / mama hṛdaye ya 'ātmā'; paramātmāsti / upalakṣaṇametat / sarvahṛdaye
GSP33bbdip13u:336_13: ca ya āste eṣaḥ hṛdayasthāṃśarūpo bhagavān 'jyāyān'; vṛddhatamaḥ deśakālaguṇaiḥ pūrṇa
GSP33bbdip13u:336_15: apyaṇutvamahattvādayo dharmāḥ yasmin 'patanti'; vartante ca / na kālabhedenetyāha
GSP33bbdip13u:337_1: yeṣāṃ te tathoktāḥ / jñānajñeyā iti yāvat / harau viruddhadharmasattve pramāṇamāha
GSP33bbdip13u:337_3: siddhā ityarthaḥ / yacchabdasya 'tadbrahmāhaṃ prapadye'; iti uttaravākyagatatacchabdenānvayaḥ) //
GSP33bbdip13u:341: śāśvataṃ netareṣām / tadetaditi manyante 'nirdeśyaṃ paramaṃ sukham'; (kaṭha. 5-12,14.) ityādinā jñānisukhasyāpyanirdeśyatvamajñeyatvaṃ cocyata iti //
GSP33bbdip13u:342_0: [BBsBhDīp_1,3.6.1] atrādhikaraṇe 'kathaṃ nu tadvijānīyām'; iti vākyoktaṃ jñānārthaṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:342_1: jñeyaprārthanāviṣayatvaṃ vā 'kathaṃ nu tadvijānīyāṃ kimu bhāti'; iti brahmajñānānukūlābhivyaktyākhyabhānaprārthanāviṣayatvarūpaṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:342_2: vā ānukūlyena gṛhyamāṇatvaṃ liṅgaṃ brahmaṇi samanvīyate / śrutyādisaṅgatiṃ viṣayādikaṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:342_3: ca sūcayan sayuktikaṃ pūrvapakṣaṃ darśayati - adṛśyatvāditi / 'uktāḥ'; ānandamayādhikaraṇe
GSP33bbdip13u:342_4: udāhṛtādṛśya iti vākye iti bhāvaḥ / uktā ityanantaraṃ tatra praviṣṭamiti śeṣaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:342_5: prathamādipadenāniruktatvādeḥ, dvitīyena 'kathaṃ nu tadvijānīyāṃ kimu bhāti na bhāti
GSP33bbdip13u:342_6: vā'; (kaṭha. 5-14) iti samanvetavyaliṅgabodhakottarārdhasya ca grahaṇam / na kevalaṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:342_7: viṣṇoḥ, kintu jñānisukhasyāpītyaperarthaḥ / evārtho vāpiśabdaḥ ānumānikasūtragatāpipadavat /
GSP33bbdip13u:342_12: ata eva tattvapradīpe teṣāmiti prastutiḥ pūrvapakṣotthāpiketyuktam / tathācetthaṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:342_13: yojanā - pūrvamānandamayādhikaraṇe ye 'dṛśyatvādayo guṇāḥ parameśvarasyoktāḥ / tatra
GSP33bbdip13u:342_14: teṣu praviṣṭamanirdeśyatvamajñeyatvaṃ ca 'teṣāṃ sukham'; iti prakṛtyāmnātena 'tadetat';
GSP33bbdip13u:342_16: jñānisukhasyaivocyata iti / pūrvārdhenānirdeśyatvasyottarārdhe ca 'kimu bhāti na
GSP33bbdip13u:342_18: pāṭhābhyupagamādvā na tadvirodhaḥ / atrānirdeśyatvamajñeyatvaṃ cocyata iti phaloktiḥ,
GSP33bbdip13u:342_19: ānukūlyena gṛhyamāṇatvasyaivātra vicāryatvāt / tattu dvitīyādiśabdopāttavākyena caśabdena
GSP33bbdip13u:342_20: vā sūcitamiti draṣṭavyam / yata evamataḥ pūrvoktamayuktamiti bhāvaḥ / anenānandamayādhikaraṇoktādṛśyatvājñeyatvarūpasyānirdeśyatvāniruktatvarūpasya
GSP33bbdip13u:342_22: saṅgatiruktā bhavati / tathā caśabdasūcitamānukūlyena gṛhyamāṇatvaṃ viṣayaḥ / viṣṇoranyasya
GSP33bbdip13u:342_23: veti sandehaḥ / jñānisukhasyaiveti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ / anirdeśyatvājñeyatve ca tasyaiveti
GSP33bbdip13u:347: 'tameva bhāntamanubhāti sarvam'; ityanukṛteḥ, 'tasya bhāsā sarvamidaṃ vibhāti'; (kaṭha. 5-15.) iti vacanācca paramātmaiva
GSP33bbdip13u:349_1: ityanubhānaśruterityarthaḥ / anubhānaṃ nāma tadicchānurodhena bhānaṃ kriyāviśeṣaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:349_3: gṛhyamāṇasya tatkartuḥ sūryāditejasaśca lābho bhavatīti spaṣṭatvāttadubhayānuktiḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:349_5: tadubhayānuktiḥ / na kevalaṃ tasyetyetat samanvetavyānukūlyena gṛhyamāṇatvākhyaliṅgadharmiṇaḥ,
GSP33bbdip13u:349_7: cetyāśayena taddhetvantaraparatayā vyācaṣṭe - tasyeti / 'iti vacanāt'; ityanena sūtre
GSP33bbdip13u:349_8: ityukteriti śeṣo darśitaḥ / yadyapi sūtrabhāṣyayoḥ 'anubhāti'; itiśrutyanusārādanubhānāditi
GSP33bbdip13u:349_9: vācyam / tathāpi tāpinī pācinī caiva śoṣiṇī ca prakāśinī /
GSP33bbdip13u:351_1: darśayitumanukṛterityuktam / sūtre tadanusāribhāṣye ca caśabdo dvitīyasūtrasya vakṣyamāṇavyākhyānabhedena
GSP33bbdip13u:351_3: vā draṣṭavyaḥ / sūtre samanvayasūtrādanuvṛttasya vidheyaparasya tattvityasyārthamāha
GSP33bbdip13u:351_4: - paramātmaiveti / na tu jñānisukhamityevaśabdārthaḥ / liṅgasamanvayena bhavatphalaṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:351_5: darśayati - anirdeśyeti / anirdeśyaścāsau sukharūpaśca iti vā, anirdeśyaṃ yatsukhaṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:351_6: tadrūpa iti vā vigrahaḥ / atra rūpaśabdo bhinnakramaḥ / tathā cānirdeśyaṃ paramaṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:351_7: sukhaṃ paramātmarūpamityanvayaḥ / eka ityādau pulliṅgena prakṛtasyaitaditi napuṃsakaliṅgena
GSP33bbdip13u:351_8: grahaṇāya rūpaśabdaprayogaḥ / upalakṣaṇametat / anugrāhyascetyapi draṣṭavyam / vastutastu
GSP33bbdip13u:351_10: sādhyadharmī sūcita iti dhyeyam / yadyapyanirdeśyatvamajñeyatvaṃ cetyupakramādubhayaṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:351_11: grāhyaṃ, na tvekaṃ, sukharūpamiti cādhikam / tathāpi pūrvapakṣyuktasukhaśruteḥ sukharūpe
GSP33bbdip13u:351_13: ajñeyatvamapi draṣṭavyam / yadyapyatra bhāṣye liṅgadvayasyānukūlyena gṛhyamāṇasya
GSP33bbdip13u:351_14: vā anirdeśyasukharūpasya vā viṣṇutve sādhye sākṣāddhetutvaṃ bhāti / ṭīkāyāṃ tu -
GSP33bbdip13u:351_16: (kaṭha. 5-13.) iti vyavadhānena prakṛtaparamātmagrahaṇe liṅgadvayaṃ hetutvena yojitam /
GSP33bbdip13u:351_17: tathāpi hetudvayena tacchabdena jñānisukhaparityāgena paramātmana eva grahaṇasiddhau
GSP33bbdip13u:351_18: tata eva tacchabdagṛhītasya paramātmana evānirdeśyasukharūpatvaṃ paryavasyatītyāśayena
GSP33bbdip13u:351_21: eva heturnocye, kintvanirdeśyaṃ sukhamityatra samīpoktajñānisukhaparityāge heturucyate
GSP33bbdip13u:351_22: ityatra jñāpakaṃ, ṭīkāpi tadanusāriṇītyāhuḥ / tathā cāyaṃ siddhānte śrutyarthaḥ -
GSP33bbdip13u:352: eko vaśī sarvabhūtāntarātmā ekaṃ rūpaṃ bahudhā yaḥ karoti /
GSP33bbdip13u:354_0: iti pūrvavākye 'ya eko'; jñānānandādyabhinnaḥ samābhyadhikaśūnyo vā yaḥ sarvamasya
GSP33bbdip13u:354_2: ekaṃ'; svasvarūpaṃ bahudhā karoti niyamyānantyāt / 'taṃ'; prakṛtam 'ātmasthaṃ'; jīvahṛdayasthitaṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:354_3: ye 'dhīrāḥ'; jñāninaḥ anupaśyantīti prakṛtā ye jñāninasteṣāmeva 'śāśvataṃ sukhaṃ';
GSP33bbdip13u:354_4: nityābhivyaktasaukhyaṃ netareṣām / anena brahmasāmarthyamuktaṃ bhavati / evaṃ 'nityo
GSP33bbdip13u:354_5: nityānām'; iti vākyamapi brahmamāhātmyaparatayā vyākhyeyam / 'tadetat'; ityādināpi
GSP33bbdip13u:354_6: prakṛtabhagavatsvarūpameva viśeṣataḥ pratipādyate iti / manyante ityasyottaratrānvayaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:354_7: tathā ca 'yato vāco nivartante'; (tai. 2-4-1.) 'eṣo 'sya parama ānandaḥ'; (bṛ. 6-3-32.)
GSP33bbdip13u:354_8: ityādau prasiddham anirdeśyaṃ paramaṃ sukhaṃ kathaṃ nu tadvijānīyāmiti manyante ityānukūlyena
GSP33bbdip13u:354_9: gṛhṇanti / jñānārthaṃ tadbhānaṃ vā prārthayante / 'kimu bhāti na bhāti vā'; iti tasya
GSP33bbdip13u:354_10: durjñeyatvaṃ ca vadanti jñāninaḥ / tat brahmaṇo rūpaṃ svarūpabhūtaṃ sukhametadekaṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:354_11: rūpaṃ bahudhā yaḥ karotītiprakṛteśvararūpābhinnamiti manyante jñānina iti / etacchabdasyeśvaraparatve
GSP33bbdip13u:354_13: - 'yadbrahmānirdeśyaṃ sukhamiti vadanti tadetatsvarūpamiti manyanta iti'; / kāṭhakabhāṣye
GSP33bbdip13u:354_14: tu - tad 'guhyaṃ brahma sanātanam'; ityupakrāntam / 'rūpaṃ rūpaṃ pratirūpo babhūva';
GSP33bbdip13u:354_15: (kaṭha. 5-9.) iti jīvasya pratibimbatvamuktam / rūpaśabdena prakṛtametat 'ekaṃ rūpam';
GSP33bbdip13u:354_16: ityatra prakṛtaṃ ca bhagavadrūpam 'anirdeśyam'; itthamiti sākalyena nirvaktumaśakyaṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:354_17: paramaṃ sukhamiti manyante jñānina iti sukharūpatvavidhiparatayā vyākhyātam / bhāṣye
GSP33bbdip13u:354_19: tadanirdeśyaparamasukhātmakaṃ bhagavadrūpaṃ tatparasādamṛte kimu bhāti na bhāti veti
GSP33bbdip13u:354_20: samyagbhāti na bhātīti kathaṃ nvahaṃ jānīyāmiti śiṣṭavākyārthastatraivoktaḥ / vivṛtaṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:354_22: kimu samyagbhāti? na bhāti vāti? iti praśnottarabhūtam ekaṃ niścitārthaṃ 'kathamahaṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:354_23: vijānīyāṃ'; na kenāpi prakāreṇeti / atretiśabda ubhayānvayī / tathā ca kimu bhātīti
GSP33bbdip13u:354_25: - yadevaṃ brahma tatprasādamṛte 'nu'; idānīṃ 'kathamahaṃ vijānīyām'; prārthanīyāṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:354_26: liṅ / na kathamapītyarthaḥ / jñānivākyānukaraṇametat / bhagavatprasādādapi kiṃ sākalyena
GSP33bbdip13u:354_27: tajjñānaṃ bhavatīti naciketā yamaṃ pṛcchati - kimu bhātīti / uśabdaḥ samyagityarthe /
GSP33bbdip13u:354_28: kimvityekaṃ vā / tathātve samyagiti śeṣaḥ / uttaramāha yamaḥ - na bhātīti / vāśabdoṣa'vadhāraṇe /
GSP33bbdip13u:355: [BBsBh_1,3.6.3] na hi jñānisukhamanubhāti sarvaṃ, na ca tadbhāsā /
GSP33bbdip13u:356_0: [BBsBhDīp_1,3.6.3] nanu 'tameva bhāntam'; iti vākye sūryāditejasāṃ paramātmādhīnaprakāśakartṛtvasya
GSP33bbdip13u:356_1: 'tasya bhāsā'; itivākye ca sarvasya jagatastatprabhāprakāśyatvasya ca śravaṇena asiddhiparihāre
GSP33bbdip13u:356_3: syādityata āha - na hīti // sarvamityubhayānvayī / bhātīti śeṣaḥ / tathā ca 'hi';
GSP33bbdip13u:356_4: yasmāt 'sarvaṃ'; sūryāditejaḥ jñānisukhamanusṛtya 'na bhāti'; na prakāśate / tathā
GSP33bbdip13u:356_5: 'tadbhāsā'; tasya jñānisukhasya prakāśena 'sarvaṃ'; jagat 'na bhāti'; na prakāśate
GSP33bbdip13u:356_6: cetyarthaḥ / vakṣyamāṇapramāṇavirodhāditi bhāvaḥ / caśabdaḥ samuccaye / ato na liṅgadvayamanyatrāvakāśavaditi
GSP33bbdip13u:357: [BBsBh_1,3.6.4] 'ahaṃ tattejo raśmīt'; iti nārāyaṇabhāsā hi sarvaṃ bhāti // 22 //
GSP33bbdip13u:358_2: sūcitāṃ śrutimāha - ahamiti // ahamitītyanantaraṃ śruteriti śeṣaḥ / itiśabda ādyārthe /
GSP33bbdip13u:358_3: tena 'tameva bhāntamanubhāti sarvaṃ tasya bhāsā sarvamidaṃ vibhāti'; (kaṭha. 5-15.)
GSP33bbdip13u:358_5: yata ityarthe, prasiddhau ca / 'sarvaṃ'; sūryāditejaḥ 'bhāti'; prakāśate / yadvā
GSP33bbdip13u:358_7: 'iti jñāyate'; iti śeṣaḥ / śrutau 'raśmīt'; ityanena sūryāditejasāṃ nārāyaṇādhīnaprakāśakartṛtvasya,
GSP33bbdip13u:358_8: 'tejaḥ'; ityanena sarvasya jagato nārāyaṇīyaprakāśaprakāśyatvasya coktatvāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:358_9: 'aham'; iti, śrutistvantarnaye vyākhyātā / anena - taduktamityataḥ sūtre tadityanuvartate /
GSP33bbdip13u:358_10: tasyetyāvartate vipariṇamyate ca / asambhavāditi cānuvartate / tathā ca -
GSP33bbdip13u:361_0: ityānukūlyena gṛhyamāṇaṃ tadetacchabdaparāmṛśyaṃ sukham anirdeśyaṃ sukhaṃ tattu viṣṇurūpameva,
GSP33bbdip13u:361_1: na samīpoktajñānisukham / kutaḥ? 'tasya'; sūryāditejasaḥ 'tasya'; ānukūlyena gṛhyamāṇasya
GSP33bbdip13u:361_3: yāvat / tathā tasya sarvasya jagatastasya tatprakāśaprakāśyatvasya 'tasya bhāsā';
GSP33bbdip13u:361_5: ca liṅgadvayasya 'ahaṃ tattejaḥ'; (caturvedaśikhā.) ityādiśrutyā smṛtyā ca tasminviṣṇāveva
GSP33bbdip13u:361_7: tasyānukūlyena gṛhyamāṇasya 'na tatra sūryo bhāti'; iti vākye tasya sūryādyaprakāśyatvasyacokteśceti
GSP33bbdip13u:366: yaccandramasi yaccāgnau tattejo viddhi māmakam // (gī. 15-12.) iti /
GSP33bbdip13u:367_1: tatsmṛtyāpyupapādayatsūtraṃ paṭhitvā tāṃ smṛtimudāharati - apīti // iti smaryata
GSP33bbdip13u:367_2: ityanvayaḥ / 'yat'; ādityādiṣu sthitaṃ tejastat 'māmakaṃ'; madadhīnaṃ madīyaṃ ca,
GSP33bbdip13u:367_3: matteja evādityādiṣu prerakatvenāsti / tadevākhilaṃ jagat 'bhāsayate'; prakāśayatīti
GSP33bbdip13u:368: [BBsBh_1,3.6.6] na tadbhāsayate sūryo na śaśāṅko na pāvakaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:369: yadgatvā na nivartante taddhāma paramaṃ mama // (gī. 15.6.) iti ca // 23 //
GSP33bbdip13u:371_0: [BBsBhDīp_1,3.6.6] kiṃ ca pāṭhake 'na tatra sūryo bhāti na candratārakaṃ nemā vidyuto
GSP33bbdip13u:371_1: bhānti kuto 'yamagniḥ'; ityādyānukūlyena gṛhyamāṇasya sukhasya sūryādyaprakāśyatvamucyate /
GSP33bbdip13u:371_2: tacca viṣṇoreva smaryate, ato viṣṇureva 'tadetat'; ityatra pratipādyaḥ, na jñānisukhamiti
GSP33bbdip13u:371_4: - na taditi // atrāpītiśabdasya smaryata ityanvayaḥ / jñānino 'yadgatvā'; yatprāpya
GSP33bbdip13u:371_5: punastasmānnanivartante, tanmama paramaṃ 'dhāma'; svarūpaṃ, tadetaddhāma sūryo 'na
GSP33bbdip13u:371_6: bhāsayate'; na prakāśayate, evaṃ 'śaśāṅkaḥ'; candraḥ / yadā caivaṃ tadā kuto 'yamavamo
GSP33bbdip13u:371_7: 'gniriti gītāsmṛtyarthaḥ / anena - pūrvavyākhyāne na kevalamanukṛtyādiḥ 'ahaṃ tattejaḥ';
GSP33bbdip13u:371_9: kintu yadādityeti smaryatepīti śrutisamuccayārthe 'piśabdaḥ / dvitīyavyākhyāne tu
GSP33bbdip13u:371_11: iti pūrvavākyoktasūryādyaprakāśyatvahetośca samuccaye 'piśabdaḥ / tathā ca na kevalaṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:371_13: 'ahaṃ tattejo raśmīt'; ityādau śrūyate, kintu yadādityeti smaryate 'pīti vā apiḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:371_14: kiñca - yato na kevalaṃ prathamasūtroktaliṅgadvayaṃ, kintu tato 'nyadapi 'na tatra';
GSP33bbdip13u:371_15: iti kāṭhakavākye tasyānukūlyena gṛhyamāṇasyoktaṃ sūryādyaprakāśyatvarūpaṃ liṅgaṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:371_16: tasya viṣṇoḥ sambandhitvenaiva 'na tat'; iti smaryate / atastadetat 'kathaṃ nu tadvijānīyām';
GSP33bbdip13u:371_17: ityatra viṣṇureva pratipādya iti vā sūtrasyārthadvayamuktaṃ bhavati / 'na tatra';
GSP33bbdip13u:371_18: ityāderayamarthaḥ / pūrvaṃ brahma na samyagbhātīti tasya durjñeyatvamuktaṃ, tatkuta
GSP33bbdip13u:371_19: ityataḥ idamucyate - yasyaivaṃvidhaṃ sukhaṃ rūpaṃ 'tatra'; brahmaṇi sūryo 'na bhāti';
GSP33bbdip13u:371_20: tanna prakāśayatīti yāvat / candratārakamiti dvandvaikavadbhāvaḥ / evaṃ tat vidyuto
GSP33bbdip13u:371_21: 'pi 'na bhānti'; na bhāsayantīti / 'tameva bhāntam'; ityuttaravākyaṃ tu yadyapi vyāsatīrthakṛtātharvaṇaṭīkāyām
GSP33bbdip13u:371_23: sūryādayo 'bhānti'; prakāśate iti vyākhyātam / tathāpi ṭīkānusārāt 'sarvaṃ'; sūryāditejaḥ
GSP33bbdip13u:371_25: 'bhāsā'; prakāśena 'idaṃ sarvaṃ'; jagati 'bhāti'; prakāśyata iti vyākhyeyam / vyāsatīrthīyaṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:374: [BBsBh_1,3.7.1] viṣṇureva jijñāsya ityuktam / tatra ūrdhvaṃ prāṇāmunnayatyapānaṃ pratyagasyati /
GSP33bbdip13u:377_1: viṣayasaṃśayau ca sūcayati - viṣṇureveti / jijñāsāsūtre viṣṇurevasarvairmumukṣubhirmokṣārthaṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:377_2: jijñāsya ityuktamityarthaḥ / na ca tatra jijñāsyatvāyogavyavaccheda eva kṛtaḥ, na
GSP33bbdip13u:377_3: tvanyayogavyavaccheda iti vācyam / anyasyāpi jijñāsyatve tasyāpi mokṣadātṛtvāpattyā
GSP33bbdip13u:377_5: ato 'traivakāra ubhayānvayitayā vyākhyeyaḥ / tataḥ kimityata āha - tatreti / idaṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:377_6: cāvartate / tatretyavyayaṃ tadityarthe 'pi / tathā ca 'athāto brahmajijñāsā'; iti
GSP33bbdip13u:377_8: ityuktvā āmnāte 'ūrdhvam'; iti kāṭhakavākye 'kaścirt'; iśāno dharmitvena pratīyate /
GSP33bbdip13u:377_9: katham? yato 'yaṃ 'sarvadevopāsyaḥ'; tairjijñāsyaḥ pratīyate ata iti vākyayojanā /
GSP33bbdip13u:377_10: na ca vāyoḥ sarvadevopāsyatve 'pi na viṣṇossarvadevopāsyatvahāniriti vācyam / tāvatāpi
GSP33bbdip13u:377_11: sarvairmumukṣubhirviṣṇureva jijñāsya iti niyamasyāsiddheḥ / na ca śrutigataviśvedevaśabdasya
GSP33bbdip13u:378: [BBsBh_1,3.7.2] sa ca 'evamevaiṣa prāṇa itarān prāṇān pṛthakpṛthageva sannidhatte';
GSP33bbdip13u:386_0: [BBsBhDīp_1,3.7.2] sayuktikaṃ pūrvapakṣayati - sa ceti // atretthaṃ yojanā - 'sa
GSP33bbdip13u:386_1: ca'; sarvadevopāsyaśceśāno vāyureva bhavet, na viṣṇuḥ / kutaḥ? atra prāṇavyavasthāpakatvaśravaṇāt /
GSP33bbdip13u:386_2: tathā madhyamatvokteḥ sarvadevatopāsyatvokteśca / na caiṣāṃ vāyvekaniṣṭhatvāsiddhiḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:386_4: (ṛ. 7-91-1.) ityādinā vākyena prāṇavyavasthāpakatvadimān pratīyate, ata iti / kāṭhake
GSP33bbdip13u:389_1: tasyaiva 'ūrdhvam'; ityādinā mahimāntaramucyate / tatra madhyaśabdaḥ siddhānte ūrdhvaṃpratyakchabdasamabhivyāhārāt
GSP33bbdip13u:389_5: nirasyati prerayatīti yāvat / taṃ 'dehamadhye'; hṛdaye 'āsīnam'; upaviṣṭaṃ 'vāmanaṃ';
GSP33bbdip13u:389_6: saundaryapradhānāḥ striyo vāmāḥ tāḥ netāraṃ viṣṇuṃ 'viśve devāḥ'; sarve devāḥ 'upāsate';
GSP33bbdip13u:389_7: jijñāsanta iti siddhāntarītyā śrutyarthaḥ / pūrvapakṣī tvidaṃ vāyuparaṃ matvā madhyaśabdo
GSP33bbdip13u:389_9: ityāha / 'evam'; iti ṣaṭpraśnavākyaṃ ca 'yathā samrāḍevādhikṛtānviniyuṅkte etāngrāmānadhitiṣṭhasveti';
GSP33bbdip13u:389_10: iti dṛṣṭāntavākyena saha vyākhyeyam / tatprakārastu - yathā 'samrāṭ'; sārvabhaumaḥ
GSP33bbdip13u:389_14: prāṇān vāyūn pṛthaksthāneṣu hṛdayādiṣu sthāpayatīti / 'yo 'yam'; ityādibṛhadāraṇyakavākyam /
GSP33bbdip13u:389_15: tatra hi pūrvaṃ vāgādīnāṃ mṛtyugrastatvamuktvā 'athainameva nāpnot'; ityanena mukhyaprāṇasya
GSP33bbdip13u:389_19: na tu madhyadeśasthatvam / tathā tatraiva caturthādhyāye 'ayaṃ vāva śiśuḥ yo 'yaṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:389_21: viṣṇurūpāyāṃ sthūṇāyām annākhyena śrīrūpeṇa dāmnā baddho govatsarūpovāyurmadhyamatvenocyate /
GSP33bbdip13u:390: kuvidaṅga namasā ye vṛdhāsaḥ purā devā anavadyāsa āsan /
GSP33bbdip13u:392_0: iti ṛṅmantre 'aṅga'; iti priyasambodhanam / tathā ca ye devāḥ vāyoḥ 'namasā'; namaskāropalakṣitasevādinā
GSP33bbdip13u:392_2: purā sasūryā āsan / te 'kuvit'; kvacidrahasyasthāne sūryeṇa sākaṃ 'manave'; jñānine
GSP33bbdip13u:392_4: uṣa prakāśe, asun, buddhim 'avāsayan'; tadviṣayāmakurvanniti śrutyarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:393_0: siddhāntayatsūtramavatārya vyācaṣṭe - ata iti // 'vāmanaśabdāt'; vāmanaśruteḥ / evakāro
GSP33bbdip13u:393_1: vāyuliṅgasadbhāvāt vāyureveśānaḥ kiṃ na syāditi codyaparihārāya liṅgebhyaḥ śruteḥ
GSP33bbdip13u:393_2: prābalyamāha / yathoktaṃ sudhāyām - evaśabdavyākhyānaṃ balavaditi 'śabdādeva pramitaḥ';
GSP33bbdip13u:393_4: āvartate cāyam / itiśabdātparamapi evaśabdo yojyaḥ / tenānuvṛttastu śabdo vyākhyātaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:393_5: tathā car 'iśāno bhūtabhavyasya'; (kaṭha. 4-12.) iti śrutar iśāno viṣṇureva bhavet /
GSP33bbdip13u:393_6: kutaḥ? yastatra pramito viṣṇāveva mahāyogavidvadrūḍhibhyāṃ prasiddho 'madhye vāmanam';
GSP33bbdip13u:393_8: anena sūtre itiśabdo 'dhyāhārya iti sūcitam / tathā car 'iśāno bhūtabhavyasya'; itiśrutariśānaḥ
GSP33bbdip13u:393_9: 'tattu'; viṣṇureva bhavet / kutaḥ? yastatra viṣṇāveva pramito mahāyogavidvadrūḍhibhyāṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:395_0: [BBsBhDīp_1,3.7.3] sūtre evakāraprayogena sūcitaṃ śruteḥ prābalyaṃ liṅgasya prābalyaniṣedhamukhena
GSP33bbdip13u:395_1: darśayati - na hīti // śruteriti pañcamī / hiśabdo vakṣyamāṇapramāṇavirodhāditi hetusūcakaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:395_2: tathā ca 'hi'; yasmāt na śruterliṅgaṃ balavat, kintu durbalameva / tasmālliṅagāt
GSP33bbdip13u:396: [BBsBh_1,3.7.4] śrutirliṅgaṃ samākhyā ca vākyaṃ prakaraṇaṃ tathā /
GSP33bbdip13u:397: pūrvaṃ pūrvaṃ balīyaḥ syādevamāgamanirṇayaḥ / iti skānde /
GSP33bbdip13u:398_1: tadvākyaṃ paṭhati - śrutiriti // iti skānda ityanantaraṃ vacanāditi śeṣaḥ / asya
GSP33bbdip13u:398_2: na hītyanenānvayaḥ / vācakaśabdaḥśrutiḥ / asādhāraṇadharmo vā, tadbodhakaśabdo vā
GSP33bbdip13u:398_3: liṅgam / nirṇītasyānyatra samānoktiḥ samākhyā / sā dvividhā - arthataśśabdato 'pīti /
GSP33bbdip13u:398_7: sthānaṃ samākhyā ca tathāvidhā'; ityanuvyākhyānusāreṇa samākhyāyāḥ sthānānantaryameva
GSP33bbdip13u:398_8: grāhyaṃ, na tvatroktakramānusāreṇa vākyādyapekṣayā prāthamyam / atroktakramasyāvivakṣitatvāt /
GSP33bbdip13u:398_9: uktaṃ hi pramāṇalakṣaṇaṭīkāyāṃ - samākhyāditvena grahaṇaṃ 'śrutirliṅgaṃ samākhyā
GSP33bbdip13u:398_10: ca'; ityavivakṣitakramaṃ vākyamanusṛtyeti / ata eva jaiminiḥ - 'śrutiliṅgavākyaprakaraṇasthānasamākhyānāṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:398_12: pūrvoddiṣṭamityarthaḥ / ekatra samavetaṃ viruddhamiti ca śeṣaḥ / 'balīyaḥ'; atiśayena
GSP33bbdip13u:398_13: svabhāvato balavat yathātraivādhikaraṇe anantaroddiṣṭaliṅgāpekṣayā pūrvoddiṣṭā vāmanaśrutiḥ
GSP33bbdip13u:398_14: svataḥ prabalā / vākyāpekṣayā prabalaṃ liṅgam / yathā - daharādhikaraṇe daharākāśasya
GSP33bbdip13u:398_15: sākṣātsarvādhāratvaprāpakāt 'kiṃ tadatra vidyate ..... ubhe asmin dyāvāpṛthivī';
GSP33bbdip13u:398_17: prakaraṇāpekṣayā prabalaṃ vākyam / yathā - jyotirdarśanāt ityadhikaraṇe jīvasya 'hṛdyantarjyotiḥ';
GSP33bbdip13u:398_19: 'katama ātmā'; (bṛ. 6-3-7.) iti praśnavākyam / sthānāpekṣayā prabalaṃ prakaraṇam /
GSP33bbdip13u:398_21: eṣa prāṇo jāyate'; (praśna. 3-3.) ityetatkhaṇḍarūpaṃ mukhyaprāṇaprakaraṇam / ata
GSP33bbdip13u:398_23: śrutyā bādha uktaḥ / samākhyāpekṣayā prabalaṃ sthānam / yathā - annamayādiśabdānāṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:398_25: (yājñikī. 66.) iti nārāyaṇānuvākasamākhyāyāḥ prabalaṃ teṣāṃ viṣṇutvasādhakaṃ brahmaparānekaprakaraṇasandarbharūpaṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:398_26: sthānam / etānyeva śrutyādinār'thanirṇayasthalāni / ādyayā samākhyayā nirṇetavyaṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:398_27: yathā - puruṣasūktasamākhyayā vaiśvānarasya viṣṇutvam / dvitīyayā yathā - ambhraṇīsūktasamākhyayā
GSP33bbdip13u:398_28: viśvakarmasūktoktasyājasya viṣṇutvam / astvevaṃ tataḥ kimityata āha - evamiti / viruddhaiteṣāṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:398_29: samavāye sati prabalena pūrveṇottarabādhe ca sati 'āgamanirṇayaḥ'; āgamārthasya vipratipannasyaitaiḥ
GSP33bbdip13u:399: [BBsBh_1,3.7.5] tacca liṅgaṃ viṣṇoreva / tasyaiva prāṇatvokteḥ 'tadvai tvaṃ prāṇo
GSP33bbdip13u:401_0: [BBsBhDīp_1,3.7.5] nanvastu śruteḥ svabhāvataḥ prābalyam / tathāpi bāhulyena pūrvapakṣyuktaliṅgānāmapi
GSP33bbdip13u:401_1: prābalyātsāmyenānirṇaya evetyata āha - tacceti // castvarthaḥ / liṅgamiti samudāyaikavacanam /
GSP33bbdip13u:401_2: tathā ca 'tat'; pūrvavādyuktaṃ liṅgajātaṃ tu viṣṇoreva yuktam, na vāyorityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:401_3: tathā ca bāhulye 'pi liṅgānāṃ sāvakāśatvāttebhyaḥ śruterekasyā api niravakāśāyāḥ
GSP33bbdip13u:401_4: prābalyānnānirṇaya iti bhāvaḥ / nanu na liṅgaṃ viṣṇau sāvakāśaṃ, pūrvapakṣyudāhṛtasamākhyārūpaśrutyantareṇa
GSP33bbdip13u:401_5: tasya prāṇaniṣṭhatayaivoktatvādityata āha - tasyaiveti / 'tadvai tvam'; iti śrutau
GSP33bbdip13u:401_7: eva'; ityatrādhyātmikāśeṣaśabdasya samanvayaṃ bruvatā tathā - 'śāstradṛṣṭyā'; ityatrāntaryāmiparatvaṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:401_8: bruvatā sūtrakāreṇetaravyāvṛttyā tasyaiva prāṇatvokteḥ sādhitatvādityapi vyākhyeyametat /
GSP33bbdip13u:401_9: tathā ca śrutyantare prāṇaniṣṭhatayā liṅgasyoktāvapi na tadvirodhaḥ / tasya prāṇasya
GSP33bbdip13u:401_10: viṣṇutvābhyupagamāditi bhāvaḥ / nanu tathāpi 'kuvidaṅga'; iti ṛci vāyuniṣṭhatayā
GSP33bbdip13u:401_11: liṅgoktestadvirodha ityasyāpīdamevottaram / asmin pakṣe prāṇatvamiti vāyutvamupalakṣyate /
GSP33bbdip13u:401_12: tathā cāntarnaye ādhidaivikāśeṣaśabdasamanvayaṃ bruvatā sūtrakāreṇa 'tasyaiva'; viṣṇoreva
GSP33bbdip13u:401_14: bhāvaḥ / na ca siddhānte 'pi sthānāpekṣayā prabalātprakaraṇāt 'evamevaiṣaḥ'; itiśrutyantaragataprāṇaśabdasya,
GSP33bbdip13u:401_15: tathā 'yo 'yaṃ madhyamaḥ'; (bṛ. 3.5-21.) ityasya, tathā 'kuvidaṅga'; iti mantrasthavāyuśabdasya
GSP33bbdip13u:401_16: mukhyavāyuparatvaṃ, tatroktaliṅgānāmapi tatparatvamupetya teṣāṃ śrutyā bādhasyoktatvāt
GSP33bbdip13u:401_17: kathaṃ śrutyantarasthaprāṇavāyuśabdayoḥ viṣṇuparatvāṅgīkāreṇa samādhānam / ata eva
GSP33bbdip13u:401_18: candrikāyām - madhyamaśabdo 'pi 'ūrdhvaṃ prāṇam'; (kaṭha. 2-2-3.) iti prāṇasya sthānāntaranirdeśāttatyāgena
GSP33bbdip13u:401_19: madhyamasthānasthabrahmaparaḥ, na tu śrutyantare madhyamaśabdoktaprāṇapara ityuktam /
GSP33bbdip13u:401_20: ataḥ 'evamevaiṣaḥ'; (praśna. 3-4.) iti vākyaṃ sthānātprakaraṇasya prābalye udāhṛtamiti
GSP33bbdip13u:401_23: 'pi vā nānupapattiḥ / na caivaṃ kāṭhakoktaliṅgānāmapyanyaniṣṭhatvāpattyā anyeṣāmīśānatvādyāpattiḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:401_24: niravakāśaśrutyā kāṭhakoktaliṅgānāṃ viṣṇuniṣṭhatānirṇayopapatteḥ / nanu tathāpi kathamīśāno
GSP33bbdip13u:401_26: na ca vyomavatsarvagatasyāpyaṇutvaṃ yujyata iti pratipāditamiti vācyam / tathāpi
GSP33bbdip13u:401_28: śrutaḥ parimāṇārthako mātracpratyaya eva, na tvavadhāraṇārthako mātraśabdaḥ / 'dehāṅguṣṭhamito
GSP33bbdip13u:401_29: dehe jīvāṅguṣṭhamito hṛdi'; iti smṛtau mita ityanena parimāṇasyaivokteḥ / tathā ca
GSP33bbdip13u:401_31: 4-12.) iti śrutau 'madhya ātmani'; ityasya smṛtau hṛdītyasya ca vaiyarthyāpātāt /
GSP33bbdip13u:406_1: viṣṇurityāśaṅkāṃ pariharatsūtramupanyasya tadakṣarāṇi vyācaṣṭe - hṛdīti // sarvagatasyāpītyanena
GSP33bbdip13u:406_3: sādhyaṃ darśayati - tasyeti / yojanā tu - yadyapi viṣṇuḥ sarvagatastathāpi 'tasyāṅguṣṭhamātratvam';
GSP33bbdip13u:406_4: aṅguṣṭhamātratvoktiryujyate / katham? yato 'hṛdyavakāśopekṣayā'; hṛdi vidyamāno yo
GSP33bbdip13u:406_6: tasya viṣṇoraṅguṣṭhamātratvam astyata iti / yadvā - 'hṛdyavakāśāpekṣayā'; hṛdi vidyamānāvakāśamapekṣya
GSP33bbdip13u:406_7: tatsambandhāttasyāṅguṣṭhamātratvavacanaṃ yujyata ityāvṛttiṃ vinā yojanā / prathamapakṣe
GSP33bbdip13u:406_9: brahmaṇi tatsambandhādupacāreṇoktiriti bhedaḥ / atra ṭīkāyāṃ hṛdyavakāśāpekṣayeti
GSP33bbdip13u:406_10: bhāṣyaṃ sāvadhāraṇaṃ kṛtvā sautratuśabdo 'vadhāraṇatayā vyākhyātaḥ / tena viṣṇoṅguṣṭhamātratvaṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:406_11: hṛdyapekṣayaiva, na tu lokavatparicchinnatvādityuktaṃ bhavati / tattatsthāneṣu vyaktamūrtiviśeṣāpekṣayā
GSP33bbdip13u:406_13: iti chāndogye 'prādeśamātraṃ puruṣam'; ityanyatra 'prādeśaḥ puruṣottamaḥ'; ityaparatra
GSP33bbdip13u:406_14: ca hṛdgatasya viṣṇoḥ prādeśaparimitatvokteḥ / 'aṅguṣṭhamātraḥ puruṣo 'ṅguṣṭhaṃ ca
GSP33bbdip13u:406_15: samāśritaḥ'; (mahānā. 16.3.) iti śrutyantare 'aṅguṣṭhamātraḥ puruṣaḥ'; iti kaṭhavalyāṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:406_17: iti kvacidaṅguṣṭhāgrapramāṇakatvoktervirodha iti codyaṃ parihṛtaṃ bhavati / dehe
GSP33bbdip13u:410: mūleśa iti nāmāsmin sarve jīvāḥ pratiṣṭhitāḥ //
GSP33bbdip13u:412: prāviśanti suṣuptau tu prabudhyante tatastathā // iti //
GSP33bbdip13u:413_0: asmin mūleśavyāpinormadhye 'ṅguṣṭhamātratvaṃ ca dehe dehāṅguṣṭhamitatvaṃ jīvahṛdi
GSP33bbdip13u:413_1: jīvāṅguṣṭhamitatvamiti vivektavyam / atra 'aṅguṣṭhaṃ ca samāśritaḥ'; ityanena karmendriyādhiṣṭhitatvamucyata
GSP33bbdip13u:413_2: iti prameyadīpoktamapi jñātavyam / nanu 'dakṣiṇākṣimukhe viśvo manasyantastu taijasaḥ';
GSP33bbdip13u:413_4: tāvatsiddham / yadi caivaṃ tadā jīvo 'pi jāgradavasthāyāṃ dakṣiṇākṣisthaḥ svapne
GSP33bbdip13u:413_5: kaṇṭhadeśasthaḥ suptau hṛdayastho bhavati, 'hṛdayasthātparājjīvo dūrastho jāgradeṣyati';
GSP33bbdip13u:413_6: ityukteḥ / dūrastho 'kṣistho jāgrajjāgratvamiti tasyārthaḥ / tathā ca kathaṃ hṛdayavyāptaprādeśaparimitabhagavadrūpasya
GSP33bbdip13u:413_7: sarvadā jīvasthānatvam? kathaṃ ca hṛtkarṇikāmūlagatabhagavadrūpe sadā pratiṣṭhito
GSP33bbdip13u:413_8: jīvaḥ? suptau hṛtkarṇikāgragate harau praviśatītyuktiriti cet - na, yatassarvadā
GSP33bbdip13u:413_9: hṛdi sthitameva jīvasvarūpaṃ jāgaritādāvakṣyādiṣvapi viśeṣasannihitaṃ dīpaprakāśavadityaṅgīkṛtam /
GSP33bbdip13u:413_10: yathoktamaitareyabhāṣye - hṛde sthitameva tasya rūpaṃ jāgarite 'pyakṣyādiṣu viśeṣasannihitaṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:413_12: anekadhā sthitānāṃ bhagavanmūrtīnāṃ śaktyā sarvagānāmapi tatra tatra vyaktyātmanā
GSP33bbdip13u:413_13: anekālpaparimāṇavattvaṃ ca yujyata iti na kācidanupapattiḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:416_0: [BBsBhDīp_1,3.7.7] nanu tathāpi nāṅguṣṭhaparimāṇavattvaṃ viṣṇoryuktam / tathā hi
GSP33bbdip13u:416_1: kiṃ tattadaṅguṣṭhamātratvaṃ vā yatkiñcidaṅguṣṭhamātratvaṃ vā / nādyaḥ, paśvādīnāmaṅguṣṭhābhāvena
GSP33bbdip13u:416_5: manuṣyādhikāratvāt itisūtraśeṣaṃ tuśabdasya kākākṣinyāyena atrāpyanvayaṃ tasyāpyarthatvaṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:416_6: ca abhipretya tatsambandhipradarśanapūrvakaṃ vyācaṣṭe - itareti // paśvādīnāmityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:416_12: yojanā / sūtre bhāṣye ca manuṣyāṇāmadhikāro yasmin athavā - adhikriyate 'tretyadhikāra
GSP33bbdip13u:416_13: upāsanaṃ śāstraṃ vā, manuṣyāṇāmeva adhikāro manuṣyādhikārastasya bhāvasatasmāditi
GSP33bbdip13u:416_14: vigrahaḥ / 'manuṣyādhikāritvāt'; itipāṭhe manuṣyā adhikāriṇo yasmin tattathoktam /
GSP33bbdip13u:416_15: tathā ca manuṣyādhikārikatvādityarthaḥ / manuṣyapadaṃ ca vakṣyamāṇanyāyena mananādiśīlacetanaparam /
GSP33bbdip13u:416_18: evādhikāro, nopāstāvapi / ata eva ṭīkāyāṃ manuṣyāṇāmeva vedavidyopāsanādhikāritveneti
GSP33bbdip13u:416_19: manuṣyatvaṃ vyāpakatvenoktam / na cānadhikāriṇāṃ paśvādīnāṃ dehasthitasya bhagavato
GSP33bbdip13u:418_0: anena - sūtre tuśabdo 'pyarthevadhāraṇe ca / tatrāpyarthasyobhayatrānvayaḥ / aṅguṣṭhamātratvaṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:418_1: yujyata iti śeṣaḥ / taditi pradhānasūtrādanuvṛttasyeha vipariṇāmenānvayaḥ / na virodhaḥ
GSP33bbdip13u:418_2: ityasyākarṣaḥ / 'tasya manuṣyādhikāritvāt'; ityāvartate / tathā ca 'tu'; api sarvagatasyāpi
GSP33bbdip13u:418_3: 'tasya viṣṇoraṅguṣṭhamātratvaṃ'; taduktiryujyate / na ca virodhaḥ / yato 'tra 'hṛdyapekṣayā
GSP33bbdip13u:418_4: tu'; hṛdyavakāśāpekṣayaiva aṅguṣṭhamātratvamucyate, na tu paricchinnatvāt / tacca
GSP33bbdip13u:418_5: mūrtiviśeṣe tanmātratvasya sattvādupacāreṇa vā yujyate / na ca nāṅguṣṭhamātratvaṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:418_7: vācye tasya ca paśvādīnāmaṅguṣṭhābhāvena tadantargataviṣṇāvayogāditi vācyam / yataḥ
GSP33bbdip13u:422_6: saṅgatiḥ vedavidyādhikārākhyo viṣayaścokto bhavati / 'aṅguṣṭhamātraḥ'; iti śrutimūlāyāḥ
GSP33bbdip13u:422_7: 'manuṣyāṇāmeva'; ityukteḥ 'viśve devā upāsate'; (kaṭha.2-2-3.) iti śruteśca koṭidvayopasthāpakatvena
GSP33bbdip13u:422_8: sandehabījatvāttaduktyaiva devānāmadhikāro 'sti uta nāstīti saṃśayo, nāstīti pūrvapakṣaśca
GSP33bbdip13u:424_2: sāvadhāraṇatvenābhipretam / manuṣyapadam 'uktaṃ'; prayuktaṃ, tatreta śeṣaḥ / pūrvasūtra
GSP33bbdip13u:424_3: iti tadarthaḥ / svaprayuktaivakāravyāvarttyaṃ darśayati - na tviti // 'devādyapekṣayā';
GSP33bbdip13u:424_4: devādivyāvṛttyartham / tuśabdo viśeṣārthaḥ / na tu devādyarthamapītyapiśabdārtho
GSP33bbdip13u:428: tadupari manuṣyāṇāṃ satāṃ devāditvaprāptyupari / sambhavati hi teṣāṃ viśiṣṭabuddhyādibhāvāt /
GSP33bbdip13u:429_0: [BBsBhDīp_1,3.8.3] tatsūtraṃ paṭhati - taduparīti // atra taduparīti sādhyadharmisūcakaṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:429_1: padamanūdya teṣāṃ tasmāttasyā iti vigrahāśrayeṇa vyācaṣṭe - taduparīti // vedavidyākāra
GSP33bbdip13u:429_2: ityanuṣajyate / na kevalaṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ satāṃ, kintu taduparyapītyaperarthaḥ / tathā
