GSP33bbdip13u:429_3: ca 'teṣāṃ'; manuṣyāṇāṃ satāṃ devatāpadayogyānāṃ jīvānāṃ padaprāpteḥ pūrvaṃ manuṣyaśarīraṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:429_6: 'styeveti yojanā / kuta ityatastaddhetutayā sambhavāditi hetuṃ vyācaṣṭe / 'hi'; yataḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:429_8: 'pi kuta ityato 'trāpi sambhavādityetadevāvṛttya hetutayā yojayati - viśiṣṭeti //
GSP33bbdip13u:429_9: teṣāmityatrāpyanvīyate / tathā ca 'teṣāṃ'; yogyamanuṣyāṇāṃ vidyākarmabhyāṃ devāditvaprāptimatāṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:429_11: arthitvasāmarthye ādipadena grāhye / na cārthitvābhāvaḥ ityatrāpi teṣāṃ sambhavati
GSP33bbdip13u:429_12: hītyeva hetuḥ / vidyābhisteṣāṃ mokṣasiddhiḥ sambhavati hīti tadarthaḥ / anena - sūtre
GSP33bbdip13u:429_13: tadityāvartate / manuṣyaparāmarśi cedaṃ buddhisthaparāmarśi ca / apiḥ samuccaye /
GSP33bbdip13u:429_16: ca bādarāyaṇaḥ svayameva vaktītyāha iti vā / sambhavāditi cāvartate / tathā ca yato
GSP33bbdip13u:429_17: na kevalaṃ devādipadayogyajīvānāṃ padaprāpteḥ pūrvaṃ bhūmau kiñcitkālaṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:429_18: satāṃ tasyāṃ daśāyāmeva adhikāraḥ, kintu 'taduparyapi'; tasmānmanuṣyatvādupari tadatyayena
GSP33bbdip13u:429_21: viśiṣṭabuddhyādesteṣu sambhavāt / na ca devādīnāṃ viśiṣṭabuddhisāmarthyasadbhāve
GSP33bbdip13u:429_23: bhagavān bādarāyaṇo manyata iti sūtrārtha ukto bhavati /
GSP33bbdip13u:431_0: [BBsBhDīp_1,3.8.4] nanu na devā vedavidyādhikāriṇaḥ, tathā sati sūtre 'manuṣyamātravyāvartakamanuṣyapadaprayogena
GSP33bbdip13u:431_2: āha - tiryagādīnāmiti // ādipadena sthāvarāṇi mūḍhamanuṣyā vā gṛhyante / 'tadabhāvāt';
GSP33bbdip13u:431_6: ca mananādiśīlaparaṃ sat viśiṣṭabuddhyādirahitameva cetanaṃ vyāvartayati, na tu martyabhinnamātramiti
GSP33bbdip13u:431_7: na tadvirodha iti bhāvaḥ / nanu viśiṣṭabuddhyādirāhityamupādhiḥ / tiryakṣu adhikārābhāvarūpasādhyāvyāpakatvāt /
GSP33bbdip13u:431_8: ata eva na tadabhāvo 'pi sādhyavyatirekaheturityata āha - teṣāmapīti // apirubhayatrānveti /
GSP33bbdip13u:431_9: tatrādyassamuccaye / adhikāra iti śeṣaḥ / tathā ca na kevalaṃ devānāṃ, kintu 'teṣāṃ';
GSP33bbdip13u:431_10: tiraścāmapyadhikāre 'pi na virodhaḥ nanu kathamavirodhastiryakṣu sarvatra vedādhikāre
GSP33bbdip13u:431_13: mānāvirodhaḥ / bādho na sarvatretyarthaḥ / anenāpinā sautro 'piśabdo jaritāryādisamuccāyakaśceti
GSP33bbdip13u:431_16: nāmanuṣyatvaṃ hetuḥ, kintu viśiṣṭabuddhyādirāhityamevāvyabhicārāt / ato bhavatyeva
GSP33bbdip13u:431_17: sa upādhiḥ / ata eva sautramanuṣyapadasya vyāvarttyasaṅkoco 'pi yukta iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:433_1: taddarśanasya vā virodhitvādityāśaṅkya nādya ityāha - niṣedheti // teṣāmityatrāpi
GSP33bbdip13u:433_2: sambadhyate / adhikāre ityādau saṃyojyam / tena niṣedharāhitye sati viśiṣṭabuddhyādimattvamevādhikāre
GSP33bbdip13u:433_3: prayojakam, na kevalaṃ yena śūdrādau vyabhicāraḥ syāditi sūcitam / na dvitīya ityāha
GSP33bbdip13u:433_4: - dṛśyante hīti // vedādhikāritayeti śeṣaḥ / hiśabdo bhāratādiprasiddhisūcakaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:436_2: stutvā khāṇḍavavanadahane svabhrātṝnagnidāhādamocayaditi pratipāditam / yata ityarthe
GSP33bbdip13u:436_3: vā hiśabdaḥ / atra jaritāryādaya ityeva pāṭho yuktaḥ, na tu jaritaryādaya iti hrasvayuktapāṭhaḥ,
GSP33bbdip13u:436_4: bhāratavirodhāt, tattvapradīpavirodhācceti dhyeyam / dṛśyante hītyanena - devā vedavidyādhikāriṇaḥ
GSP33bbdip13u:436_6: manuṣyatvopādhirnirasto bhavati / jaritārau ādiśabdagṛhītasārisṛkkādau ca sādhyāvyāpaktavāt /
GSP33bbdip13u:440: manuṣyā eva devādayo bhavantīti taduparītyuktam / tatra yadi manuṣyāḥ santo devādayo bhavanti tatpūrvaṃ devatābhāvāddevatoddiṣṭakarmaṇi virodha iti cet -
GSP33bbdip13u:441_1: samādadhatsūtraṃ paṭhitvā'kṣepāṃśaṃ tāvadvyācaṣṭe - virodha iti // manuṣyā eveti /
GSP33bbdip13u:441_2: devādipadayogyā jīvāḥ pūrvaṃ bhūmau kiñcitkālaṃ manuṣyāḥ santa eva atha devādayo
GSP33bbdip13u:441_3: bhavantītyarthaḥ / na tu manuṣyabhāvaṃ vinetyevaśabdārthaḥ / ityuktamiti // atroktamityanantaraṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:441_4: tadayuktamiti śeṣaḥ / kuta ityatastatpakṣe bādhakoktiparaṃ virodha ityaṃśaṃ sahetukaṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:441_6: tatretyavyayaṃ tarhītyarthakaṃ bhavantītyataḥ paraṃ yojyam / yadvā - manuṣyā eva
GSP33bbdip13u:441_8: tarhītyarthakaṃ bhavantītyataḥ paraṃ yojyam / yadvā - manuṣyā eva devādayo bhavantītyuktyā
GSP33bbdip13u:441_9: prāptābhedaśaṅkāṃ vārayituṃ manuṣyā evetyādisvapadāni varṇayati - tatreti // yadvā
GSP33bbdip13u:441_10: - tatra devatoddiṣṭakarmaṇīti sāmānādhikaraṇyam / atra pakṣe yadīti śravaṇāttarhīti
GSP33bbdip13u:441_12: karmapadaṃ śabdasyāpyupalakṣakam / tathā ca yadi pūrvaṃ manuṣyāḥ santo 'pyatha devādayo
GSP33bbdip13u:441_13: bhavantītyuktamityucyate, tarhi 'tatpūrvaṃ'; tebhyaḥ pūrvaṃ teṣāṃ devādipadaprāpteḥ
GSP33bbdip13u:441_14: pūrvaṃ sādhakatvāvasthāyāṃ 'devatābhāvāt'; devatāyā asattvāt yena karmaṇā devāditvaṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:441_16: pravṛttakarmaṇi devatāvācakaśabde ca 'virodhaḥ'; tayorvaiyarthyamiti yojanā / uddeśyābhāvādvācyābhāvācceti
GSP33bbdip13u:442: [BBsBh_1,3.8.7] na, anekeṣāṃ devatāpadapratipatterdarśanāt / 'te ha nākaṃ mahimānassacante / yatra pūrve sādhyāssanti devāḥ'; iti // 27 //
GSP33bbdip13u:443_0: [BBsBhDīp_1,3.8.7] parihārāṃśaṃ vyācaṣṭe - neti // idaṃ cāvartate / yojanā tu - na
GSP33bbdip13u:443_1: karmaṇi virodha, kutaḥ? yato na pūrvaṃ devatābhāva iti / teṣāṃ pravāhato 'nāditvenaitaddevānāṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:443_2: pūrvamabhāve 'pi devatāntarasadbhāvāditi bhāvaḥ / na ca tatra pramāṇābhāva ityataḥ
GSP33bbdip13u:444_0: anenataduparītyatroktaṃ devānāṃ sāditvamayuktaṃ, tathā sati yena karmaṇā devāditvaṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:444_1: sādhyamityuktam, tatra karmaṇi śabde ca virodhastasya vaiyarthyaṃ syāt tatpūrvaṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:444_2: devatābhāvāditi cet - na, yato na pūrvaṃ devatābhāvaḥ / tatkatham? etaddevānāṃ pūrvamabhāve
GSP33bbdip13u:444_3: 'pi devāntarasadbhāvāt / na ca tatra mānābhāvaḥ / 'anekapratipatterdarśanāt'; anekeṣāṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:444_4: yogyamanuṣyāṇāṃ pūrvapūrvapadaprāpteḥ 'teha nākam'; ityatroktatvāditi sūtrārtha ukto
GSP33bbdip13u:444_5: bhavati / śrutau 'yajñena yajñamayajanta devāḥ / tāni dharmāṇi prathamānyāsan'; iti
GSP33bbdip13u:444_6: pūrvavākye prakṛtāḥ devāstacchabdena gṛhyante / haśabdaḥ punararthe prasiddhau vā /
GSP33bbdip13u:444_7: tathā ca ye 'devāḥ'; devatvayogyāḥ manuṣyā jñānakarmātmakena 'yajñena'; 'yajñaṃ';
GSP33bbdip13u:444_8: viṣṇum 'ayajanta'; apūjayan / tatastena jñānapūrvakakarmaṇā devapadaṃ prāpya 'prathamāni';
GSP33bbdip13u:444_9: prathamāḥ mukhyāḥ 'dharmāṇi'; dharmāḥ lokadhārakā āsan / 'mahimānaḥ'; mahātmānaḥ
GSP33bbdip13u:444_10: mahimaguṇātmakā vā / 'te'; devāḥ 'ha'; punaḥ anantaraṃ svādhikārāvasāne 'nākaṃ';
GSP33bbdip13u:444_11: kaṃ sukhaṃ tadanyat duḥkhamakaṃ, tanneti nākaṃ, nañdvayena pūrṇasukhātmakamiti labhyate /
GSP33bbdip13u:444_12: evaṃbhūtaṃ mokṣaṃ 'sacante'; āpnuvan / laṅarthe laṭ / laṅvā, etvāḍabhāvau chāndasau /
GSP33bbdip13u:445: ṛjavo brahmamukhyā hi suparṇaśśeṣa eva ca /
GSP33bbdip13u:447_0: ityuktāḥ sādhyādayo devāḥ santīti śrutyarthaḥ / na ca vasurudrādityamarutsādhyeṣu
GSP33bbdip13u:447_1: vasūnāmāditvāt ṭīkāyāṃ vasvādidevā iti vaktavyam, na tu sādhyādīti / ata eva tattvapradīpe
GSP33bbdip13u:447_2: 'pūrve sādhyāḥ vasvādayo devāḥ pūrvasiddhā muktā vā'; ityuktamiti vācyam / sādhyaśabditānāṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:447_5: vācyam / ye padaṃ prāpya jagaddhārakā abhūvan te devā yajñena yajñamayajanta te ha
GSP33bbdip13u:447_6: nākaṃ mokṣagatātiśayaṃ sacante iti śruterarthāntaravivakṣayā tadupapattestadanusāreṇa
GSP33bbdip13u:452_1: tadākṣipya samādadhatsūtraṃ paṭhitvā'kṣepāṃśaṃ tāvadvyācaṣṭe - śabda iti // anekapratipatterdarśanānna
GSP33bbdip13u:452_2: virodha ityādyanuṣajyate / yaditarhyerapyanuṣaṅgaḥ / tathā cetthaṃ yojanā - yadyanekeṣāṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:452_3: pūrvapūrvamuktyā devatāpadaprāpterdarśanānna karmaṇi virodha iti ucyate, tarhi tatraiva
GSP33bbdip13u:452_4: śabde darśanapadokte vede 'prāmāṇyākhyo virodhaḥ syāt / kutaḥ? devānāmanityatvāt /
GSP33bbdip13u:452_7: hetuḥ sūcitaḥ / nanu devānāmanityatve 'pi na tadvācakavedasya vācyahīnatvarūpāprāmāṇyaṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:452_9: - vedasya nityatvāditi // vedasya nityatvameva kuta ityata uktaṃ - vāceti // śruterityasya
GSP33bbdip13u:452_11: (pauṣyāyaṇaśrutiḥ) 'nityā vāva śrutiḥ'; ityādikaṃ gṛhyate / nanu na nityo vedaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:452_13: 'pyāha / tathā sati vedasyānityatvādaprāmāṇyākhyavirodhaḥ syāditi / nanu vedasyānityatve
GSP33bbdip13u:452_15: śeṣaḥ / tathā ca kartuḥ sārvajñādau mānābhāvena vedakartuḥ sārvajñādirūpāptyaniścayādityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:452_16: yadvā - astu vā kartaryāptiniścayaḥ, tathāpi na vede tanmūlatvaniścaya ityāha - āptyaniścayāditi //
GSP33bbdip13u:452_19: vācyamiti bhāvaḥ / na kevalaṃ śrutervedanityatvasiddhiḥ, kintu pariśeṣānumānādapītyāha
GSP33bbdip13u:452_21: ayaṃ bhāvaḥ - prāmāṇyasiddhyarthaṃ vedasyāptapraṇītatve mūlapramāṇena bhāvyaṃ, pauruṣeyasya
GSP33bbdip13u:452_24: mūlānveṣaṇe 'navasthāpattyā nityatvameva vācyaṃ, tato varaṃ vedasyaiva nityatvāṅgīkaraṇaṃ,
GSP33bbdip13u:455_2: samaṃ bādhakamityata āha - svata iti // vedasyetyanuvartate / tathā ca 'vedasya';
GSP33bbdip13u:455_6: pramitatvādityarthaḥ / asyāpi vedasya nityatvasambhavādityanenānvayaḥ / tathā ca
GSP33bbdip13u:457_3: punaśśabdaḥ / uttarakalpa ityarthe vā / anyabhāvaḥ anyotpattiḥ / tasya niyame pramāṇābhāvādityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:457_4: atītadevatāpravāhe tu pramāṇamastīti vaiṣamyamiti bhāvaḥ / anenottarakāle devatābhāvavirodhaḥ
GSP33bbdip13u:457_5: karmaṇyapi samāna iti sautraśabdaśabdena karmāpyupalakṣaṇīyamityuktaṃ bhavati / na
GSP33bbdip13u:457_7: tasya ca na kevalaṃ śabde uttarakāle devatābhāvavirodhaḥ, karmaṇyapītyetadarthakatvāditi
GSP33bbdip13u:457_8: vācyam / ākarṣaṇaśabdasyānvayārthatvamāśritya na kevalaṃ pūrvasūtre virodhapadānvayaḥ,
GSP33bbdip13u:457_10: astu vā dvandvaḥ, tathāpi nānupapattiḥ, apeḥ svarūpanityatvābhāve 'pītyarthābhyupagamena
GSP33bbdip13u:457_11: karmasamuccayārthatvānabhyupagamāt / ata eva ṭīkāyāṃ devānāṃ svarūpanityatvābhāve
GSP33bbdip13u:457_12: 'pītyuktiḥ / atra nityatvasādhakayoḥ śrutyanumānayoḥ samuccaye ekaścaśabdaḥ / anityatvabādhakasya
GSP33bbdip13u:457_13: nityatve tadabhāvasya ca samuccaye 'nyaḥ / anityatvānyabhāvaniyamābhāvayoḥ samuccaye
GSP33bbdip13u:460_0: iti ṛgyajurmantrārthastu na vilakṣaṇatvādhikaraṇaṭīkāyāmuktaḥ / tatra yadyapi virūpeti
GSP33bbdip13u:460_2: virodho bhāti / tathāpi virūparṣikartṛkaṃ svāntaryāmisambodhanamiti tadarthābhyupagamānna
GSP33bbdip13u:460_3: virodhaḥ / uktaṃ hi tattvapradīpe - prerayeti prārthanaṃ virūpasya ṛṣerantaryāmiviṣayamiti /
GSP33bbdip13u:460_4: virūpakartṛkaṃ taduddeśyakaṃ sambodhanamiti pakṣe 'pi svātmaśabditasvajīvaṃ pratisambodhanamiti
GSP33bbdip13u:460_5: ṭīkārthābhyupagamānna virodhaḥ / asmin pakṣe tattvapradīpoktaṃ vyākhyānāntaraṃ bhaviṣyati /
GSP33bbdip13u:460_7: pratyetaducyata ityuktatvāttadvirodha iti vācyam / prathamaṃ yamadṛṣṭasya mantrasyānantaraṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:460_8: virūpeṇāpi dṛṣṭatvasambhavena tadā svasambodhanasambhavenāvirodhāt / tathā ca he
GSP33bbdip13u:460_9: virūpa abhito dyauḥ prakāśo yasyāsāvabhidyuḥ, tasmai 'vṛṣṇe'; varṣiṇe atisamarthāyeti
GSP33bbdip13u:460_10: vā / tattvapradīparītyā vṛṣā śreṣṭhastasya caturthī vṛṣṇe iti vā / tasmai bhagavate
GSP33bbdip13u:464: ityādeḥ, ata eva śabdātteṣāṃ prabhavaniyamāt mahatāṃ pratyakṣāt /
GSP33bbdip13u:465_0: [BBsBhDīp_1,3.8.11] parihārāṃśaṃ vyākhyāti - neti // virodha ityasti / tathā ca vedasya
GSP33bbdip13u:465_1: vācyahīnatvaprayuktāprāmāṇyākhyavirodho netyarthaḥ / kuta ityataḥ prāptaṃ prabhavāditi
GSP33bbdip13u:465_4: 'niyamāt'; pratikalpaṃ niyamenotpatteriti yāvat / tathā ca devānāṃ svarūpeṇa nityatvābhāve
GSP33bbdip13u:465_5: 'pi pravāharūpeṇa nityatvānna tadvācakavedāprāmāṇyamiti bhāvaḥ / nanu pramāṇābhāvādasiddho
GSP33bbdip13u:465_6: heturityataḥ prāptamataḥśabdamanūdya sāvadhāraṇatvena vyācaṣṭe - ata eva śabdāditi /
GSP33bbdip13u:465_7: ko 'sau śabda ityato yasminvirodhaḥ śaṅkitastasmādeva, nānyasmādaprakṛtādityāśayena
GSP33bbdip13u:465_8: tadudāharati - sūryetyādinā / śruto 'smin kalpe 'pīti śeṣaḥ / nanūtpādakābhāva ityato
GSP33bbdip13u:465_10: asmin pakṣe ataśśabdāditi vyākhyānāntaram / nanvakalpayaditi laṅyogādiyaṃ śrutiratītaviṣayaiva,
GSP33bbdip13u:465_11: ato na devaprabhavaniyamaṃ pramāpayatītyato 'pyāha - ata eveti / tathā ca dhātā yathā
GSP33bbdip13u:465_12: pūrvakalpe sūryācandramasāvakalpayat tathāsminkalpe 'pīti pratikalpaṃ śrutyā kathane
GSP33bbdip13u:465_13: devānāṃ sarvakalpeṣu prajananākhyasadbhāvasiddheradhyāhāraṃ vinā ataevaśabdāt buddhisthāt
GSP33bbdip13u:465_15: iti bhāvaḥ / nanu śrutāvupacāreṇāpyuktiḥ sambhavatīti na tayā devaprabhavaniyamaniścaya
GSP33bbdip13u:465_16: ityataḥ prāptaṃ pratyakṣetyaṃśaṃ vyācaṣṭe - mahatāmiti / atītānāgatavidāmityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:467: dṛśyante tāni tānyeva tathā bhāvā yugādiṣu //
GSP33bbdip13u:468: ityādirūpāt 'mahatāṃ'; bhāratācāryāṇāṃ 'pratyakṣāt'; pratyakṣavacanādityarthaḥ / asmin pakṣe 'pratyakṣāt'; niścitātpratyakṣādityanvayaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:470_1: ityataḥ prāptamanumānetyaṃśaṃ vyācaṣṭe - yatheti / idānīntanakāle yathā devāssanti
GSP33bbdip13u:470_4: vakṣyamāṇayuktyantarasamuccaye ca / anumānākārastu - uparitanakālo devavān apralayakālatvāt
GSP33bbdip13u:470_7: 'vācā virūpa nityayā'; ityādiśrutau nityatayā siddhe vede karmaṇi cottarakalpe vācyoddeśyahīnatvarūpāprāmāṇyākhyo
GSP33bbdip13u:470_8: virodhaḥ syāditi cet - na, kutaḥ? 'prabhavāt'; devānāṃ sarvakalpeṣu prabhavaniyamānnityamenopapatteḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:470_9: teṣāṃ pravāhato nityatvāditi yāvat / na cotpādakābhāvaḥ / 'ato'; viṣṇoreva prabhavāt /
GSP33bbdip13u:470_13: tathā mahadbhyaḥ itareṣāmayogināmanumānācca tatsiddheriti sūtrārtha ukto bhavati /
GSP33bbdip13u:470_14: 'yathaiva'; iti śrutyarthastu - yathā pūrvayugātyaye kalpātyaye vā punaryugakalpāntarotpattiriti
GSP33bbdip13u:470_15: kāle prabhavaniyamaḥ, tathā surāderdevopadevādeḥ pūrvapūrvakalpātyaye punaranyabhāvaniyamo
GSP33bbdip13u:473_0: iti / pratikalpamiti śeṣaḥ / tasmātpūrvakalpa ivottarakalpe 'pi pūrvakalpasadṛśasarvotpattiniyamādeva
GSP33bbdip13u:473_2: devatāprabhavaśūnyaṃ na bhaviṣyati, kintu tatsadbhāvopetameva bhaviṣyatīti / yadvā
GSP33bbdip13u:473_3: - 'etat'; cetanācetanātmakaṃ viśvamanīdṛśaṃ na bhaviṣyati, kintu nāmarūpābhyāmīdṛśameva
GSP33bbdip13u:473_4: bhaviṣyatītyarthaḥ / tattvapradīpe tviyaṃ śrutiḥ 'yathaiva kālaniyamaḥ'; iti vyatyāsena
GSP33bbdip13u:477: ata eva śabdasya nityatvādeva ca devapravāhanityatvaṃ yuktam // 29//
GSP33bbdip13u:478_1: vyācaṣṭe - ataeveti // ataevetyanuvādaḥ / tasya vyākhyānaṃ - 'śabdasya'; vedasya
GSP33bbdip13u:478_2: nityatvādeveti / evakāreṇa na devapravāhanityatve yuktyantaraṃ gaveṣaṇīyaṃ, kintu
GSP33bbdip13u:478_3: yatpūrvapakṣiṇā vedanityatvaṃ sapramāṇakamuktaṃ, tata eva tadanyathānupapattyaitatsidhyatīti
GSP33bbdip13u:478_5: ataḥśabdavyākhyānaṃ draṣṭavyam / anyathā pūrvapakṣī aprāmāṇyenānyathopapattiṃ brūyāt
GSP33bbdip13u:478_8: ataeva pūrvasūtrabhāṣye caśabdaḥ saṃyojitaḥ / atrāpi bhāṣye caśabdena ca tadvācyadevatāsvarūpasyaiva
GSP33bbdip13u:484_0: [BBsBhDīp_1,3.8.14] nanu na devānāṃ pravāhanityatvenāpi vedaprāmāṇyopapattiḥ / tathā
GSP33bbdip13u:484_1: hi - kiṃ pūrvakalpe muktā eva devā uttarakalpe punarāvartante, tadanye vā / nādyaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:484_4: anyathā nityatvavyāghātāt / vācyadevānāṃ ca nānāvidhanāmarūpavattvādityāśaṅkāṃ pariharatsūtramupanyasya
GSP33bbdip13u:484_5: vyācaṣṭe - samāneti // atrātītapadaṃ prācīnaparam / anāgatapadaṃ ca tadanyabhaviṣyadvartamānaparam /

GSP33bbdip13u:496_5: vyācaṣṭe - madhvādiṣviti // prathamādipadena śiṣṭavākyaṃ, tathā 'devo bhūtvā devānapyeti';
GSP33bbdip13u:496_6: (bṛ.6-1-2.) iti vājasaneyavākyaṃ, tathā 'sa ūrjamupagacchati'; iti śrutyantaravākyaṃ,

GSP33bbdip13u:496_12: sūtre adhyāhṛtaṃ padaṃ, prakaraṇalabdhaṃ vā / madhuśabdo 'madhu'; ityupakramyāmnātaprathamadvitīyādyamṛtavidyāparaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:496_14: etaccāvartanīyam / asambhavāditi sautro heturatrāpi saṃyojyaḥ / tadupapādakoktyaiva

GSP33bbdip13u:503_0: [BBsBhDīp_1,3.8.18] nanu māstu mokṣetaraphalavidyāsu adhikāro devānāṃ, tathāpi 'satyaṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:503_2: ityāśaṅkāṃ pariharatsūtraṃ paṭhitvā vyācaṣṭe - jyotiṣīti // jyotiṣīti sūtrapadānuvādaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:503_3: tasya vyākhyānaṃ - sarvajñatva iti / yadyapi jñāne iti vyākhyeyaṃ, tathāpi viṣayāviśeṣitajñānasyānirūpyatvāt,
GSP33bbdip13u:503_4: yatkiñcidviṣayake jñāne viṣayatayā sarvabhāvasyāsiddhatvāt tajjñāpanāya sarvajñatva
GSP33bbdip13u:503_5: iti vyākhyātam / tena sūtre vastūnāmityantarbhāvasambandhijñāpakaṃ padamadhyāhāryamiti
GSP33bbdip13u:503_6: sūcitaṃ bhavati / caḥ samuccaye / asya hetorasambhavādityanuvṛttahetudvārā madhvādiṣu
GSP33bbdip13u:503_7: anadhikāraṃ manyata iti pūrveṇānvayaḥ / anena madhvādiṣvityādiśabdena mokṣārthavidyā
GSP33bbdip13u:503_8: api grāhyāḥ / jyotiśśabdaśca āvartanīyaḥ jyotiṣīva jyotiṣīti / saptamī ca caitrarathasya
GSP33bbdip13u:503_9: buddhau śāstrārtha itivat yujyate iti sūcitam / kathaṃ vastūnāṃ jñāne antarbhāva
GSP33bbdip13u:503_10: ityataḥ sarvajñatve bhāvāditi svapade varṇayati - āditya iti / sarvavastūnāmādityaprakāśe
GSP33bbdip13u:503_11: antarbhāvavat tadgṛhītatvavat tajjñāne taduparīti prastutadevatākartṛkajñāne sarvavastūnām
GSP33bbdip13u:503_16: 'nityasiddhatvāt'; niyamena tairjñātatvādityarthaḥ / tathā ca na devānāmubhayavidyāsādhyajñāne
GSP33bbdip13u:503_17: 'rthitā sambhavatīti bhāvaḥ / anayorapi pañcamyantayoḥ pūrvavadanvayaḥ / na cāsya
GSP33bbdip13u:503_18: hetoḥ pūrvasūtroktāsambhavahetūpapādakatvāt kathamatra caśabda iti vācyam / pūrvaṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:503_19: phalamukhena atra ca sādhanamukhena arthitvāsambhavasya abhipretatvena asya hetordvitīyāsambhavopapādakatve
GSP33bbdip13u:503_20: 'pi asambhavasāmānye upapādakatvena caśabdopapatteḥ / yadyapi bhāṣye 'jyotiṣi'; iti
GSP33bbdip13u:503_21: sūtraṃ kiṃ devānāṃ mokṣetaraphalārthāyām? uta mokṣaphalārthāyāṃ vidyāyāmadhikāra
GSP33bbdip13u:503_22: iti pakṣadvaye 'pi sādhānamukhena doṣoktiparatayā pratīyate / ṭīkāyāṃ tu mokṣārthavidyāyāmapi
GSP33bbdip13u:503_24: 'rthitvābhāvāt, vidyāyāśca jñānārthatvāt, jñānasya ca prāptatvāditi dvitīyapakṣamātradoṣoktiparatayā
GSP33bbdip13u:503_25: vyākhyātam / tathā ca visaṃvādo bhavati / tathāpi mokṣetaraphalakavidyāsvanadhikāra
GSP33bbdip13u:503_26: iti prācīnapakṣe na kevalaṃ madhuvidyāphale vasutvādau prāptatvāt devānāmarthitvābhāvāt
GSP33bbdip13u:503_28: adhikārābhāva ityasambhavadoṣe upapādakāntaramuktaṃ bhavatīti ṭīkāyāmuktatvānna visaṃvādaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:503_29: ata eva na caśabdānupapattiḥ / prācīnapakṣavivakṣayā tadupapatteḥ / hetvantareṇa
GSP33bbdip13u:503_30: etatsādhayatīti sattarkadīpāvalī ca ādyapakṣavivakṣayā pravṛttā / dvividhavidyāsamuccaye
GSP33bbdip13u:503_31: vā caśabdaḥ / anena - na kevalaṃ mokṣetaraphalārthaṃ madhvādiṣvanadhikāraṃ manyate
GSP33bbdip13u:503_32: jaiminiḥ / kintu ādiśabdena vā āvṛttajyotiśśabdena vā gṛhītāyāṃ 'satyaṃ jñānam';
GSP33bbdip13u:503_33: iti mokṣārthavidyāyāmapi / kutaḥ? 'jyotiṣīva'; ādityaprakāśe iva 'jyotiṣi'; sarvaviṣayakadevatājñāne
GSP33bbdip13u:503_34: sarvavastūnāṃ viṣayatayā 'bhāvāt'; mokṣasādhanajñānasya siddhatvāt / ata eva na mokṣe,
GSP33bbdip13u:503_35: tasyāpi siddhaprāyatvādarthitvāsambhavāt / na kevalaṃ vasvādidevānāṃ phale 'rthitvābhāvāt
GSP33bbdip13u:503_38: vastūnāṃ viṣayatayā antarbhāvātphalasādhanajñānasya siddhatvāditi yāvaditi vā sūtrārtha
GSP33bbdip13u:507: phalaviśeṣabhāvātprāptapadānāmapi devānāṃ madhvādiṣvapyadhikāraṃ bādarāyaṇo manyante / asti hi prakāśaviśeṣaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:508_1: mokṣasyāpi brahmajñānitvena arthato labdhatvādarthitvābhāvena teṣāṃ kāsvapi vidyāsu
GSP33bbdip13u:508_2: adhikārābhāve jaiminimatāvalambinā samarthite punaradhikāraṃ samarthayatsūtraṃ paṭhitvā
GSP33bbdip13u:508_3: vyācaṣṭe - bhāvamiti // phalaviśeṣabhāvādityanena sūtre pūrvasmādbhāvādityasya anuvṛttiḥ
GSP33bbdip13u:508_4: sūcitā / prāptapadānāmiti / padyata iti padaṃ prāpyaphalamātram / apītyanena viśeṣārtho
GSP33bbdip13u:508_5: 'pi / tuśabdo 'pyarthaḥ / apiśca yadyapi tathāpītyarthe ityuktaṃ bhavati / devānāmiti
GSP33bbdip13u:508_7: gṛhyante / 'adhikāram'; adhikārabhāvamiti / anena 'bhāvam'; ityasyārtha uktaḥ / manyata
GSP33bbdip13u:508_8: iti śeṣoktiḥ / astītyasya kartṛsāpekṣatvāt taṃ darśayati - prakāśaviśeṣa iti / jñānātiśaya
GSP33bbdip13u:508_9: ityarthaḥ / hiśabdo yata ityarthe / tathā cetthaṃ yojanā - bādarāyaṇastu bhagavān
GSP33bbdip13u:508_10: devānāṃ madhvādyaśeṣavidyāsu adhikārabhāvaṃ manyate / na ca prāptaphalatvāttatra
GSP33bbdip13u:508_11: arthitvābhāvo doṣaḥ / yadyapi devāḥ prāptapadāḥ brahmajñānitvātsiddhamokṣataditaraphalāḥ
GSP33bbdip13u:508_13: phalaviśeṣabhāvātsvasvayogyasya jñānamātreṇa asādhyasya mokṣaphale atiśayasya bhāvāt
GSP33bbdip13u:508_14: siddherarthitvasambhavāt / na ca phale 'tiśayasya siddhatvena tatrārthitvasambhave
GSP33bbdip13u:508_16: iti vācyam / 'hi'; yato bhagavaditareṣāṃ nirupacaritasārvajñābhāvāt vidyāvicāreṇa
GSP33bbdip13u:512: sarvaṃ vidhīyate nityaṃ sarvayajñādikarma ca / iti skānde /
GSP33bbdip13u:513_1: phalaṃ prakāśaviśeṣaśca devānāṃ bhavatītyetat kuto jñāyate ityāśaṅkāṃ parihartumuktārthe
GSP33bbdip13u:513_2: hiśabdasūcitāṃ smṛtiṃ darśayati - yāvaditi // kriyata iti śeṣaḥ / svārthe tal / bhāvabhavitrorabhedavivakṣayā
GSP33bbdip13u:513_3: vā / siddhyatyasyeti śeṣaḥ / co hetusamuccaye / yadvā - ādyaścaḥ prakāśasya ceti
GSP33bbdip13u:513_5: tathā ca 'pare tattve'; paramātmasvarūpe 'asau vā ādityaḥ'; (chāṃ.3-1-1.) ityādinokte
GSP33bbdip13u:513_8: svargāpavargādisukhe 'tiśayaḥ svasvayogyo jñānamātreṇa sādhyaḥ siddhyati / yato 'taḥ
GSP33bbdip13u:513_10: ata eva vidyāvicāreṇa sādhyasya prakāśasya jñānaviśeṣasya sambhavāt, ata evārthitvasya
GSP33bbdip13u:513_13: ca 'nityaṃ'; niyamena 'vidhīyate'; śrutiṣu kartavyatvena bodhyata iti yojanā / caḥ
GSP33bbdip13u:513_14: samuccaye / aprakāśasyeti pāṭhe nirupacaritasārvajñyābhāvasyetyarthaḥ / tadā prakāśasya
GSP33bbdip13u:513_15: caśabdena grahaṇam / sambhavādityasya siddhatvāt sattvādityarthadvayam / pāṭhadvaye
GSP33bbdip13u:513_16: 'pyanyeṣāmiti śeṣaḥ / ekaśabdo avadhāraṇārtho viriñcasyāpi varjyatvanivārakaḥ skānde
GSP33bbdip13u:513_17: uktamiti śeṣaḥ / ataḥ phalaviśeṣabhāvādasti hi prakāśaviśeṣa ityanayornāsiddhiriti
GSP33bbdip13u:515_1: ityata āha - ukteti // uktaṃ ca tat phalaṃ ca uktaṃ phalaṃ yasyeti ca vigrahaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:515_2: tathā ca tattadvidyoktaphalārthaṃ tatphalakaprāgāptajñānārthaṃ ca yo 'yamadhikārastadabhāvamātraṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:515_4: vyāvartyate / kimato yadyevamityata āha - ata iti jaiminyuktasya sūtrakāreṇāpyaṅgīkṛtatvāt,
GSP33bbdip13u:515_5: sūtrakṛduktasya ca jaimininā anirastatvānna tayorvirodhaḥ ityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:520_1: na syādityata āha - sarvajñasyeti // tuśabdo viśeṣārthaḥ / evakāro bhinnakramaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:520_2: tathā ca yasmāt 'munayo'; jaiminyādyāḥ nirupacaritasarvajñasya 'kṛṣṇasya'; dvaipāyanasya
GSP33bbdip13u:520_4: nānyat / tasmāt 'tanmataṃ'; teṣāṃ kṛṣṇamunīnāṃ mataṃ parasparaṃ na viruddhyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:520_5: brāhma ityanantaraṃ uktamiti śeṣaḥ / ato viṣayavailakṣaṇyameva kalpyaṃna matavirodha
GSP33bbdip13u:523: [BBsBh_1,3.9.1] manuṣyādhikāratvādityukte 'viśeṣācchūdrasyāpi 'ahaṃ hāretvā śūdra'; (chāṃ.4.2.3.) iti pautrāyaṇokteradhikāra iti /
GSP33bbdip13u:524_2: ca sūcayati - manuṣyeti // nimittasaptamīyam / adhikāropayogitayokte manuṣyatve aviśeṣāditi
GSP33bbdip13u:524_3: vā / na kevalaṃ dvijātīnāṃ, kintu śūdrasyāpītyaperthaḥ / tathā ca śūdrasyāpi vedavidyādhikāraḥ
GSP33bbdip13u:524_5: manuṣyatve ca śūdrasya dvijātibhyaḥ 'aviśeṣāt'; viśeṣābhāvāt / nanu na manuṣyatvaṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:524_10: nanu pautrāyaṇākhyapuruṣasya śūdratvameva kuta ityataḥ tajjñāpakamāha - aha hāretvā
GSP33bbdip13u:525_1: 'pi pautrāyaṇo vedavidyāṃ vicārayāmāseti kiṃ na syādityatopyāha - pautrāyaṇokteriti /
GSP33bbdip13u:525_2: pautrāyaṇaṃ prati raikkeṇa nispṛheṇa muninā saṃvargavidyopadeśādityarthaḥ / anadhikāriṇaṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:525_3: prati munerupadeśāsambhavāt / pautrāyaṇasya arthācchrutāvadhikārokteśceti vā yojanā /
GSP33bbdip13u:525_4: adhikāra ityanantaramato virodha ityanukṛṣyate / tasyokta ityanenānvayaḥ / anenoktanyāyena
GSP33bbdip13u:526_0: chāndogye caturthādhyāye saṃvargaprakaraṇe hītthamākhyāyikā - pautrāyaṇo nāma rājā
GSP33bbdip13u:526_1: prāsādāgre niśāyāṃ śayāno 'bhūt / tadā prāsādopari haṃsapakṣiṇo 'gaman / uparipatatāṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:526_2: parasparaṃ vārtāṃ kurvatāṃ teṣāṃ madhye dvāvagragāmināvāstām / tatraika ekamuvāca /
GSP33bbdip13u:526_3: kimiti? are pautrāyaṇīyaṃ tejastvaṃ māgamaḥ / tatsambandhe tadīyaṃ tejastvāṃ dahediti /
GSP33bbdip13u:526_4: evamuktaḥ paro haṃsaḥ kamityākṣepavacanena rājānamanādṛtya raikvamunimeva praśaśaṃsa /
GSP33bbdip13u:526_5: tacchrutvā paritaptamanā rājā talpādutthitastvarayā svasārathimāhūya raikvagaveṣaṇāyādideśa /
GSP33bbdip13u:526_6: sa tatra tatra raikvamanviṣyan nāvidamiti prathamamāgataḥ / punastallakṣaṇoktipūrvakaṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:526_7: rājñā tanmārgaṇāyādiṣṭaḥ punaranviyaṣya kvacitpradeśe raikvamavalokya punā rājānaṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:526_8: pratyetyāha - raikvamavidamiti yathāvṛttamavadat / tadā rājā svasārathivacanena raikvamunisthānaṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:526_9: niścitya tasmāttattvaṃ vividiṣurgurudakṣiṇāṃ gṛhītvā tatsamīpaṃ jagāma / atha dvāri
GSP33bbdip13u:526_10: śakaṭasyādhasthāt sthitaṃ raikvaṃ dṛṣṭvā sambodhya dakṣiṇāṃ nivedya mahyaṃ vidyāṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:526_11: brūhītyuvāca / tadā taṃ pautrāyaṇaṃ paro lokavilakṣaṇo raikvaḥ pratyācakhyau / kimiti?
GSP33bbdip13u:526_12: ahahāretvā śūdretyādi / atra ahetisambodhanaṃ, hāra itveti bhinnapadatve visargalope
GSP33bbdip13u:526_13: guṇe hāretveti bhavati / tathā ca he śūdra hāraḥ kaṇṭhamālākhyaṃ bhūṣaṇaṃ itvā rathaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:526_14: tattvapradīparītyā śakaṭo vā / gobhissaha tavāstvityarthaḥ hāretvānāvityekapadatvapakṣe
GSP33bbdip13u:526_15: dvivacanasya ekavacanādeśo vā ākārādeśo vā kartavyaḥ / pratyekaṃ ca astu iti kriyāsambandhaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:532_3: - neti / 'asau'; raikveṇa sambodhitaḥ pautrāyaṇo 'na śūdraḥ'; jātyā śūdro na, kintu
GSP33bbdip13u:532_4: kṣatriya ityarthaḥ / tarhi kathamasya śūdreti sambodhitatvaṃ yujyate rūḍhyabhāvādityato
GSP33bbdip13u:532_6: matvā vyācaṣṭe - śuceti / 'śucā'; śokena raikvaṃ kṣattāraṃ vā pratyāśugamanameva
GSP33bbdip13u:532_7: 'śūdratvam'; śūdretisambodhane nimittaṃ, na tu jātirityarthaḥ / anena tadādravaṇādityasya
GSP33bbdip13u:532_9: sūcitaḥ / tathā ca na sambodhanānupapattiriti nedaṃ śūdrasya vedavidyādhikāre liṅgamityato
GSP33bbdip13u:532_10: na śūdrasya vedavidyādhikāra iti nañāvṛttyā anvayaḥ / evetyanena ayaṃ śūdraśabdaḥ
GSP33bbdip13u:532_11: śucādravaṇācchūdra iti nairukta eva, na tu 'śucerdaśca'; ityuṇādisūtreṇa rapratyaye
GSP33bbdip13u:532_12: dhātoścadīrghe cakārasya dakārādeśe ca niṣpanno rūḍha ityuktaṃ bhavati / pautrāyaṇa
GSP33bbdip13u:532_14: tvapratyayena nimittārthakapañcamyarthaśca darśitaḥ / sūtrakārasya sadā sarvajñatvena
GSP33bbdip13u:532_15: śugasyetyuktiḥ / bhāṣye 'saḥ'; iti śrutyanusāreṇa asāviti parokṣeṇoktiśca yuktā /
GSP33bbdip13u:534_0: [BBsBhDīp_1,3.9.3] kasmānnimittādasya śoka ityasyottaratayā pravṛttaṃ śugasya tadanādaraśravaṇāditisūtrakhaṇḍaṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:534_1: vyācaṣṭe - kamvara iti // kaṃ u are iti padacchedaḥ / 'are'; haṃsa etadvacanaṃ kamenamuddiśyāttha
GSP33bbdip13u:534_2: 'santaṃ'; nirduṣṭaṃ 'sayugvānaṃ'; saśakaṭaṃ raikvamityevetyarthaḥ / u iti nipātaḥ,
GSP33bbdip13u:534_3: asya nindārthaḥ / asmin rājñi vaktumananurūpamidam, evaṃ vaktuṃ raikva eva yogya
GSP33bbdip13u:534_5: atra santamiti vā / ityanādaraśravaṇāditi / anādaro nindā / tathā ca ityevaṃrūpasya
GSP33bbdip13u:534_6: haṃsakṛtānādarabodhakavākyasya haṃsāt svānādaravākyasya vā śravaṇādityarthaḥ / śravaṇādityanantaraṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:535: [BBsBh_1,3.9.4] 'sa ha sañjihāna eva kṣattāramuvāca'; (chāṃ.4.1.5.) iti sūcyate hi // 34 //
GSP33bbdip13u:536_0: [BBsBhDīp_1,3.9.4] nanu śrutānādarasyāpi rājñaḥ kuḥ śokotpattiḥ jñāyate / na ca pratyakṣāttanniścayaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:536_2: ca kāraṇānumānāt kāryānumitiḥ / kāraṇasya kāryāvinābhāvābhāvādityataḥ pravṛttaṃ 'sūcyate
GSP33bbdip13u:536_3: hi'; iti sūtraśeṣaṃ vyācaṣṭe - saheti / hetyāścarye / 'saḥ'; śrutānādaraḥ pautrāyaṇaḥ
GSP33bbdip13u:536_5: śrutyarthaḥ / iti sūcyate hīti / ityetadvākyārthānyathānupapattyā jñātena raikve
GSP33bbdip13u:536_6: vyāsaktamanaskatvena kāryeṇa tatkāraṇaṃ śugasya 'sūcyate'; jñāyata ityarthaḥ / kāraṇasya
GSP33bbdip13u:536_7: kāryāvinābhāvābhāve 'pi kāryasya kāraṇāvinābhāvasyāvaśyaṃ bhāvāditi bhāvaḥ / asya
GSP33bbdip13u:536_8: tadanādarasya śravaṇāt prāptayā śucā'dravaṇameveti pūrveṇānvayaḥ / śokenādravaṇākhyanimittaparijñānaṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:539_1: ityasmāt kvipi rūpametat tathātve yata iti śeṣaḥ / nanu sūtre taddravaṇādityetāvatā
GSP33bbdip13u:539_2: pūrtau āṅpraśleṣaḥ kimartha iti cet - na, śrutau śūdretivaktavyatve 'pi śokādhikyajñāpanārthaṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:539_3: śūdreti ūkārarūpo yo dīrghasvaraḥ śrutaḥ tadarthavyaktavyarthatvāt / na ca śūgdretivaktavye
GSP33bbdip13u:539_4: śrutau śūdretyuktiḥ kathamiti vācyam / 'tasmādrugdrāvaṇāt rudraḥ'; iti śrutau gakārasya
GSP33bbdip13u:539_5: dakārādeśena yathāprayogastathopapatteḥ / ata eva tattvapradīpe tṛtīyasya tṛtīyo
GSP33bbdip13u:539_7: 'ādravaṇāt'; raikvaṃ prati śīghragamanādeva nimittādasya pautrāyaṇasya śūdratvaṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:539_8: śūdreti sambodhitatvam, na tu varṇāvaratvāt / śukca śokaścāsya tadanādaraśravaṇādāsīt /
GSP33bbdip13u:539_9: taditi śrutyuktaparāmarśaḥ / kriyākartṛbhāvaṣṣaṣṭhyarthaḥ / tathā ca 'tasya anādaraśravaṇāt';
GSP33bbdip13u:539_11: madhyamapadalopī samāsa iti kecit / nanu śrutānādarasyāpi kutaḥ śokotpattirjñāyate,
GSP33bbdip13u:539_12: parabuddheḥ śokapadoktaduḥkhānubhavasya apratyakṣatvādityata uktaṃ - sūcyate hīti //
GSP33bbdip13u:539_14: tatkāraṇaṃ śugasya 'sūcyate'; jñāyate / tasmāt ato na śūdreti sambodhanaṃ śūdrasya
GSP33bbdip13u:539_15: vedādhikāre liṅgamiti naitadbalācchūdrasya vedavidyādhikāra iti bhāvaḥ iti sūtrārtha
GSP33bbdip13u:543: 'ayamaśvatarī rathaḥ'; iti citrarathasambandhitvena liṅgena pautrāyaṇasya kṣatriyatvāvagateśca /
GSP33bbdip13u:544_0: [BBsBhDīp_1,3.9.5] nanu śūdraśabdo 'yaṃ kuto yaugiko 'ṅgīkriyate, rūḍhārtha eva kiṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:544_1: na syāt / yogarūḍhyormadhye rūḍhereva prābalyāt / tathā ca pautrāyaṇanidarśanenaiva
GSP33bbdip13u:544_3: atra 'ayam'; ityataḥ prāk 'uttaratra'; iti sautrapadaṃ sambandhanīyam / śruteneti
GSP33bbdip13u:544_4: śeṣaḥ / tathā ca uttaratra raikvaṃ prati pautrāyaṇasya ādravaṇāt, uttaratra tatpratipādanānantaram /
GSP33bbdip13u:544_5: yadvā - śūdraśabdena sambodhanāt uttaratra 'ayamaśvatarī rathaḥ'; iti śrutenetyarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:544_6: pautrāyaṇena dīyamānasya rathasya anyadīyatvaśaṅkānirāsāya sūtre caitraratheneti
GSP33bbdip13u:544_7: bhāvapradhānapadaṃ prayuktam / anyathā citrarathenetyevāvakṣyat / tatra citraścāsau
GSP33bbdip13u:544_8: rathaśca citrarathaḥ tasyāyaṃ caitraratha iti vigrahamabhipretya pratyayārthaṃ pradarśayan
GSP33bbdip13u:544_10: atra rathamātrameva liṅgaṃ, citrapadaṃ tu svarūpakathanārtham / yadvā - apūrvarathayogena
GSP33bbdip13u:544_11: kṣatriyatvasambhāvanārthaṃ tatpadam / athavā yadā rathitvenaiva kṣatriyatvasya niścayaḥ,
GSP33bbdip13u:544_12: tadā sutarāṃ citrarathitveneti sūcanārthaṃ tatpadam / yadyapi 'ayamaśvatarīrathaḥ';
GSP33bbdip13u:544_13: ityatra citrarathamātraśravaṇe 'pi na tatsambandho 'sya śrūyate / tathāpi tatpūrvavākye
GSP33bbdip13u:544_14: 'hāretvā tavaiva'; iti ṣaṣṭhyā itvāśabdārtharathasambandho gamyata iti tasyāśca rathasambandhe
GSP33bbdip13u:544_15: śrutirūpatvāt yuktamuktam / citro ratho yasyeti citrarathastasya bhāvaḥ caitrarathasteneti
GSP33bbdip13u:544_16: vyākhyānaṃ tu bhāve 'ṇ pratyayasya kalpyatvāt śrutibhāṣyaviruddhatvācca ayuktam /
GSP33bbdip13u:544_17: na ca caitraratheneti sambandhoktimātreṇa kathamanyadīyatvaśaṅkānirāsa iti vācyam /
GSP33bbdip13u:544_18: svataḥ prāptatadīyatve bādhakābhāve tadīyatvasyaiva svābhāvikatvasambhave naimittikagrahaṇāyogāt /
GSP33bbdip13u:544_20: liṅgāditi pañcamī vyatyayena vyācaṣṭe - liṅganeti / pautrāyaṇasyetyetat asyetyanuvṛttapadasya
GSP33bbdip13u:544_21: arthakathanam / kṣatriyatvāvagaterityasya śucā'dravaṇādevāsya śūdratvaṃ na tu rūḍhyeti
GSP33bbdip13u:544_22: pūrveṇānvayaḥ / caśabdo liṅgena ceti sambadhyate / tena 'bahudāyī'; ityādivākyaśeṣoktaṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:544_23: liṅgaṃ samuccīyate / liṅgasya śrutitaścaramatvena anekatvena ca prābalyasūcanāya
GSP33bbdip13u:544_24: vā caśabdaḥ / evaṃ sūtre 'pi caśabdo bhinnakramaḥ uktaprayojanakaśca / evaṃ ca rūḍhereva
GSP33bbdip13u:544_25: prābalye 'pyatra śrutānekaliṅgarūpabādhakāt śūdraśabdasya yogavṛttyaṅgīkāra eva yukta
GSP33bbdip13u:544_26: iti bhāvaḥ / 'gardabhādaśvāyāṃ jātā aśvataryaḥ'; iti tattvapradīpe / 'gardabhīṣu
GSP33bbdip13u:544_27: aśvairjātā asvataryaḥ'; iti vyāsatīrthīye / tadyukto rathaḥ aśvatarīrathaḥ tava dakṣiṇātvena
GSP33bbdip13u:546_1: kathaṃ sūtrakṛt citrarathaśabdaṃ prāyuṅtetyāśaṅkya ubhayorarthaikyānna visaṃvāda
GSP33bbdip13u:546_2: ityāśayena tatrābhidhānamāha - ratha iti // tuśabdo viśeṣārtho 'vadhāraṇe vā / aśvatarīyukta
GSP33bbdip13u:546_3: eveti sambadhyate / atra ratha iti vāstavaviśeṣoktireva, na tu rathatvasyāpi śakyakoṭipraveśaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:546_4: tathā ca sūtre rathatvaprakārakabodhāya rathaśabdaprayoga iti na tadvaiyarthyamiti
GSP33bbdip13u:546_5: dhyeyam iti brāhme uktatvāt na śrutisūtrayorvairūpyamityupaskāreṇānvayaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:547: [BBsBh_1,3.9.7] yatra vedo rathastatra na vedo yatra no rathaḥ / iti brahmavaivarte // 35 //
GSP33bbdip13u:548_0: [BBsBhDīp_1,3.9.7] evaṃ sākṣādeva svābhāvikarathena pautrāyaṇasya kṣatriyatvaṃ prasādhitam /
GSP33bbdip13u:548_1: svābhāvikarathitve 'sya varṇāvaratvaṃ kiṃ na syādityaprayojakatvamāśaṅkya maivam-āgantukasyāpi
GSP33bbdip13u:548_2: rathasya vedaṃ vināyogāt 'vedasya ca saṃskāreti vakṣyamāṇanyāyena śūdre 'yogāt';
GSP33bbdip13u:548_5: tatraivetyarthaḥ / tena yatra vahniḥ tatraiva dhūma ityādāviva vedasya vyāpakatālābhaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:548_6: ata eva vyatirekapradarśakāṃśe na veda iti vedabhāvasya prathamamuktiḥ / smṛtau rathaśabdena
GSP33bbdip13u:548_8: yatra veda ityuktiḥ / ata eva ṭīkāyāṃ 'rathasya vedāvinābhāvāt'; iti rathasya vyāpyatvamuktvā
GSP33bbdip13u:548_9: 'vaidikatvamātre vidyamānaṃ rathitvam'; ityanena tasya vyāpakatvamuktam / vastutastu
GSP33bbdip13u:548_10: - yatra rathastatra veda iti yojanāyāṃ nānupapattiḥ / tathā ca anena vyāptiniścayāt
GSP33bbdip13u:548_12: pautrāyaṇasya vedabāhyavarṇāvaratvaṃ śaṅkyamiti bhāvaḥ / etena pūrvapakṣiṇā śūdre
GSP33bbdip13u:548_15: taddvārā aśūdratvasiddhāvapi kathaṃ kṣatriyatvaniścaya iti vācyam / rathitvamātrasya
GSP33bbdip13u:548_17: smṛtyabhipretatvāt / tasya ca kādācitkarathavati brāhmaṇādāvabhāvāttena sākṣādeva
GSP33bbdip13u:548_18: kṣatriyatvaniścayopapattiḥ / na ca 'apalāyanaṃ ca śūdrasya'; ityanena prāptayoddhṛtvānyathānupapattyā
GSP33bbdip13u:548_19: śūdrasya rathitvapratītestatra vyabhicāra iti vācyam / apalāyanena yoddhṛtvasya padātitayopapattyā
GSP33bbdip13u:548_20: rathitvānākṣepakatvāt / brahmavaivarta ityasya uktatvādityadhyāhāreṇa nāsau śūdra
GSP33bbdip13u:548_21: ityanenānvayaḥ iti jñāyata iti śeṣaḥ anena - 'ādravaṇāt'; sambodhanādvā 'uttaratra';
GSP33bbdip13u:548_23: liṅgena bahudāyitvādiliṅgena cāsya pautrāyaṇasya kṣatriyatvāvagateḥ / asmāt bādhakāttadādravaṇānnimittādevāsya
GSP33bbdip13u:548_24: śūdratvam, na tu jātyāsau śūdraḥ / tathā rathena vedaniścayācca nāsau śūdra iti sūtrārtha
GSP33bbdip13u:553_1: talliṅgena śūdrasya vedādhikārasiddhiriti / na tadyuktaṃ - śūdrasyāpi rathitvasambhavāt /
GSP33bbdip13u:553_2: na ca rathasya vedavyāpyatvācchūdre ca tadabhāvādrathasyāpyabhāva iti vācyam / śūdre
GSP33bbdip13u:553_8: śeṣaḥ / 'anyārthavacanaṃ parāmarśaḥ'; ityāśayena parāmarśapadaṃ vyācaṣṭe - adhyayanārthamiti //
GSP33bbdip13u:554_2: tacchabdeneti śeṣaḥ / na tu brāhmaṇaparāmarśa iti mātraśabdārthaḥ / tathā ca noktaśaṅkāvakāśa
GSP33bbdip13u:554_3: iti bhāvaḥ / kecittu - śrutigatabrāhmaṇaśabdo 'tra brahmāṇana yogyatraivarṇikapara
GSP33bbdip13u:554_4: ityāhuḥ / taccintyam, śaṅkāsamādhānānanuguṇatvāt / kuta evaṃ kalpyata ityataḥ smṛtāvapyupanayanākhyadvitīyajanmavata
GSP33bbdip13u:554_5: eva sāraṇyaka vedādhyayanavidhānādityāśayena sūtre bhāṣye ca 'vedaḥ kṛtsno 'dhigantavyaḥ
GSP33bbdip13u:554_6: sarahasyo dvijanmanā'; iti smṛtisamuccayārthakaścaśabdaḥ prāyoji / saḥ parāmarśādityanenānveti /
GSP33bbdip13u:555: [BBsBh_1,3.9.9] 'nāgnirna yajño na kriyā na saṃskāro na vratāniśūdrasya'; iti
GSP33bbdip13u:557: [BBsBhDīp_1,3.9.9] nanvastvadhyayanasya upanayanasaṃskārasāpekṣatvaṃ, tathāpi na śūdrasya vedādhyayanābhāvasiddhiḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:558_1: vyācaṣṭe - nāgniriti // abhilāpāt abhidhānāditi / asya sūtre adhyāhṛtena 'na śūdrasya
GSP33bbdip13u:558_2: vedādhikāro, na vā tadavinābhūtaṃ rathitvam'; iti sādhyenānvayaḥ / 'agniḥ', śrautaḥsmārtaśca /
GSP33bbdip13u:559: [BBsBh_1,3.9.10] uttamastrīṇāṃ tu na śūdravat / 'sapatnīṃ me parādhama'; ityādiṣvadhikāradarśanāt /
GSP33bbdip13u:560_1: saṃskārābhāve 'pi tāsāmadhikāre śūdrasyāpi tatprāptirityata āha - uttameti / tuśabdo
GSP33bbdip13u:560_3: śeṣaḥ / uttamānāṃ striya iti vigrahaḥ, karmadhārayo vā / tathā ca śacī yamīūrvaśyādyuttamastrīṇāṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:560_5: me parādhama'; (mantrapraśna 1.16.) ityādividyāsu tāsāṃ taddraṣṭṛtvena adhikāradarśanāditi
GSP33bbdip13u:560_6: yojanā / atra 'sapatnīm'; iti pratīkagrahaṇena 'sapatnīṃ me parādhama'; patiṃ me
GSP33bbdip13u:560_7: kevalaṃ kṛdhi, 'uttarāhamuttara uttareduttarābhyaḥ'; iti samagravākyaṃ gṛhyate /
GSP33bbdip13u:560_8: śacīvākyamidam / he bhagavān 'me sapatnīṃ'; madanyāṃ matpatipāṇigṛhītīṃ 'parādhama';
GSP33bbdip13u:560_9: parāṇuda / mama patiṃ 'kevalaṃ'; mayyevāsaktaṃ kuru / 'ahamuttarābhyaḥ'; saundaryeṇotkṛṣṭābhyaḥ
GSP33bbdip13u:560_10: madantarābhyo vā strībhyaḥ 'uttarā'; utkṛṣṭā satī 'uttaret'; priyottamaiva 'uttare';
GSP33bbdip13u:560_11: sapatnīkleśāduttareyamiti śrutyarthaḥ / ādipadena 'udatī paśyavaḥ soma ekebhyaḥ parvate,
GSP33bbdip13u:560_12: () udasau sūryo agāt'; (ṛ.10.159.1.) ityādi devamātṛyamīpaulomyādidṛṣṭānāṃ grahaṇam /
GSP33bbdip13u:562_1: - saṃskāreti // abhāvo vedādhikārasya / tuśabdaḥ pūrvoktanyāyasya sāmānyatvākhyaviśeṣadyotakaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:562_2: ukta iti śeṣaḥ / tathā ca saṃskārābhāvena hetunā yatsūtre vedādhikārasya abhāva uktaḥ
GSP33bbdip13u:562_3: saḥ 'sāmānyena'; sāmānyanyāyena sāpavādaniyamābhiprāyeṇaiva, na tu nirapavādaniyamena /
GSP33bbdip13u:562_4: ato nāpavādaviṣaye vyabhicāra ityarthaḥ / sāmānyatvavacanena śūdrapratibandī mocitā /
GSP33bbdip13u:562_5: tathā ca saṃskārābhāvena vedādhikārābhāva iti sāmānyavyāpteḥ śacyādiṣu vidyādhikāradarśanākhyāpavādakena
GSP33bbdip13u:562_6: bhaṅge 'pi na śūdrādāvapi tasya bhaṅgaḥ kalpyaḥ, tatra vedavidyādhikāre viśeṣapramāṇākhyāpavādakābhāvāditi
GSP33bbdip13u:564: strīṇāṃ pradānakarmaiva yathopanayanaṃ tathā / iti smṛteḥ // 36 //
GSP33bbdip13u:565_2: astyadhikāra ityāha - asticeti / caḥ adhikārasamuccaye / 'tāsāṃ'; strīṇāṃ kuta etadityata
GSP33bbdip13u:565_3: āha - strīṇāmiti / puṃsāmiti śeṣaḥ / tathā ca puṃsāṃ yathā upanayanaṃ saṃskāraḥ,
GSP33bbdip13u:565_4: tathā strīṇāṃ 'pradānakarmaiva'; vivāhakriyaiva saṃskāra iti vyāsasmṛtyarthaḥ / smṛterityasya
GSP33bbdip13u:565_5: tāsāmityanenānvayaḥ / iti jñāyata iti śeṣaḥ / tathā ca uttamastrīṣviha hetūkṛtasya
GSP33bbdip13u:565_7: na ca saṃskāramātrasya vedādhikāraprayojakatve adhamastrīṇāmapi tadāpattiriti vācyam /
GSP33bbdip13u:565_9: adhikāritvamiti noktanyāyabhaṅga iti vaktuṃ śakyatvāt, kimarthaṃ tāsu saṃskārābhāvamaṅgīkṛtya
GSP33bbdip13u:565_10: uktanyāyasya sāpavādatvavacanamiti cet - na, pradānādiśūnyatiryagādīnāmapi saṅgrahārthatvāt /
GSP33bbdip13u:565_13: parāmarśādvedaḥ kṛtsna iti smṛteścāsya śūdrasya tadabhāvābhilāpānnāgniriti śrutau
GSP33bbdip13u:565_14: saṃskārābhāvābhidhānāt na tasya vedādhikāra iti sūtrārtha ukto bhavati /
GSP33bbdip13u:569_0: 'nāhametadveda bho yadgotrohamasmi'; (chāṃ.4.4.) iti satyavacanena satyakāmasya śūdratvābhāvanirdhāraṇe
GSP33bbdip13u:570_1: 'śūdraṃ nopanayīta'; iti niṣedhābhāvena tasyāpi saṃskārasambhavāt / 'nāgnirna yajñaḥ';
GSP33bbdip13u:570_2: iti śrutau tu śūdrasya saṃskārābhāva evocyate na tu asau na kārya iti niṣidhyate /
GSP33bbdip13u:570_3: ato na tadvirodho 'pītyāśaṅkāṃ pariharatsūtraṃ paṭhitvā vyācaṣṭe - tadabhāveti /
GSP33bbdip13u:570_5: 'satyakāmasya'; tadākhyasya ṛṣeḥ etacca pūrvatrottaratra ca sambadhyate / 'satyavacanena
GSP33bbdip13u:570_6: satyakāmasya'; ityādinā sūtre tacchabdo vyastaḥ anekavibhaktikaḥ buddhyā vivicyāvartate
GSP33bbdip13u:570_7: ityuktaṃ bhavati / śūdratvābhāvanirdhāraṇe cetyasya naitadbrāhmaṇa ityanena sambandhaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:570_11: ārjavavacanaṃ vāṅmanasayoravairūpyeṇa vacanaṃ vivaktuṃ nārhediti vipakṣe tarkoktirūpatayā,
GSP33bbdip13u:570_12: yo 'brāhmaṇaḥ sa evaṃ vaktuṃ nārhati satyavacanahīna iti vyatirekavyāptyuktirūpatayā
GSP33bbdip13u:570_13: vā śūdratvābhaāvanirṇāyakatvam / haridrumato 'patyaṃ hāridrumataḥ gautamaḥ / tasya
GSP33bbdip13u:570_14: pravṛtteriti / asya na tadabhāva iti adhyāhṛtapadenānvayaḥ / tathā cetthaṃ mahāvākyayojanā
GSP33bbdip13u:570_15: - satyakāmasya nāhametadvedeti satyavacanena naitadabrāhmaṇo vivaktumarhatīti vyatirekavyāptijñānena
GSP33bbdip13u:570_16: bādhakatarkeṇa ca śūdratvābhāvanirdhāraṇe satyeva tamanumāyaiva tasya satyakāmasyopanayanasaṃskāre
GSP33bbdip13u:570_17: 'hāridrumatasya'; gautamasya 'pravṛtteḥ'; pravṛttatvāt na śūdrasya tadabhāvaḥ saṃskāraniṣedhābhāva
GSP33bbdip13u:570_18: iti / co hetusamuccaye / anena - sūtre taditi vyastaṃ luptavibhaktikaṃ padaṃ samastaṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:570_19: ca tantreṇopāttam / caśabdo 'vadhāraṇe bhinnakrameṇa, na kevalaṃ śūdrasya saṃskārābhāvaḥ
GSP33bbdip13u:570_20: śrutimātrāt, kintu saṃskāraniṣedhajñāpakaliṅgācceti samuccaye ca / netyasti / tadabhāva
GSP33bbdip13u:570_21: ityanuṣajyate / tathā ca 'tasya'; satyakāmasya 'tena'; satyavacanena manovākkāyakarmaṇāṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:570_22: avaiparītyamārjavaṃ tadeva satyatvaṃ tādṛśavacanena tena jñāpitena ṛjutveneti yāvat /
GSP33bbdip13u:570_24: ca'; tasya śūdratvābhāvanirṇaye satyeva tadabhāvamanumāyaiva 'samidhaṃ somyāharopa
GSP33bbdip13u:570_25: tvāneṣye'; (chāṃ. 4.4.5.) iti tasya tasminnupanayanasaṃskāre tasya gautamasya pravṛtterdarśanācca
GSP33bbdip13u:570_26: na śūdrasya tadabhāvaḥ saṃskāraniṣedhābhāvaḥ / śūdrasya upanayananiṣedhābhāve kathamayaṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:570_27: tadabhāvanirdhāraṇe satyeva pravarteta, te jñāyate niṣedho 'stīti bhāva iti sūtrārtha
GSP33bbdip13u:571_0: chāndogye hītthamākhyāyikā - satyakāmo nāma ṛṣiḥ jabālākhyaṃ mātaramupetyovāca /
GSP33bbdip13u:571_2: upanayanaṃ vinā te māṃ nādhyāpayeyuḥ, upanayanaṃ ca gotrādyavacane na kuryuḥ ato
GSP33bbdip13u:571_3: 'haṃ kiṃ gotro 'smi tadvadeti / evamuktā jabālā svaputraṃ satyakāmamabravīt - he
GSP33bbdip13u:571_4: tāta tvaṃ yadgotro 'sītyetat nāhaṃ vedeti / evamuktaḥ satyakāmo gautamamupetyovāca /
GSP33bbdip13u:571_5: kimiti? he bhagavan brahmacaryārthaṃ tvāmupeyamiti / evamukto gautamaḥ he somya tvaṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:571_6: kiṃgotro 'si? tadvadetyuvāca / evamuktassatyakāmaḥ punargautamaṃ pratyāha - nāhametadveda
GSP33bbdip13u:571_7: bho iti / bho bhagavan pūjya gautama ahaṃ yadgotro 'smītyetat vedyaṃ 'na veda'; na
GSP33bbdip13u:571_8: jānāmītyarthaḥ / evaṃ satyakāmasya satyavacanenārjavaṃ jñātvā punastaṃ pratyuvāca /
GSP33bbdip13u:571_12: 'vivaktuṃ'; sarvathā vaktuṃ 'nārhati'; na yogyaḥ / atastvamevaṃ vadan brāhmaṇa evāsi,
GSP33bbdip13u:571_13: ato he somya samidhamupahara tvāmupaneṣya iti /
GSP33bbdip13u:577_1: adhikāraḥ siddhyet / anyathā tena devatādyadhikārasiddhirapi na syāditi śaṅkāṃ pariharatsūtramupanyasya
GSP33bbdip13u:577_2: vyācaṣṭe - śravaṇeti / sūtre 'arthāvadhāraṇe'; iti śrutyanusārādarthaśabdaḥ tadavadhāraṇaparaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:577_3: tathā ca 'śravaṇe trapujatubhyām'; iti śrutau śūdrasya vedaśravaṇādhyayanārthāvadhāraṇānāṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:578_0: adhyayananiṣedhābhāva iti tadarthaḥ / tathā cāniṣiddhatve sati viśiṣṭabuddhyādimattvasyaiva
GSP33bbdip13u:578_1: vedādhikāraprayojakatvenāṅgīkṛtatvāt tasya ca śūdre abhāvānna tasya devaprativandyā
GSP33bbdip13u:578_2: vedādhikāro vācya iti bhāvaḥ / śūdreṇa vedaśravaṇe kṛte sati drutābhyāṃ trapujatubhyāṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:578_3: vaṅgalākṣābhyāṃ tatkarṇavivaraparipūraṇaṃ rājabhaṭaiḥ kāryamiti śrutyarthaḥ / śiṣṭaḥ
GSP33bbdip13u:580: kevalaiva tu śuśrūṣā trivarṇānāṃ vidhīyate // iti smṛteśca /
GSP33bbdip13u:581_0: [BBsBhDīp_1,3.9.15] śrutau śūdreṇa śravaṇe kṛte ityanuktervarṇabāhyaviṣayeyaṃ śrutiḥ
GSP33bbdip13u:581_1: kiṃ na syādityāśaṅkānivṛtyarthaṃ sūtre smṛteścetyuktaṃ, tāṃ smṛtimudāharati - neti /
GSP33bbdip13u:581_2: yathā 'śūdrasya'; śūdreṇa nāgnissavathā ādhātavyaḥ pañcavidho yajño 'pi nānuṣṭheyaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:581_3: tathādhyayanaṃ kutaḥ bhavet na kuto 'pi / tarhi tenānuṣṭheyaṃ paralokasādhanaṃ kimiti
GSP33bbdip13u:581_4: pṛcchati - tu kintviti / uttaramāha - kevalaiveti / bhṛtirahitetyarthaḥ / trayaśca
GSP33bbdip13u:581_5: te varṇāśca trivarṇāḥ, teṣāṃ brahmakṣatriyavaiśyānāmityarthaḥ / 'śuśrūṣā'; paricaryaiveti
GSP33bbdip13u:581_6: sambandhaḥ / vidhīyate / kāryatveneti śeṣaḥ / iti smṛterityasya śūdrasyaivādhyayananiṣedhāvagamāt
GSP33bbdip13u:581_7: na tadabhāva ityadhyāhṛtenānvayaḥ / tathā ca spaṣṭasmṛtibalāt śruterapi śūdraviṣayatvameveti
GSP33bbdip13u:584_1: vaidikārthāvadhāraṇamasti / evaṃ saṃskārarahitānāṃ vedānadhikāre kathaṃ kṣatriyaḥ
GSP33bbdip13u:584_2: saṃskārarahitaḥ karṇaḥ nikhilāḥ śrutīradhijagau / na ca vācyamasāvapavādaviṣaya iti /
GSP33bbdip13u:584_4: niṣiddhādhyayanānāṃ śūdrāṇāṃ atadviṣayatvādityata āha - vidurādīnāmiti / ādipadena
GSP33bbdip13u:584_5: dharmavyādhādayo gṛhyante / tuśabdo viśeṣārthaḥ / tamevāha - utpannajñātvāditi /
GSP33bbdip13u:584_6: janmāntara eva vedātparamparayotpannamaparokṣajñānaṃ yeṣāṃ te tathoktāsteṣāṃ bhāvastattvam /
GSP33bbdip13u:584_7: tasmāt 'kaścit'; asādhāraṇaḥ itaraśūdrādibhyo vyāvṛtto viśeṣaḥ teṣvastītyarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:584_8: yata iti śeṣaḥ / ato na 'nāgniḥ'; ityādiniṣedhaviṣayatvaṃ teṣāṃ, kintu apavādaviṣayatvameveti
GSP33bbdip13u:584_9: na tatpratibandyetaraśūdrāṇāṃ vedādhikāraḥ śaṅkya iti bhāvaḥ / sūtrārthastu - śūdrasya
GSP33bbdip13u:584_11: 'nāgnirna yajñaḥ'; iti spaṣṭaṃ śūdrasyaiva vedādhyayananiṣedhakasmṛteśca na tasya
GSP33bbdip13u:587: [BBsBh_1,3.10.1] yadidaṃ kiñca jagatsarvaṃ prāṇa ejati nissṛtam /
GSP33bbdip13u:590_1: sūcayati - yadidamiti // atra traivarṇikānāṃ vedāt brahmajñānaṃ mokṣadamiti pūrvoktamayuktam /
GSP33bbdip13u:590_2: yato 'yadidam'; iti śrutau udyatavajrajñānāt mokṣaḥ śrūyata iti vākyopaskāreṇa yojanā /
GSP33bbdip13u:590_3: anena pūrvādhikaraṇe traivarṇikānāṃ vedāt brahmajñānaṃ mokṣadamiti yadabhipretaṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:590_5: viṣṇoranyatrākṣepāt tenāsya ākṣepikī saṅgatiruktā bhavati / vajraśabdo viṣaya iti
GSP33bbdip13u:590_6: sūcitam / vajraśruteḥ kuliśe rūḍhibalāt tathā 'udyatāyudhadordaṇḍāḥ'; ityādismṛtau
GSP33bbdip13u:590_8: vajramiti sayuktikapūrvapakṣaḥ sūcitaḥ / śrutau prāṇa iti saptamyantaṃ padam / sthitamitiśeṣaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:590_9: prāṇa ityasya nimittasaptamītvaṃ vā vibhaktivipariṇāmaṃ vā āśritya āvṛttyā nissṛtamityanenāpi
GSP33bbdip13u:590_10: sambandhaḥ / yadityasyāvṛttiradhyāhāro vā / yaditiśravaṇāt taditi labhyate / tathā
GSP33bbdip13u:590_11: cāyaṃ siddhānte śrutyarthaḥ - 'yatkiñca'; yatkiñcit dṛṣṭaṃ śrutaṃ yatsarvaṃ jagat
GSP33bbdip13u:590_12: 'prāṇe'; prāṇanānnimittāt prāṇaśabdavācye harau sthitaṃ prāṇānnissṛtaṃ tato jātaṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:590_13: ca taditaṃ sarvaṃ jagat 'yasmādejati'; yatpreraṇayā ceṣṭate tanmahanīyatvāt pūjyatvāt
GSP33bbdip13u:590_15: ca prayatnavattvam'; utpūrvasya yamestadarthatvāt, iti candrikokteḥ / yatīprayatna
GSP33bbdip13u:590_16: ityasyedaṃ rūpam, ucchabda utkarṣavācītyapi kecit / 'vajraṃ'; doṣavarjanāt apriyavarjanādvā
GSP33bbdip13u:590_17: tacchabdavācyam / etadye 'viduḥ'; aparokṣato jānanti te 'amṛtāḥ'; muktāḥ bhavantīti /
GSP33bbdip13u:590_18: yadvā - prāṇa iti prathamāntaṃ padaṃ tathā ca prāṇo mukhyaprāṇaḥ / idaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ kiñcānyacchrutaṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:590_19: sarvaṃ jagacca yasmānnissṛtaṃ yasmādejati ca tadetadvajraṃ ye vidurityarthaḥ / athavā
GSP33bbdip13u:590_21: tṛtīyasya vajraparatvam / sa iti labhyate / tasya prathamāntaprāṇapadenānvayaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:590_22: tathā ca yatkiñcijjagatsarvaṃ yadyasmānnissṛtaṃ sa mukhyaprāṇaḥ / yasmādejati tadvajraṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:590_23: ye vidurityarthaḥ / atra prathamavyākhyāne mukhyaprāṇasya jagadantargatatvena bhagavatpreryatvaṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:590_24: dvitīye jagatsāmyena, tṛtīye tu mukhyaprāṇasyaiva sākṣādbhagavatpreryatvaṃ jagatastu
GSP33bbdip13u:590_25: mukhyaprāṇapreryatvamiti bhedaḥ / pūrvapakṣī tu indrāyudhameva vajrapadenoktam /
GSP33bbdip13u:596_3: bhavati / na ca śrutau vākyabhedāṅgīkāre kampakatvaṃ vajre nocyata iti vācyam / kampakatvanimittabhayaṅkaratvasya
GSP33bbdip13u:596_4: vajre abhidhānādvākyabhedāyogāt / udyatavajra iti sūtre śeṣoktiḥ samanvayasūtrādanuvṛttasya
GSP33bbdip13u:596_6: sāvadhāraṇaṃ caitat / tena tuśabdārtho darśitaḥ / yadyapi vajro bhagavānevetyetāvadeva
GSP33bbdip13u:596_7: vaktavyaṃ, na tūdyata iti vajraviśeṣaṇamapi / tathāpi pūrvapakṣyuktodyatatvaliṅgasya
GSP33bbdip13u:597: [BBsBh_1,3.10.3] 'ko hyevānyātkaḥ prāṇyāt / yadeṣa ākāśa ānando na syāt'; (tai.2.7.) iti hi śrutiḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:598_0: [BBsBhDīp_1,3.10.3] nanu śrutiliṅgābhyāṃ pūrvapakṣite kathaṃ liṅgamātreṇa nirṇaya
GSP33bbdip13u:598_2: vajre śrutasya prāṇataditarasādhāraṇyena sāmānyato jagacceṣṭakatvaliṅgasya viṣṇoranyatraniravakāśatvaṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:598_3: śrutyā darśayati - kohīti / hiśabdo hetau yata ityarthe prasiddhau vā / astīti śeṣaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:598_4: ato liṅgasya nānyatra sāvakāśatvaṃ śaṅkyamiti vākyaśeṣaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:600_1: kimu vaktavyaṃ śruteḥ tṛtīyavyākhyānarītyā vajre śrutasya sarvajagatpravartakaprāṇaceṣṭakatvaliṅgasya
GSP33bbdip13u:600_2: viṣṇvekaniṣṭhatvaṃ jagacceṣṭakatvasya sarvathānyatrāyogāditi bhāvena tatra śrutiṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:600_3: darśayati - prāṇasyeti / co yasmādityarthe / pūrvaśrutisamuccaye vā / śrutirityanuṣajyate /
GSP33bbdip13u:600_4: uktaliṅgasya anyatra niravakāśatvaṃ jñāpayatīti vākyaśeṣaḥ / yadvā - yat jagatpravartakaprāṇaceṣṭakatvādiliṅgaṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:600_5: kampanādityanena abhisaṃhitaṃ, tasya viṣṇuniṣṭhatvāsiddhiparihārāya tatra śrutiṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:602: kimutānyasya jagato yasya ceṣṭā nabhasvataḥ // iti ca skānde /
GSP33bbdip13u:603_1: hetūkṛtya pravṛttāṃ smṛtimāha - nabhasvata iti // 'api'; jagatprerakasyāpi 'nabhasvato';
GSP33bbdip13u:603_2: vāyoryadā sarvāḥ ceṣṭāḥ 'bhagavato'; jñānādiguṇapūrṇāddharerbhavanti / tadā kimutānyasya
GSP33bbdip13u:603_3: preryasya vāyubhinnasya jagataśceṣṭā harerbhavantīti vaktavyam / kuta etat? yato
GSP33bbdip13u:603_4: yasya jagataḥ ceṣṭā nabhasvato na bhavantyata iti vacanārthaḥ / skānda ityanantaramuktamiti
GSP33bbdip13u:603_5: śeṣaḥ / ato 'pi liṅgasya nānyatrāvakāśa iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:605: khaṇḍanātsvaṅga evaiṣa hetināmā svayaṃ hariḥ / iti brahmāvaivarte // 39 //
GSP33bbdip13u:607_1: prabalatvācca kathaṃ niravakāśenāpi sarvaceṣṭakatvaliṅgena vajro viṣṇureveti nirṇaya
GSP33bbdip13u:607_3: viṣṇāvavakāśaṃ smṛtyā darśayati - cakramiti / 'eṣaḥ'; bhagavān 'caṅkramaṇāt'; saṃsāre
GSP33bbdip13u:607_4: jīvaparibhrāmakatvāt cakram / yathoktaṃ tattvapradīpe - caṅkrāmayatīti cakramiti /
GSP33bbdip13u:607_5: evaṃ 'varjanāt'; daityairdūrādeva varjyate, na sanmukhīkriyate iti, sattarkadīpāvalīrītyā
GSP33bbdip13u:607_7: damanācca khaḍga eṣa ityarthaḥ / evaśabdena tadabhedo vyāvartyate / tataḥ kim, eṣa
GSP33bbdip13u:607_8: iti ca kaḥ ityata āha - hetīti / evaṃ hariḥ 'svayaṃ'; sākṣāt anyasambandhamantareṇa
GSP33bbdip13u:607_9: 'hetināmā'; hetīnāṃ cakrādisarvāyudhānāṃ yāni nāmāni mukhyavācyatayā tadvānityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:607_10: hetīti sāmānyagrahaṇena bhāṣye vajrapadamanyasyāpyupalakṣakamityuktaṃ bhavati / brahmavaivarta
GSP33bbdip13u:607_11: ityanantaram uktamiti śeṣaḥ / ato na śrutivirodho 'pīti bhāvaḥ / 'ucyate hetināmā';
GSP33bbdip13u:607_12: ityanena vajrādiśabdānāṃ viṣṇau vidvadrūḍhirapyastīti sūcitam / tena varjanādityuktayogasya
GSP33bbdip13u:607_13: rūḍherdairbalyāt ayoga iti nirastam / na caivaṃ kāṭhakabhāṣye - vajravadbhayadaṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:607_14: ceti vajraśabdasya viṣṇau gauṇatvoktivirodha iti vācyam / tatra tadvākyasya yathākathañcit
GSP33bbdip13u:607_15: brahmaparatvasiddhirityatraiva tātparyāt / brahmaparatvasya gauṇyāpi siddheḥ gauṇatve
GSP33bbdip13u:607_16: tātparyābhāvāt / atra tu samanvayasūtrapratijñātamukhyārthatvāya tātparyato yogarūḍhyorevoktatvāt /
GSP33bbdip13u:610: [BBsBh_1,3.11.1] hṛdaya āhitaṃ jyotiḥ paramātmetyuktam / tatra 'yo 'yaṃ vijñānamayaḥ prāṇeṣu hṛdyantarjotiḥ puruṣaḥ'; (bṛ. 6.3.7.) iti /
GSP33bbdip13u:611: atra 'ubhau lokāvanusañcarati'; (bṛ.6.3.7.) iti vacanājjīva iti pratīyate iti /
GSP33bbdip13u:612_1: viṣayādikaṃ ca darśayati - hṛdaya iti / yaddhṛdaye 'āhitaṃ'; nihitaṃ jyotiḥ tacchabdavācyaṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:612_2: sa paramātmeti jyotirnaye abhihitamityarthaḥ / tataḥ kimityata āha - tatreti jyotirviṣaya
GSP33bbdip13u:612_3: ityarthaḥ / itiśabdātparaṃ śrūyata iti śeṣaḥ / tato 'pi kimityata āha - atreti /
GSP33bbdip13u:612_4: etadvākya ityarthaḥ / śrutaṃ jyotirityanuṣajyate / tathā cātra śrutaṃ jyotiḥ tacchabdavācyo
GSP33bbdip13u:612_5: jñānātmako jīva eveti pratīyate / kutaḥ? 'sasamānassannubhau lokāvanusañcarati';
GSP33bbdip13u:612_8: saṅgatiḥ uktā bhavati / vājasaneyoktaṃ jyotirviṣayaḥ, jīva evedaṃ jyotiriti pūrvapakṣaśca
GSP33bbdip13u:612_9: sūcitaḥ / vājasaneyake hi ayaṃ puruṣaḥ 'kiṃjyotiḥ'; kiṃjñānasādhanaḥ jīvasya jñānasādhanaṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:612_11: ityanena he 'samrāṭ'; sārvabhauma janakarāja ādityākhyajñānasādhanako 'yaṃ puruṣa
GSP33bbdip13u:612_14: caturṣvastamiteṣu 'kiṃjyotirayaṃ puruṣaḥ'; (bṛ.6.3.2.) iti janakena pṛṣṭo yājñavalkyaḥ
GSP33bbdip13u:612_16: 'katam ātmā'; (bṛ.6.3.7.) iti jyotiṣṭvenokta ātmā katamaḥ kīdṛśa iti pṛṣṭo 'yo 'yam';
GSP33bbdip13u:612_18: vijñānapūrṇaḥ 'prāṇeṣu'; indriyeṣu antaḥ hṛdyantaśca niyantṛtvena vartamāno 'jyotiḥ';
GSP33bbdip13u:612_20: mahimānamāha - sa iti / 'saḥ'; ātmā paramātmā 'samānaḥ'; avikāraḥ sadaikarūpaḥ san
GSP33bbdip13u:612_21: 'ubhau lokau'; bhūlokadyulokau jāgratsuṣuptī vā pratijīvamādāya tamanusañcaratītyarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:612_22: pūrvapakṣī tu, ātmapadaṃ sa iti padaṃ ca jīvaparaṃ ubhayalokasañcaraṇamapi karmādhīnaṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:618: balaṃ viṣṇureva yaśo viṣṇurevānandaḥ'; iti darśanāccaturvedaśikhāyām /
GSP33bbdip13u:620_1: vyācaṣṭe - ata iti / 'viṣṇureva jyotiḥ.... viṣṇurevānandaḥ'; iti caturvedaśikhāyāmiti
GSP33bbdip13u:620_2: 'darśanāt'; viṣṇureva mukhyato jyotiśśabdita iti uktatvāt 'jyotiḥ'; tacchabdavācyo
GSP33bbdip13u:620_3: viṣṇureva, na jīva ityarthaḥ / viṣṇurevetyanena tattvityanuvṛttasya arthaḥ uktaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:620_4: śrutyarthastu spaṣṭaḥ / viśeṣastu - balaṃ balapradaḥ / 'sa vai balaṃ balināṃ cāpareṣām';
GSP33bbdip13u:620_5: iti ca bhāgavate / viṣṇureva yaśaḥ 'tasya nāma mahadyaśaḥ'; (mahānā.1.10.) iti śrutiriti
GSP33bbdip13u:620_6: tattvapradīpe abhihitam / brahmādiśabdavajjyotiśśabdo 'pi viṣṇvekaniṣṭha iti jñāpanāya
GSP33bbdip13u:621: [BBsBh_1,3.11.3] 'prājñenātmanā anvārūḍha utsarjadyāti'; (bṛ.6.3.35.) iti vacanāt tasyāpi lokasañcaraṇamastyeva // 40 //
GSP33bbdip13u:623_1: sautradarśanapadoktaśrutyā pariharati - prājñeneti // 'iti vacanāt'; iti vājasaneyaśrutivākyāt
GSP33bbdip13u:623_3: na tadabhāva ityevaśabdārthaḥ / tathā ca liṅgaṃ sāvakāśamiti na tadvirodha iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:623_4: śārīra ātmā jīvo maraṇakāle 'prājñena'; prakarṣeṇa āsamantāt jñena prajña eva prājñaḥ,
GSP33bbdip13u:623_5: tena vā paramātmanā 'anvārūḍhaḥ'; adhiṣṭhito jīvamāruhya gacchati bhagavāniti bṛhadbhāṣyokteḥ
GSP33bbdip13u:629_1: viṣayādikaṃ ca darśayati - sarvādhāratvamiti / dyubhvādyadhikaraṇa iti śeṣaḥ / tataḥ
GSP33bbdip13u:629_2: kimityata āha - tacceti / co 'vadhāraṇe / 'ityatra'; ityevaṃrūpe chandogavākya ityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:629_5: viṣayaśca sūcitaḥ / sayuktikaṃ pūrvapakṣaṃ darśayati - vaināmeti // sa iti śeṣaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:629_6: co 'vadhāraṇe / tathā ca chandogyaśrutyuktaḥ ākāśaḥ prasiddhaḥ sākṣisiddhaḥ avyākṛtākāśa
GSP33bbdip13u:629_9: iti vacanāt avakāśasyāpi nāmarūpavattvāditi candrikākṛdabhipretaṃ ṭīkāpāṭhamāśritya
GSP33bbdip13u:629_11: bhūtameva pūrvapakṣaviṣayaityāhuḥ / śrutau vai nāmeti nipātadvayaṃ prasiddhau / 'nāma';
GSP33bbdip13u:629_13: tathā ca ākāśo 'nāmarūpayoḥ'; śabdārthaprapañcayoḥ 'nirvahitā'; nirvoḍhā āśrayaḥ
GSP33bbdip13u:629_14: kartācetyarthaḥ / 'te'; nirvāhyatayā prakṛte nāmarūpe 'antarā'; bhedena / yaditi
GSP33bbdip13u:629_15: nāmarūpaprapañcādbhinnaṃ yadastīti yāvat / yadvā - tacchabdena vācyaprapañcāntarbhūtaṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:629_16: nīlādirūpaṃ vācakaṃ nāma ca gṛhyate / tathā ca 'te'; nāmarūpe 'antarā'; vinā tadrahitamiti
GSP33bbdip13u:629_17: yāvat / sākalyena nāmavācyaṃ prākṛtarūparahitaṃ ca yadvartate tadbrahmetyarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:629_18: yadvā - 'te'; nāmirūpiṇām 'antarā'; bhedena yadastītyarthaḥ / yathoktaṃ tattvapradīpe
GSP33bbdip13u:629_19: - nāmi ca rūpi ca yannabhavati tadbrahmeti /
GSP33bbdip13u:635_1: sūtre bhāṣye ca padārthatvabodhāyārthaśabdaḥ / śrutyanusārādantaraśabdaḥ / tābhyāmiti
GSP33bbdip13u:635_2: śeṣaḥ / tathā ca tābhyāṃ nāmarūpābhyāṃ anyaḥ arthaḥ arthāntaraṃ yadvā tābhyāṃ vilakṣaṇaḥ
GSP33bbdip13u:635_3: arthaḥ arthāntaraḥ tasya bhāvastattvam / nāmarūpaprapañcabhinnatvaṃ vā prākṛtanāmarūparāhityaṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:635_6: rūparāhityaṃ ādipadena nāmarāhityaṃ ca gṛhyate / tathā ca evaṃrūpārthāntaratvādyukterityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:635_8: tattvityasyārthamāha - harireveti // anena - ayamākāśo harireva / kutaḥ? asya arthāntaratvādivyapadeśāt
GSP33bbdip13u:637_0: [BBsBhDīp_1,3.12.3] ākāśe śrutena nāmarūpatvādiliṅgena kuto viṣṇutvaniścaya ityatastasya
GSP33bbdip13u:637_1: tanniṣṭhatvāditibhāvena tatra pramāṇatayā ātharvaṇīṃ śrutimāha - avarṇamiti / prākṛtaśuklādivarṇarahitaṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:637_2: tadbhinnaṃ vetyarthaḥ / yadvā avarṇaṃ na varṇyaṃ 'nāpivarṇātmakam'; ityarthaḥ 'yataḥ';
GSP33bbdip13u:637_5: ityādiśruterityasya tasya viṣṇoretadarūpatvādikaṃ lakṣaṇamasādhāraṇadharma iti jñāyate
GSP33bbdip13u:637_6: ityadhyāhāreṇānvayaḥ / hi yasmāttasmāt na liṅgasya vyadhikaraṇāsiddhiriti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:637_8: prathamamudāhartavyā, 'te yadantarā'; iti nāmarāhityasyaiva prathamamuktatvāt / na
GSP33bbdip13u:637_9: tu 'avarṇam'; ityarūpaśrutiḥ / tathāpi vācakasya nāmno vācyāpekṣayāprādhānyāt vācyasyaiva
GSP33bbdip13u:640_1: anyathār ikṣateḥ rūpopanyāsāccetyuktavirodhāpātādityata āha - anāmeti / 'saḥ'; hariḥ
GSP33bbdip13u:640_3: ityarthaḥ / na caivamākāśaśabdavācyasya prasiddhibodhakanipātadvayavirodha iti vācyam /
GSP33bbdip13u:640_7: arūpa ityarthaḥ / iti brāhme ityasyoktatvāt noktavirodha ityadhyāhṛtenānvayaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:643: [BBsBh_1,3.13.1] asaṅgatvaṃ paramātmana uktam / tacca 'sa yattatra kiñcitpaśyananvāgatastena bhavatyasaṅgo hyayaṃ puruṣaḥ'; (bṛ.6.3.15.) iti svapnādidraṣṭuḥ pratīyate /
GSP33bbdip13u:644_1: śrutyādisaṅgatiṃ viṣayādikaṃ ca sūcayati - asaṅgatvamiti / akṣaranayodāhṛte 'agandhamarasam';
GSP33bbdip13u:645_0: tataḥ kimityata āha - tacceti / co 'vadhāraṇe / itīti evaṃrūpe vājasaneyavākya ityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:645_2: akṣaranayenāsya ākṣepikī saṅgatissūcitā / svapnādidraṣṭṛtvākhyo viṣayaśca sūcitaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:647_0: [BBsBhDīp_1,3.13.2] tataḥ kimityataḥ sayuktikaṃ pūrvapakṣayati - sa ceti / co 'vadhāraṇe /
GSP33bbdip13u:647_1: 'saḥ'; svapnādidraṣṭā / jīva eva bhavet / kutaḥ taddraṣṭṛtvasya loke jīva eva prasiddhatvādityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:647_2: siddhānte śrutau 'saḥ'; iti tacchabdena 'sa vā eṣa etasmin samprasāde ratvā caritvā
GSP33bbdip13u:647_3: dṛṣṭvaiva puṇyaṃ ca pāpaṃ ca punaḥ pratinyāyaṃ prati yonyā dravati svapnāyaiva';
GSP33bbdip13u:647_4: (bṛ. 6.3.15.) iti pūrvavākye prakṛtaḥ paramātmā parāmṛśyate / vaiśabdaḥ prasiddhau /
GSP33bbdip13u:647_5: samyakprasīdati jīvo 'syāmiti samprasādaḥ suptiḥ / tathā ca sa paramātmā 'samprasāde';
GSP33bbdip13u:647_6: suptau 'ratvā'; ramaṇaṃ kṛtvā jīvagataṃ puṇyaṃ ca pāpaṃ ca dṛṣṭvaiva na tvanubhūya
GSP33bbdip13u:647_8: yadvā tattatkarmanusṛtya 'pratiyoni'; pratidehaṃ sarvadeheṣu yadvā pratiyoni tattanmārgamanusṛtya
GSP33bbdip13u:647_11: duḥkhena 'ananvāgataḥ'; asaṃspṛṣṭo bhavati / tatra hetuḥ - asaṅga iti / hi yasmādayaṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:647_13: tu śrautatacchabdena jīvaṃ gṛhītvā sarvaṃ vākyaṃ jīvaparatayā vyākhyāti /
GSP33bbdip13u:652: 'prājñenātmanā sampariṣvakto na bāhyaṃ kiñcana veda nāntaram';
GSP33bbdip13u:655_1: svapnādidraṣṭṛtvaṃ tasyaivetyatrāpi sambadhyate / tena sūtre uddeśyavidheyapratipattyartham
GSP33bbdip13u:655_2: anuvṛttāvṛttasya tacchabdasya vipariṇāmassūcitaḥ / tacchabdena gṛhītasyāpi samanvetavyaliṅgasya
GSP33bbdip13u:655_3: spaṣṭapratipattyarthaṃ svaśabdena nirdeśaḥ / itiśabdānantaraṃ suṣuptīti sautrapadaṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:655_4: saṃyojyam / vyapadeśāditi buddhyā vivicya pūrvasmādanuṣaktaṃ padam / asaṅga ityapi
GSP33bbdip13u:655_5: hetusūcanāya sūtre adhyāhṛtaṃ padam / jīvaḥ para ityanena suṣuptyutkrāntipadaṃ tatprakaraṇalakṣakamapi
GSP33bbdip13u:655_6: jīvaparamātmaparamapītyuktaṃ bhavati / tathātve suṣuptiśabdaḥ kartari ktinnantaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:655_7: utkrāntiśabdaḥ dehādutkrāmayitṛparaḥ tathā cetthaṃ yojanā - svapnādidraṣṭṛtvaṃ tasya
GSP33bbdip13u:655_8: paramātmana eva bhavet na jīvasya / kutaḥ? yato 'sāvasaṅgaḥ śrutaḥ / na ca svapnādidraṣṭuḥ
GSP33bbdip13u:655_9: asaṅgatvaśravaṇe 'pi kuto 'yaṃ viṣṇuriti vācyam / yato 'yamasaṅgaḥ karmābaddhatvāt
GSP33bbdip13u:655_10: paraḥ paramātmaiva na jīvaḥ / tathā ca liṅgasya niravakāśatvāt nāprayojakatvaṃ śaṅkyamiti
GSP33bbdip13u:655_11: bhāvaḥ / na ca jīve 'pir iśvarabhedena asaṅgatvoktiḥ sambhavatīti vācyam / prājñenetyādisuṣuptyutkrāntiprakaraṇadvayagatavākyayorasaṅgātsvapnādidraṣṭurḥ
GSP33bbdip13u:655_12: iśvarājjīvasya bhedavyapadeśāditi / prājñeneti śrutyudāharaṇena sūtre suṣuptipadaṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:655_13: mokṣasyāpi grāhakaṃ, tenāyaṃ bhedo vyāvahārika iti śaṅkānirāso 'pi bhavati / suṣuptyutkrāntipadena
GSP33bbdip13u:655_14: ca tatprakaraṇaṃ lakṣyata ityuktaṃ bhavati / utkrāntipadaṃ ca jīvasya dehādutkramaṇarūpamaraṇavāci /
GSP33bbdip13u:655_15: śrutau prājñaśabdaḥ svārthikāṇantaḥ / tathā ca 'prājñena'; sarvajñena paramātmanā
GSP33bbdip13u:655_16: 'sampariṣvaktaḥ'; samāśliṣṭaḥ supto muktaśca dehādbāhyamāntaraṃ ca kiñcana viṣayādikaṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:658_0: [BBsBhDīp_1,3.13.4] nanu kathamaśarīrasya svāpnādidarśanaṃ yuktaṃ syādityata āha
GSP33bbdip13u:658_1: - svapnādīti / caśabdaḥ samuccaye / apyarthe vā / ādipadena jīvagatāvasthā gṛhyate /
GSP33bbdip13u:658_2: tathā ca na kevalamasaṅgatvaṃ karmābaddhatvāt parasyaiva yujyate, kintu svāpnādidraṣṭṛtvaṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:658_3: ca 'tasyaiva'; paramātmana eva jīvādapi mukhyato yujyate / ataḥ tasyaiva tadvacanaṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:658_4: yujyate na jīvasya / kutaḥ? tasyaiva 'sarvajñatvāt'; satyāśeṣārthajñatvāt svapnapadārthānāṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:658_5: jīvagatāvasthāyāśca satyatāyā vakṣyamāṇatvāditi bhāvaḥ / na cāśarīratvaliṅgaṃ bādhakaṃ,
GSP33bbdip13u:658_6: yato 'tra tasyaiva ciccharīrakasyaiva svapnādidraṣṭṛtvamucyate / na ca 'dṛṣṭvaiva
GSP33bbdip13u:658_7: puṇyaṃ ca pāpaṃ ca'; (bṛ.6.3.15.) ityādyayoga iti vācyam / yato 'tra ādipadagṛhītaṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:658_8: puṇyapāpādidraṣṭṛtvaṃ liṅgāntaraṃ ca tasyaiva yujyate ata iti yojanā / tatropapattistu
GSP33bbdip13u:658_11: tathā ca jīveśvarayoḥ 'bhedena'; bhinnatvenaiva 'vyapadeśāt'; uktatvāt na tayorabhedaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:658_12: ato neśvarābhedenāpi jīve asaṅgatvoktiryujyate / kintu tattu tasyaivar iśvarasyaiva
GSP33bbdip13u:658_13: yujyate / ata eva svapnādidraṣṭṛtvaṃ ca tasyaiva vaktuṃ yujyate na jīvasyeti sūtrārthaḥ
GSP33bbdip13u:662: brāhmaṇasyāpi nityamahimā pratīyate / sa ca brāhmaṇaḥ
GSP33bbdip13u:663: 'sa vā eṣa mahānaja ātmā'; (bṛ. 6.4.24.) ityajaśabdādviriñca iti prāptam / devānāṃ ca vidyākarmaṇoḥ padaprāptiḥ sūcitā taduparyapīti /
GSP33bbdip13u:664_1: ca sūcayati - eṣa iti / itīti / vājasaneyakodāhṛtaṛṅmantra ityarthaḥ / na kevalaṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:664_2: viṣṇoḥ api tu kasyacit brāhmaṇasyāpītyaperarthaḥ / idaṃ ca yo janmādyadhikaraṇeṣu
GSP33bbdip13u:664_3: viṣṇorananyāpekṣayā jagatsraṣṭṛtvoktyā abhisaṃhito nityamahimā saḥ 'eṣaḥ'; iti vākye
GSP33bbdip13u:664_4: brāhmaṇasyāpi pratīyata iti yattacchabdādhyāhāreṇa yojyam / anena pūrvābhisaṃhitanityamahimatvasya
GSP33bbdip13u:664_6: bhavati / tathā brāhmaṇākhyaviṣayo 'pi sūcitaḥ / yadvā - devānāmiti vākyaṃ devatādhikaraṇapratipādyānuvādaparatvenāpi
GSP33bbdip13u:664_7: vyākhyāya tenāsyākṣepikī saṅgatiruktā draṣṭavyā / tathā hi 'tadupari'; iti sūtreṇa
GSP33bbdip13u:664_8: devānāṃ viriñcādyamarāṇāṃ vidyākarmaṇossakāśāt sādhyā yā nityapadaprāptiruktā, sā
GSP33bbdip13u:664_9: na yuktā / kutaḥ? yataḥ 'eṣaḥ'; iti vākye brāhmaṇapadoditasya viriñcasya nityamahimā
GSP33bbdip13u:664_10: 'pratīyate'; pratipādyata iti vākyayojanā / śrutau brahmaṇā vedenāṇyate 'vagamyate
GSP33bbdip13u:664_11: iti vyutpattiḥ / dīrghavyatyāso viṣṇorvedagamyatve jīvādādhikyajñāpakaḥ / tathā ca
GSP33bbdip13u:664_12: brāhmaṇasya viṣṇoreṣaḥ pūrvoktamahimā nityaḥ / kuto? yato 'yaṃ 'na karmaṇā vardhate
GSP33bbdip13u:664_13: no kanīyān'; (bṛ.6.4.22.) śubhakarmaṇā tatphalena sukhena na vardhate / pāpakarmaṇā
GSP33bbdip13u:664_14: tatphalena duḥkhena na hrasate iti śrutyarthaḥ / sayuktikaṃ pūrvapakṣayati - sa iti /
GSP33bbdip13u:664_15: vājasaneyaśruta ityarthaḥ / caśabdo 'vadhāraṇe / viriñca eveti sambadhyate / ityajaśabdāditi /
GSP33bbdip13u:664_16: ityevaṃ rūpeṣu pūrvottaravākyeṣu śrutājaśabdādityarthaḥ / 'sa eṣaḥ'; paramātmā 'mahān';
GSP33bbdip13u:664_17: aparimitaḥ 'ajo'; janmarahitaśceti śrutyarthaḥ / pūrvapakṣī tu brāhmaṇājaśabdavācyaṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:664_18: viriñciṃ manyate / nanu kathaṃ brāhmaṇo viriñco bhavet / taduparīti sūtre devānāṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:664_19: vidyākarmabhyāṃ padaprāpteḥ samarthitatvena brāhmaṇe śrutanityamahimatvasya viriñce
GSP33bbdip13u:664_20: asambhavāt / sādipadasyānityatvaniyamāt ityata āha - devānāṃ ceti / co 'vadhāraṇe /
GSP33bbdip13u:664_21: itītyanantaraṃ sūtra iti śeṣaḥ / tathā ca taduparīti sūtre viriñcetaradevānāmeva
GSP33bbdip13u:664_22: vidyākarmaṇoḥ sakāśāt padaprāptiḥ 'sūcitā'; samarthitā / na tu viriñcasyāpi / tasyeśvararūpatvena
GSP33bbdip13u:669: 'sarvasyādhipatiḥ sarvasyeśānaḥ ... sa vā eṣa neti neti'; (bṛ. 6.4.21.) ityādiśabdebhyo nityamahimā viṣṇureva //
GSP33bbdip13u:670_2: sūtraṃ vyācaṣṭe - sarvasyeti / 'sarvasya'; brahmarudrādeḥ sakāśāt guṇairadhikaścāsau
GSP33bbdip13u:670_3: sarvasya patiḥ pālakaśceti sarvādhipatiḥ / 'sarvasya'; jagatarḥ 'iśānāṃ'; brahmādīnāṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:670_4: anaḥ preraka iti sarvasyeśāna iti śrutyantarārthaḥ / sarvavaśiśabdārthastu sarvamasya
GSP33bbdip13u:670_5: vaśe yasmāddhariḥ sarvavaśī tata iti bṛhadbhāṣyādavagantavyaḥ / 'sa vā eṣaḥ'; iti
GSP33bbdip13u:670_7: 'iti na'; dṛṣṭavanna 'iti na'; śrutavanna, kintu dṛṣṭaśrutavilakṣaṇa ityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:670_8: vaiśabdaḥ prasiddhau / kuta ityataḥ 'ātmāgṛhyo na hi gṛhyate 'śīryo na hi śīryate
GSP33bbdip13u:670_9: 'saṅgo na hi sajjate 'sito na vyathate na riṣyati.........sa eṣa ātmājaro 'maro 'mṛto
GSP33bbdip13u:670_10: 'bhayaḥ'; (bṛ. 2.4.24.) iti vākyaśeṣaḥ pravṛttaḥ / atrāgṛhya ityādirātmana iti netyuktārthe
GSP33bbdip13u:670_11: sākalyena agrāhyatvādirūpahetusamarpakaḥ / na hītyādistu tatra pramāṇābhāvāditi hetusūcakaḥ /
GSP33bbdip13u:670_12: yadyapi bṛhadbhāṣye 'itina'; ramāvanna 'itina'; brahmādivanna, baddhavanna, muktavannetyanyathā
GSP33bbdip13u:670_14: vyākhyātamityadoṣaḥ / ityādīti / ityādau śrutāḥ ye sarvādhipatyādivācakāḥ śabdāḥ
GSP33bbdip13u:670_17: 'pīti uktaṃ bhavati / evaṃ hetuṃ vyākhyāya sūtre samanvayasūtrāt tattvityanuvartya
GSP33bbdip13u:670_19: niṣkṛṣṭāṃ pratijñāṃ darśayati - nityamahimeti / idaṃ ca phalakathanarūpam / śabdebhya
GSP33bbdip13u:670_20: iti hetvanvayayogyaṃ sādhyaṃ tu brāhmaṇa ityadhyāhṛtaṃ draṣṭavyam / anena - ayaṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:670_21: brāhmaṇaḥ tattu viṣṇureva, na viriñcaḥ / kutaḥ? 'patyādiśabdebhyaḥ'; sarvādhipatyādivācisarvādhipatyādiśabdebhyo
GSP33bbdip13u:670_22: 'tra śrutebhyaḥ / tathā ca nityamahimāpi sa eveti sūtrārtha ukto bhavati /
GSP33bbdip13u:672_2: - uteti / idaṃ ca 'puruṣa evedaṃ sarvam'; / 'yadbhūtaṃ yacca bhavyam'; iti pūrvavākyena
GSP33bbdip13u:672_3: saha vyākhyeyam / tatprakārastu - 'yadbhūtam'; atītaṃ 'bhavyaṃ'; bhaviṣyat vartamānaṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:672_4: ca tatsarvaṃ 'puruṣa eva'; paramapuruṣādhīnameva / kutaḥ? yato yasmāt na kevalamamuktasarvādhipatiḥ
GSP33bbdip13u:672_6: hi taddhitagatiḥ'; iti vacanātsamudāyārthe tvapratyayaḥ / tattvapradīpe tu - bhāvabhavitrorabhedavyapadeśāt
GSP33bbdip13u:672_7: bhāve tvapratyayaḥ / 'amṛtatvasya'; mokṣasyar iśāna iti ceti arthāntaraṃ coktam /
GSP33bbdip13u:672_8: atra hetumāha - yaditi / tṛtīyā dvitīyārthe / tathā ca 'yat'; yasmāt 'annena'; annaṃ
GSP33bbdip13u:674: (ṛ. 1.164.36.) 'sa yo 'to 'śrutaḥ'; (ai. ā. 3.2.4.) ityādiśrutibhyastasyaiva hi te śabdāḥ // 43 //
GSP33bbdip13u:679_1: - sapteti / akṣaranaye vyākhyāteyaṃ śrutiḥ / neti netītyuktadṛṣṭaśrutasarvavilakṣaṇatve
GSP33bbdip13u:679_2: 'pi śrutimudāharati - sa iti / iyamapi sarvatrādhikaraṇe vyākhyātā / ityādītyādipadena
GSP33bbdip13u:679_4: nānyasyetyevārthaḥ / 'hi'; yasmātte sarvādhipatyādiśabdāḥ ityavagatāḥ tasmāt nāprayojakatvaṃ
